founders.founder_bio: CEO & Co-Founder of HelixDB, a graph-vector database for building RAG.
founders.title: Founder

launches.title: HelixDB - The database for RAG & AI
launches.body:
Hi everyone 👋

We’re [George](https://www.linkedin.com/in/george-curtis-12b232a5/) and [Xav](https://www.linkedin.com/in/xaviercochran/) – co-founders of [HelixDB](https://www.helix-db.com)

# TL;DR

**HelixDB is an open-source graph-vector database that brings structure to your un-structured data for RAG and AI applications.** Currently, we have hundreds of developers building projects with HelixDB, including a Fortune 500 company.

**_ASK:_** Can you introduce us to people/companies that are working on Graph/Hybrid RAG that could benefit from better performance or less overhead in their development cycles? Contact me at [george@helix-db.com](https://mailto:george@helix-db.com)

https://youtu.be/V5viTRj2h68

# ❌ The Problem

AI is changing at a rapid rate which is fundamentally changing technology. This new tech **_needs_** new infrastructure.

Everyone is trying to build AI applications, which often involve dedicated data retrieval for their specific use case. Building these retrieval systems is hard. Previously, we’ve relied solely on vector databases to retrieve semantic matches on tiny snippets of text data. But, this technology is shifting and is relying more heavily on connected data, which comes with better context.

But building these retrieval systems often involve:

1. **Vector databases**
2. **Graph databases**
3. Bespoke **middleman/syncing** software

These setups are complicated, take a lot of time, engineering expertise, and create huge amounts of overhead which makes maintaining them very time consuming and expensive.

# ✅ Our Solution

HelixDB integrates semantic meaning (through its vector types) with relationships to other data (graph types), a similar model to how we structure information in our brains.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90705&key=user_uploads/1342245/468263b3-fb06-4efe-9352-4c30923c6d10)

This makes it the best solution for making AI retrieval engines for agents and LLMs.

How we currently do this:

1. Seamlessly integrate **vector types** into your **knowledge graph**
2. **Type-safe query language** that guides developers and agents to write correct queries before they are executed
3. **Extreme speeds** outperforming industry leaders by 1-3 orders of magnitude

How we’re going to make it better:

1. **MCP tools** that allow agents to walk the graph themselves, deciding at each step how to traverse the graph based on the schema and available data.
2. Built-in **ingestion pipelines** for multi-modal data.
3. Built-in **embedding-models** bringing immediate structure to your knowledge graph.

To get setup, follow the guide in our README:\
[HelixDB Github](https://github.com/helixdb/helix-db)

# 🙏🏻 Our Ask

* Can you introduce us to people/companies that are working on Graph/Hybrid RAG that could benefit from better performance or less overhead in their development cycles? Get them to [book a call](https://cal.com/georgec/30min) or email [george@helix-db.com](https://mailto:george@helix-db.com)
* If you have a Github account, then [give us a star 🌟](https://github.com/HelixDB/helix-db)

Your help and support makes a huge difference for this project. **Thank you!**

name: Zeon Systems
one_liner: AI-powered robotics for scientific lab automation.
long_description:
We’re building AI-powered systems that automate manual work in scientific labs using robotics.

Scientists simply type their experiment in plain English. Zeon translates it into code and runs it on robotic arms (no coding required).

By controlling robots with natural language, we’re enabling automation for every lab, every scientist, and every experiment.

Zeon is lab-aware. It detects equipment, adapts to protocols, and moves autonomously between instruments to execute full workflows.

We’re already working with labs at Stanford and UCSF to accelerate discovery - from running overnight nanoparticle fluorescence measurements to safely disposing of hundreds of bacterial samples. 

Zeon reclaims time for what matters most: the science.

launches.title: Zeon Systems: AI-powered robotics for lab automation 🧪
launches.body:
Hey everyone 👋

We’re [Brontë](https://www.linkedin.com/in/bronte-kolar/) and [Tahir](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tahirdme/) – co-founders of [Zeon Systems](https://www.zeonsystems.ai/). We’re on a mission to make science move at the speed of thought.

# **TL;DR**

**We turn natural language into lab automation.** Scientists type their experiment in English. Our software programs robots to execute it.\
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x-jid99QPFA>

# **Problem**

The biggest scientific breakthroughs -- _think Selman Waksman mining microbes for antibiotics or Akira Yoshino testing early lithium-ion batteries_ _at Sony_ -- started in labs through painful, manual work. **Decades later, discovery still relies on pipetting, weighing, and prepping by hand.**

It’s inefficient, exhausting, and slows down discovery. Automation solutions exist, but are often **$$$** or built for **specific use cases**. 

We want to change that.

# **Our Take**

What if you could run an experiment by just typing it out? 

That’s what we’re building for: **automation that’s usable by everyday scientists.**

# **The Zeon System 🦾**

We sell a hardware + software system that runs lab experiments using off-the-shelf robotics. **Labs receive a ready-to-run automation setup** that includes:

* Our AI-powered software
* 2 off-the-shelf robotics arms with mounted depth cameras

_How it works:_

* Scientists describe protocols in plain English
* Zeon interprets them, detects lab tools using computer vision, and plans the execution
* The system generates and executes robotic code in real-time, adapting to the specific lab environment

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=89951&key=user_uploads/379901/f18d8421-74dc-4213-8f17-a91419504529)

# **What’s Possible**

We are already piloting with labs at UCSF and Stanford to:

* Run fluorescence screens for nanoparticles overnight
* Automate multichannel pipetting for clinical assays
* Dispose of biohazardous waste while researchers sleep

# **Big Picture**

Eventually, we want to **enable labs that run themselves**. Think self-driving labs on Mars or in the middle of the ocean doing science while humans dream. 🪐 🧪🧬

# **The Team**

[Brontë](https://www.linkedin.com/in/bronte-kolar/) built electronic systems for electric aircraft and high-density battery packs before pivoting to computational biology research at UCSF, UC Berkeley, and Erasmus Medical Center. 

[Tahir](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tahirdme/) has been building software and ML for science labs basically all his adult life, doing computational research at IIT, Yale and working in biotech and pharma across India and the US.

# 

# **Our Ask**

We are looking for **pilot partners** interested in deploying our system in their labs! 

* **Know a scientific lab or company that should work with us?** → Email us at [founders@zeonsystems.ai](mailto:founders@zeonsystems.ai) 
* **Resonate with our message?** → Share this post (or our [promo video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x-jid99QPFA))

—

[_Let’s make science move faster._](https://www.zeonsystems.ai/)

\-Brontë + Tahir

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=89951&key=user_uploads/379901/3896ab4e-84de-4bfd-ad2e-7fd6f0462be3)
launches.tagline: We turn natural language into real-time lab automation.

https://youtu.be/1dwgU3zQz3k

Online credit card payments are expensive and rife with fraud. Fees account for 3+% of transaction volume, and high-ticket items account for more than a third of the 100 million annual chargebacks in the US.

**With Zenobia Pay, payments cost only 1%, clear instantly, and are protected with a fraud chargeback guarantee**. Customers link their bank to their own hardware, where it’s stored locally in a secure enclave. Merchant sites never see sensitive tokens or account numbers.

Founders Theodore Li and Ryan Prendergast started Zenobia Pay with a mission to make it 3x cheaper to transact online, bypassing the senselessly high credit card interchange fees that aren’t normal anywhere outside the US.

If you sell goods online for >$200 and want to 3x lower your fees, email us at [merchants@zenobiapay.com](mailto:merchants@zenobiapay.com). View our site at [zenobiapay.com](https://zenobiapay.com/)

launches.title: Kaelio: The AI analytics copilot for healthcare organizations
launches.body:
Hey everyone! We’re[ Luca](https://www.linkedin.com/in/luca-martial/) and[ Andrey](https://www.linkedin.com/in/andreyavtomonov/), the cofounders of[ Kaelio](https://kaelio.com/).

**TL;DR**: Healthcare organizations are drowning in dashboards they can't act on - or worse, flying blind because they lack the resources. Kaelio unifies clinical, operational, and financial data for hospitals, health systems, and health plans - giving them an AI copilot that answers business-critical questions, flags operational risks, and recommends actions to improve clinical outcomes and financial performance. We’re currently onboarding our first customers.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rBqZDSekjbo

# The Problem

Healthcare organizations are sitting on a goldmine of data from EHRs, finance, procurement, staffing, and many more systems. But most of it stays locked away in silos: disconnected, messy, and hard to use.

Decision-makers face two constant struggles: they’re either (1) drowning in dashboards they can’t tactically act on, or (2) flying blind because they don’t have the resources to analyze that data.

Simple, but critical questions like:

* “What was our referral leakage rate in March?”
* “Are claim denial rates within target thresholds?”
* “How are our readmission rates trending this month?”

often take days or weeks to answer. Sometimes, they never get answered at all.

This leads to missed financial opportunities, operational inefficiencies, and worse patient outcomes. Hiring teams of analysts is expensive. Waiting for consultants is too slow. Yet the need for fast, reliable insights is greater than ever.

# **Our Solution**

Kaelio acts as a personal analyst copilot for healthcare decision-makers. Ask questions in plain-English and get answers in seconds. Features:

* **Unified Data Platform**: We connect to clinical, financial, and operational systems to centralize and harmonize data.
* **Natural Language Interface**: Users simply ask “How much did we spend on contract staff last month?” and Kaelio delivers the answer immediately.
* **Proactive Alerts & Recommendations**: Kaelio does not wait to be asked. It monitors key metrics and alerts decision-makers before problems escalate.

# **Team**

* [Luca](https://www.linkedin.com/in/luca-martial/) (CEO) - MPH, previously built NLP systems deployed at Kaiser Permanente, Mount Sinai, Providence and other large health systems.
* [Andrey](https://www.linkedin.com/in/andreyavtomonov/) (CTO) - previously founded an AI safety & security startup, built software at CERN and was among the first engineers at Dataiku.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90517&key=user_uploads/765285/c11ba573-f8ea-482d-8aa2-73f075b2c309)

# **Ask**

We’re working with forward-thinking hospitals, health systems and health plans feeling like they’re drowning in dashboards that fail to inform day-to-day decisions - or simply lacking the resources to leverage their data. If that sounds familiar, we'd love to talk.

Visit[ https://kaelio.com/](https://kaelio.com/) or reach out to [luca@kaelio.com](mailto:luca@kaelio.com)

_Because healthcare decisions shouldn’t be guesswork._
launches.tagline: We turn scattered healthcare data into clear, actionable insights, without relying on analysts.

name: Beluga Labs
one_liner: Rippling for content creators
long_description:
The rapidly growing creator economy ($250B+) consists of millions of solo entrepreneurs still managing complex business finances with spreadsheets and a patchwork of disconnected tools. They face volatile multi-source income, unique business expenses, and daunting U.S. tax obligations: leading to significant stress, lost time, and missed financial opportunities.

Beluga Labs is building the financial operating system for these modern solopreneurs. Our platform starts with intelligent bookkeeping: we connect all their financial accounts, use AI to automatically categorize income and expenses, and assess their potential tax deductibility, giving creators a clear picture of their business finances and tax preparedness. This core solution, already actively used for expense management and tax Q&A, is the first step. We will rapidly expand to automate quarterly tax filing and payments, then provide integrated tools for S-corp formation and management, payroll, and benefits: truly becoming the 'Rippling for content creators.' Our success means creators save more money, reduce administrative burdens, and can confidently focus on their craft and growth within the creator economy.

# **Things can only get better. 📈**

Hey, we’re [Marcus](https://www.linkedin.com/in/marcus-storm-mollard-a0514aa1/) and [Alex](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alex-usher/) at ◮ [Clarm](https://clarm.com?utm_source=yc&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=launch_yc&utm_id=1). # **Problem ❌**

Deep research agents could replace much of white-collar work, but companies can't deploy them because they lack trust in the data sources and control over the reasoning process. Legal and Compliance teams block adoption because existing AI tools make things up.

# **Solution 💡**

[Clarm](https://clarm.com?utm_source=yc&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=launch_yc&utm_id=1) is your AI deep research agent builder for high-trust environments. Our platform connects across 40+ enterprise integrations - CRMs, email, knowledge bases - and lets you build precise, repeatable workflows that transform how teams work without the risk.

We’d love to hear from you! Get in touch at [marcus@clarm.com](mailto:marcus@clarm.com). **Thank you.**

launches.title: Sim Studio: UI to Build AI Agents
launches.body:
**_TL;DR_** [Sim Studio](https://www.simstudio.ai/) is an [open-source](https://github.com/simstudioai/sim) interface to build and deploy AI agent workflows.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90127&key=user_uploads/2320005/bcf7b4e1-6692-455c-932a-8f2047d2b652)

Our Figma-like canvas allows users to drag-and-drop connect LLMs to their favorite tools (Slack, Supabase, Pinecone, Gmail). Check out our launch video 👇

<https://youtu.be/EAAMNXRYncY>

**Key Features**

* 🤖 Build **Agents** that connect with any of your tools
* 🚀 **Deploy** your workflow as a chat or an API
* 💡 Quickly iterate and optimize your agents **visually**

**The Problem**

Agent frameworks require learning and extensive boilerplate code, and existing visual interfaces abstract most of the customization required for complex agent workflows.

**Our Solution**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90127&key=user_uploads/2320005/2d40df0f-fe2f-4c01-bbbb-1fa207339a81)

**Sim Studio** is a lightweight, user-friendly platform to build, test, and deploy AI agents in minutes. You can design the entire agent architecture, with a variety of models (hosted and local via Ollama), tools with granular tool use control, and structured output.

You can trigger the workflows manually, deploy as an **API**, or **schedule** the workflows to run periodically. They can also be set to trigger on incoming **webhooks** (e.g., [Slack messages](https://docs.simstudio.ai/tools/slack)) and deployed as standalone chat instances.

**Get an Agent Demo for Your Use Case**

[**Request a call**](https://form.typeform.com/to/jqCO12pF) to watch us build an AI agent for your company in minutes.
launches.tagline: The fastest way to build AI agent workflows for production

launches.title: Stratify - The AI User Researcher
launches.body:
Hey everyone! We’re [Siddhartha](https://www.linkedin.com/in/siddhartha-javvaji-23b81617a) and [Pratham](https://www.linkedin.com/in/prathamhombal/), co-founders of [Stratify](https://www.trystratify.com) and we’re saving companies millions by helping them understand their users better.

# **TL;DR**

Failing to understand _what_ your users truly want can kill a company. Stratify uses AI agentic workflows to instantly recruit participants, conduct dynamic user interviews, analyze responses, and provide actionable feedback. With simple queries like "What do users think of our new checkout flow?" or “Which prototype resonates most with users?”, Stratify delivers authentic customer feedback within a few hours.

[Stratify Launch Video](https://youtu.be/j0Py7pKyuy4)

---

# **🤦‍♂️ The User Research Problem**

**Here's the brutal truth**: 90% of product failures happen because teams don't truly understand their users. You can’t really blame them because traditional user research **is broken**:

1. **💸 Focus groups are expensive:** $15K+ for 8 people in a room for 2 hours. Half of them drop out last minute, and you're left wondering if these insights represent your actual users.
2. **📅 Manual interviews take weeks:** Booking user interviews feels like herding cats. Calendars stay empty for weeks while your launch deadline approaches. And big ideas _cannot_ wait.
3. **📝 Surveys are unresponsive and impersonal:** Generic forms with dropdown menus can't capture the _why_ behind user behavior. You get some data, but absolutely no story.

**The result?** Teams ship based on assumptions, not insights. Features flop. Users churn. Millions of dollars wasted.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90668&key=user_uploads/2549216/0e975083-d540-4aed-91ac-ea337164777b)

---

# **✨ Introducing Stratify**

What if you could ask "What do users think of our new product?" and get answers from hundreds of real users in under a few hours? That's exactly what Stratify does.

1. **🚀 Define your Research Questions:**

   Simply describe what you want to learn about your product or upload product materials: _"How do millennials feel about our pricing?"_ Our vetted AI researcher transforms your query into a comprehensive study framework in seconds.
2. **🎯 Smart Participant Matching:**

   Set demographic and behavioral parameters or simply specify a query like "U.S., Gen Z, Online Shopper, Foodie". Our AI automatically finds the perfect participants from our network of millions of real users or directly within your own company’s customers.
3. **🎥 Uncover Real Insights:**

   Watch our AI agents conduct hundreds of interviews simultaneously, asking follow-up questions that dynamically adapt to each participant’s unique responses. Uncover the _why_ behind user behaviors that surveys and focus groups miss completely.
4. **🧠 Instant Analysis:**

   Transform hours of interview content into actionable intelligence instantly. Search conversations semantically, generate reports and slides presentations, or simply chat with your data to find exactly what you need to know.

---

---

# **🎉 Our Ask**

launches.title: YouLearn - An AI tutor personalized to each student
launches.body:
Hey everyone! We’re [Achyut](https://www.linkedin.com/in/achyut-byanjankar/), [David](https://www.linkedin.com/in/david-yu-871202244/), and [Soami](https://www.linkedin.com/in/soamikapadia/) from [YouLearn](https://www.youlearn.ai/).

# **TL;DR**

YouLearn is an AI tutor personalized to each student. In the last **eight months**, we’ve grown from **$1K to $70K MRR**, with **150,000 monthly active users**, by providing concise notes, an AI tutor you can talk to, and personalized tests based on your learning materials.

https://youtu.be/wVkQXY49JiE

# **📍 How we started**

We met two weeks into college and started hacking on projects in our dorm. By sophomore year, we were fed up with watching **long, outdated lecture videos** and reading **dense textbooks**, only to forget a few days later. Generic AI tools gave **quick answers**, but those shortcuts left us with only **surface-level understanding**. We kept **cramming before exams**, forgetting most of it soon after, and repeating the same cycle.

# **💻 What we built**

Out of that frustration, we built **YouLearn**. Upload any learning material, and YouLearn turns it into **clear notes**, an **AI tutor** that walks you through the topic, and **adaptive quizzes** to help you remember. Learning is now **faster, easier, and more memorable.**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90256&key=user_uploads/1378551/166ca331-2283-486c-a7a4-074ae4ea4c86)

# **🧑‍🎓 Why students choose YouLearn**

* **Designed by students, for students:** As recent undergrads, we lived the stress of college life, so we built YouLearn’s AI tutor and quizzes to solve these challenges.
* **Everything in one place:** One upload instantly delivers notes, an AI tutor, and quizzes. No more bouncing between ChatGPT, Quizlet, Notion, etc.
* **Made for exam success:** Take practice tests with full answer breakdowns, track your progress, and pinpoint your weak spots (e.g, “Review Page 42, paragraph 1”).

# **📚 Building a better way to study**

Today, over **150,000 students use YouLearn each month** to study smarter, with more than **2.2 million+ learning materials uploaded.** One med student told us he didn’t think AI could do this until he started **acing exams with perfect scores** across multiple courses. His friend jumped from **60% to 90%** using YouLearn, and now **four of his classmates have upgraded**. As he puts it:

> I got better grades than people that went to class. Because literally for me, it's my tutor.

This is just the start. We believe **every student will have a personal AI tutor**, and we’re building the one they’ll never want to miss a class on.

# **🙏 Our ask**

If you're a student or learning something new, try [YouLearn](https://www.youlearn.ai/) and share your feedback at [founders@youlearn.ai](mailto:founders@youlearn.ai) :)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90256&key=user_uploads/1378551/18df7d7a-a9b5-4b1a-8c1b-aeeba480dab8)

launches.title: VibeGrade: AI Grading for Teachers—right inside Google Classroom and Canvas 🧑‍🏫
launches.body:
**❌ Grading Sucks.**

Teachers often spend hours of their own time grading hundreds of papers, which often leads to rushed and generic feedback for students.

**💡 AI that grades like you, where you do.**

[VibeGrade](https://vibegrade.com) works directly in Google Classroom, Google Docs, or Canvas, to grade papers just like you, but 10x faster, with AI.

<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ihBGHybIi48>

Just like a teacher, it reads the paper and uses your rubric to annotate specific areas of the essay…

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=89694&key=user_uploads/1435004/f23f2441-f895-4e18-b5dd-3cde3fac67c6)

…and attach a full grade breakdown, with scores and feedback for each category

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=89694&key=user_uploads/1435004/a368a90f-f834-4055-913b-d38da3b720b2)

**⏰ VibeGrade has already saved teachers 500+ school days of manual grading across 12,000 essays!**

And since we keep the teacher in the loop, we learn from their style so students get feedback that actually helps them improve, not AI slop.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=89694&key=user_uploads/1435004/bb98af8d-e5cd-48a9-bbbc-c7a73cdc05a7)

**The Team:** We're two teenage dropouts—Daniel from high school, Musa from college—dedicated to building this to help teachers!

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=89694&key=user_uploads/1435004/f8258f40-3bde-4fba-a2ed-a89c956d3aca)

Musa (left) and Daniel (right) met in high school and we constantly saw our own teachers overworked grading hundreds of papers. We noticed our teacher used Scantron for multiple choice questions, but there was nothing to help her grade written work.

We kept seeing tools that totally missed the mark, shifting the workload from downloading/uploading and copy pasting feedback, so we decided to bring AI into the LMS.

We don’t replace teachers. We help you, help your students :)

**🙏 Our ask:** If you answer “yes” to any of these, we’d love your help!

* Do you know any teachers who grade a lot of written work?
* Can you intro us to any elementary, middle, or high schools?

**Contact us at** [**daniel@vibegrade.com**](mailto:daniel@vibegrade.com) **and** [**share our website!**](https://vibegrade.com)

Our mission is to make education better for everyone, so your help can make a huge difference.

**Thank you!**

name: Percival
one_liner: Automating data entry with AI
long_description:
Percival helps wholesalers and  distributors automate data entry by using AI to process documents like purchase orders and price lists. 

When wholesalers and distributors sell to other businesses, they often receive purchase orders as PDFs over email. Customers frequently use different identifiers for items, different units, and close but not quite the same descriptors. Employees aren't just copy-pasting (or manually typing) PDF data into an ERP, they have to validate every item in the ERP.

With Percival, businesses can just email customer POs and other requests to a dedicated @percivaltech.com email address. Once the request is handled, Percival responds to the email with the result: whether that's an order number in the ERP or a list of prices.

launches.title: Mbodi AI- Embodied AI for Industrial Robotics
launches.body:
Hey friends [👋](https://emojipedia.org/waving-hand)

This is [Xavier](https://www.linkedin.com/in/xavierchi/) and [Sebastian](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sebbyjp/) - Co-Founders of Mbodi AI, and we are making robots learn like humans.

# **TL;DR**

**We’re building an embodied AI platform that lets anyone teach robots new skills — just by talking to them.** No code. No engineers. No week-long reprogram. Mbodi turns natural language and quick demos into precise, reliable robot actions that run in production in minutes, and adapt as often as you need.

We are now rolling out real-world deployments to customers with a joint commercialization partner, [ABB](https://new.abb.com/products/robotics), the world’s leading robot manufacturer.

https://youtu.be/CwRxP3_F9MA

# 🚨 **The Problem**

Manufacturing is facing a critical inflection point.

**Labor crisis:** Labor accounts for nearly half of global GDP ($40+ trillion), but over 70% of factories face severe labor shortages.

**Flexibility gap:** Traditional robots require week-long reprogramming by engineers or specialists every time things change.

**Untapped automation potential:** Hundreds of billions of dollars in manufacturing tasks, especially those with high variation, remain out of reach for automation because robots can’t adapt fast enough.

This mismatch, between inflexible robots and ever-shifting production needs, leaves a massive automation gap across global manufacturing. We simply need robots to be more **versatile**. It wasn’t quite possible — **until now**.

# **🧠 How Mbodi AI Helps**

Mbodi is an embodied AI platform that makes robots learn like humans, with natural language. So anyone can teach robots new skills by talking to them and execute the learned skills reliably in production, in minutes.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90633&key=user_uploads/1111983/cd7897e7-4fc9-4137-8c3d-2b6fe0b487bb)

We’ve built a cloud-to-edge system that takes your instructions, understands the environment, makes a plan, and turns it into precise, safe robot actions. All within a second. Our universal agent framework can run across any robotic hardware, coordinating perception, reasoning, planning, and control in real time.

* 🕐 No week-long reprograms
* 👷‍♂️ No on-site engineers
* 🗣️ Just say what you want done
* 🏭 Run reliably in production

When one robot learns something, the entire fleet does. Individual skills can be reused, repurposed, and adapted instantly — across machines, factories, and tasks.

# 🚀 **What’s Happening**

We’re moving toward real-world deployments after entering a joint commercialization agreement with ABB Robotics, one of the world’s leading robot manufacturers, following our win in their global AI Startup Challenge from among hundreds. This represents a first-of-its-kind system in industrial automation.

We’re building toward a world where robots are as easy to teach and adapt as software — turning them into true consumer commodities and making automation accessible to every factory and beyond.

# 📣 **Our Ask**

If you're a **manufacturer**, **system integrator**, or **robot maker** exploring more flexible and intelligent automation, we’d love to connect and solve automation challenges that were previously out of reach.

Reach us at: [**founders@mbodi.ai**](mailto:founders@mbodi.ai)

We’re also strong advocates of the open-source community. We open-sourced one of our libraries, [embodied-agents](https://github.com/mbodiai/embodied-agents), to enable seamless integration of transformer models into robotics stacks, with more open-source projects coming in the future.

# 👥 **The Team**

[Xavier (Tianhao) Chi](https://www.linkedin.com/in/xavierchi/) is a former tech lead of Google Public DNS (8.8.8.8), one of the world’s most critical internet services, with work featured in[ The Register](https://www.theregister.com/2023/01/19/google_dns_queries/) and topping[ Hacker News](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39960125). He holds bachelor's and master's degrees in ECE from UIUC.

[Sebastian Peralta](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sebbyjp/) is a physicist, roboticist, and deep learning researcher. Before Mbodi, he was a core engineer at Google Public DNS (8.8.8.8), and earned a triple major (EE, CS, Physics) from UPenn, where he also conducted graduate research at the GRASP Robotics Lab.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90633&key=user_uploads/1111983/87381bac-5704-43f6-9fa3-1796b4af0f53)

We started Mbodi after seeing robots fall short of their potential — stuck in brittle code and long deployment cycles. With breakthroughs in generative AI and agentic systems, we’re building a future where robots can truly learn, adapt, and scale.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90633&key=user_uploads/1111983/447ef918-87d3-4a90-a120-04274434878f)

launches.title: Kirana AI: Full-Stack AI Store Manager
launches.body:
Prateek and I are building a new full-stack manager for grocery stores. Growing up, in the summers I worked at my family's grocery store, and saw first hand the challenges my father went through on a day to day basis. My family's store was started over 100 years ago, and with this industry experience, Prateek and I are able to offer new insights.\
[Overview](https://youtu.be/VEAZGZZ4_RU) \
**The Problem: Operating an independent grocery store means surviving on razor-thin margins.**

* 3 % of sales vanish due to shrinkage.
* Out of stocks wipe out 4% more in lost sales
* Slip-and-fall hazards lead to liability risks.
* These slim margins prevent grocers from hiring back office staff.

**What We Built-**

* 24/7 Theft Detection – Real-time alerts when someone crosses the “no-go” zones behind registers or swipes merchandise.
* Safety Monitoring – Automatic slip-and-fall hazard spotting so you can fix risks before they become claims.
* Shelf & Stock Insights – Instant out-of-stock notifications to keep product levels optimized.
* Pricing Research - Soon we will introduce an agentic workflow to manage one of grocers' most tedious tasks, looking up competitors prices.

**Our Team-**

* Nic Sleeper, CEO – Former SWE at PredictionStrike.
* Prateek Pinisetti, CTO – Ex-Optiver SWE and chess National Master; real-time systems expert.
* We met as Harvard roommates, did psets together in our dorm, and have been collaborating ever since.

\*\*The Vision-\*\*\
We chose to work in this space to help local grocers thrive in the AI age and be on the forefront of innovation. Our cameras are just the first step- by combining POS, ordering, and camera data, we can automate every back-office process in the store, allowing them to achieve their optimal margins.\
\*\*Our Ask-\*\*\
If you know any grocery or retail store owners who’d love a tireless 24/7 assistant to cut shrink, boost safety, and maximize sales, please loop us in!

launches.title: Caucus – The Last Piece of Software for the American Government
launches.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oeSgstuYYwQ

**_We’re building general purpose AI agents for our government, starting with Congress. Our vision is simple: a future where public servants work at the speed of thought, empowered by a system that understands their workflows, integrates with all their tools, and eliminates the friction of fragmented software._**

### **❌ The Problem**

Government work is critical for our country, but across federal, state, and local agencies, it’s being slowed to a crawl by outdated software, siloed systems, and manual processes. Every day, public servants spend hours on repetitive, low-leverage tasks: retyping information across systems, routing emails between departments, tracking sentiment in spreadsheets, and responding to routine inquiries in Word docs. The tools they rely on rarely integrate. Critical data is fragmented. When someone calls about a missing VA check or a passport delay, staffers often re-enter the same information multiple times, and real help can take days or even weeks to arrive

This isn't just inefficiency. It is a **_failure_** at scale. And it’s because no software truly wraps around the way government employees work.

### **💡 The Solution**

**Caucus is the last piece of software government workers will ever need.**

We’re building general purpose AI agents that integrate across the tools and workflows government employees already use, starting with congressional offices. This won’t just increase government efficiency, but it will empower a more responsive government, better connecting Americans to the services and representation they deserve. Our goal is to become _the last piece of software the American government will ever need._

### **🧠 Why Now**

Government employees are under immense pressure: workloads are growing, staffing levels are stretched thin, and the demands of modern governance are becoming more dynamic and fast moving.

We’re not building another CRM. We're building Cursor for government, where AI agents are the connective tissue between humans and every app they use.

### **📖 Our Story**

We started Caucus after seeing the everyday chaos inside congressional offices. Despite their best efforts, staffers are buried in busywork, slowed down by tools that don’t serve them. [Amir](https://www.linkedin.com/in/theamirfarahani/) built and sold Turbo Legi, an AI platform for legislative solutions, to FiscalNote (NYSE: NOTE) before finishing undergrad. [Tyler](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tyler-chen-43570b241/), a Yale Physics + CS student, brought technical firepower from machine learning labs, quantum computing research, and building AI voice tools for a series D startup. Amir and Tyler grew up together and have known each other their entire lives, since kindergarten and toddlerhood. Years later, Amir pitched Tyler the vision for Caucus while he was still at Yale, and they’ve been building it together ever since

No one was building the last mile of software for the people who keep our government running. 

**_So we are._**

### **❓FAQ**

**Who is Caucus for?**\
Government employees: starting with congressional offices and soon expanding across agencies, departments, and local governments.

**What does it do?**\
Caucus embeds AI agents into every government workflow.

**How is this different from existing government software?**\
Caucus _isn’t_ software in the traditional sense. It’s the connective layer across all software, a general purpose agent that works with the tools you already use, at the moment you need them, without disrupting your workflow. Think: Cursor, but for the government.

**What does the Congressional product do?**\
The Congressional product is an AI platform purpose built for House and Senate offices. It automates constituent communication and casework through website chatbots and phone based voice agents that answer policy questions, collect casework details (including signed privacy forms), and route structured summaries to staff. We are cutting down the time it takes to help constituents from over a week to minutes. A secure dashboard surfaces real-time trends and constituent sentiment. By handling repetitive tasks instantly and accurately, Caucus empowers staffers to focus on complex casework and legislative priorities, without requiring any changes to their existing workflows.

**Can Caucus help with federal, state, and local governments?**\
Absolutely. While we are starting with congressional offices, Caucus is built to scale across agencies, federal, state, and local governments. Whether it's a city council or a federal agency, we’re making it easier for government employees at all levels to serve our country more effectively.

### **🤝 Our Ask**

Know anyone in our government? Especially congressional staffers, agency employees, or department heads? We’re actively onboarding and would love introductions.

Drop me a line at [amir@usecaucus.com](mailto:amir@usecaucus.com), check us out at [www.getcaucus.com](http://www.getcaucus.com), or visit[ www.usecaucus.com](http://www.usecaucus.com) for our congressional products.

**Let’s build the last piece of software the American government will ever need.**

name: PgDog
one_liner: Scale PostgreSQL with automatic sharding.
long_description:
PgDog is an application for sharding PostgreSQL. It understands SQL and can distribute queries automatically between databases. It's built for managed databases, like AWS RDS, and doesn't require any changes to application code or schema.

In addition to sharding, PgDog is a load balancer and pooler, so it can act as a replacement for PgBouncer, RDS Proxy, and other Postgres scaling products. It brings the simplicity and performance of HTTP load balancing to the database.

Built from the experience of sharding Postgres at Instacart during peak growth in 2020, PgDog is the answer to the old question: does Postgres scale? It does now.

launches.title: PgDog: Scaling PostgreSQL
launches.body:
Hey YC,

I’m Lev and I invented time travel… for your database.

“Huh?”

**TLDR:** PgDog is a proxy for scaling PostgreSQL. It can load balance traffic and shard databases, without changes to app code or using database extensions. What does this have to do with time travel? Keep reading.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=trSVJel3gyc

# ❌ The Problem

Scaling Postgres is a full time job. Your app is writing data but the database can’t keep up. You’re adding more databases and thinking of breaking the app into services to spread the load.

PgDog is for you if:

* You had an outage caused by a bad query
* Your database is unpredictable; app latency and uptime are all over the place
* You know more about Postgres internals (like vacuum) than you’d like, and you just want it to work so you can go back to building your product

And you catch yourself day dreaming about the good old days, when you were pre-PMF and your DB was at 10% CPU.

# 👷 The Solution

Database problems should be solved at the database layer. PgDog is a load balancer, connection pooler, bouncer, and sharder. It speaks fluent SQL and understands every single Postgres query. It uses this knowledge to:

* Distribute queries between shards, horizontally scaling your relational database
* Load balance traffic between replicas
* Block or rewrite queries you don’t like, e.g. queries that forgot an index or are missing the customer_id and were about to leak data

With PgDog, your DB is young again and ready to grow 10x. Written in Rust, for security and performance, PgDog is fully tested and ready for production.

# 🙏 The Ask

If any of this sounds familiar, **get in touch!** I’m happy to come work for you to fix your DB. I’ll stay in the basement and make PgDog scale Postgres, while you work on your startup.

You’re my ideal design partner if:

* Postgres is your production database (naturally)
* Despite your troubles, you love it and want to do more with it
* You believe in first principles solutions to hard problems

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90596&key=user_uploads/989617/91f087f7-4175-47fe-9753-57ed4e9bda62)

Email [lev@pgdog.dev](mailto:lev@pgdog.dev), join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/CcBZkjSJdd), and give us a star on [GitHub](https://github.com/pgdogdev/pgdog). Everything we build is open source.

# 👬 The Team

I’m a second time technical founder (previously co-founded [PostgresML](https://github.com/postgresml/postgresml)) and started the Instacart storage infra team. I scaled 100TB+ databases when Instacart grew 5x in 3 months. This is my second pet-inspired project for scaling Postgres (have you heard of [pgcat](https://github.com/postgresml/pgcat)?)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90596&key=user_uploads/989617/86ff8181-b991-4bf9-bd05-8b0a387ed978)

name: Attune
one_liner: Faster builds, zero effort.
long_description:
Attune makes blazingly fast build tools that require zero migration effort.

As AI enables developers to write code faster than ever, slow builds are increasingly becoming the bottleneck in development velocity. Developers regularly lose hours of productivity every day waiting for their builds. Imagine being able to write code in 1 minute, but needing to wait 30 minutes to compile, deploy, and test it.

Existing solutions either require painful migrations to new tools (e.g. Bazel) or rely on just using bigger servers to run your builds. Instead, we do native, first-class integrations into compilers and build systems.

With Attune, you don't need to integrate a new tool. Just make a one-line change from `cargo build` to `hurry cargo build` for 20x faster builds.

Eliza (ex-Google) and Xin worked together for 3 years at FOSSA, where Eliza was Head of Engineering and Xin was Head of Product. Eliza brings a decade of programming languages and build systems expertise, while Xin brings a decade of experience building developer tools products, most recently as VP of Product at Teleport (S15). Having experienced the pain of slow builds firsthand across hundreds of production codebases, we're building the solution we've always wanted.

launches.title: Attune - Faster Builds, Zero Effort
launches.body:
Hey everyone, we’re Eliza and Xin, cofounders of Attune.

# ⚡️ TL;DR

Attune makes blazingly fast build tools that require zero migration effort. Built by developers with a decade of experience in build systems and developer tools.

If you or someone you know is suffering from slow builds, we’d love to help! 

Contact us at [founders@attunehq.com](mailto:founders@attunehq.com).

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90363&key=user_uploads/429685/31b348ca-dc4a-4649-8886-fc28ed78e37a)

# ❌ The Problem

As AI enables developers to write code faster than ever, slow builds are increasingly becoming the bottleneck in development velocity. Developers regularly lose hours of productivity every day waiting for their builds. Imagine being able to write code in 1 minute, but needing to wait 30 minutes to compile, deploy, and test it.

Existing solutions either require painful migrations to new tools (e.g. Bazel) or rely on just using bigger servers to run your builds.

# ✅ Our Solution

We’re building drop-in replacements for existing build tools that dramatically speed up build times with zero migration effort. Simply prefix your existing build commands with hurry and get faster builds through incremental caching, remote execution, distributed caching, and a whole suite of other language-native and compiler-native optimizations.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DxM5Dj6ikVc

For example, instead of running cargo build, now you can run hurry cargo build for up to 20x faster builds.

That's it. No migration headaches, no complex configuration, and no learning a new tool and rewriting your build files.

Now available for Rust, with Docker and additional language support launching soon.

# 👷‍♀️👷‍♂️Our Team

Eliza (ex-Google) and Xin worked together for 3 years at FOSSA helping customers analyze and secure their build systems. Eliza was Head of Engineering and Xin was Head of Product. Eliza brings a decade of programming languages and build systems expertise, while Xin brings a decade of experience building developer tools products, most recently as VP of Product at Teleport (S15). We’ve seen the pain of slow builds firsthand across hundreds of production codebases, we're building the solution we've always wanted.

# 🙏 Our Ask

Tired of waiting on builds? We'd love to show you how much time Attune can save your team.

Reach out to us at [founders@attunehq.com](mailto:founders@attunehq.com).

name: Kestral
one_liner: AI Work Prioritizer that connects customer impact to your work
long_description:
Kestral makes it clear what your customers want most, prioritizes those tasks for highest leverage, and closes the loop with those customers.

We (Brian and Bernard) have been close friends since university, and most recently worked together at Asana, leading AI and Authorization efforts. There we realized AI can completely disrupt the $50B Work Management Market, but it required a fresh start.

What work we even choose to manage in the first place is critical, and the most important insights from customers are silo-ed in sales/CS while R&D gives their best shot at roadmaps meant to deliver impact. Significant requests sit in a backlog, duplicate asks flood the system, months wasted on "strategic investments". We want to bridge this gap.

This message is resonating with heads of sales, heads of product, CEOs, as well as individuals, all trying to make sure the most important things get done, with less wasted effort and more revenue/retention.

Kestral works by automatically take in customer data like sales call transcripts & feature request messages and a team of agents:
1. analyze them for actionable takeaways, deal blockers, and nice to haves
2. consolidate them and manage all the asks with citations
3. prioritize them by impact and frequency to cut through the noise so you can see the biggest opportunities clearly
4. connect them to your existing strategic roadmap so when the work gets done, we can automatically follow back up with your customers and win them over

This is just step one of our mission to revolutionize how work gets done -- starting with what we choose to work on, and hope you follow us along for the ride!

launches.title: Kestral - Your AI Work Prioritizer
launches.body:
Hey YC, we’re [Brian](https://www.linkedin.com/in/brian-y-kim-16b7aa63/) and [Bernard](https://www.linkedin.com/in/xiebernard), and we’re building [Kestral](https://kestral.team/), your AI Work Prioritizer!

**TLDR;** We make it clear what matters most to your customers and your business to guarantee your work has impact. (how? gotta read more)

https://youtu.be/R8Q5qOWRv2I

# **❌ The Problem** 😟

Companies spend too much money on Sales and R&D teams just for them to 🥤**suck🥤** at communicating with each other and this costs millions of dollars in blocked deals, churned customers, and time wasted on irrelevant roadmaps.

There’s gold in customer data in all its forms, yet even the most revered companies we talked to commonly lose sight of blockers and spend hours updating spreadsheets of feature requests.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90532&key=user_uploads/12690/c0a42d49-4b96-4711-b33e-50ebfa2b1d41)

📣 “We have deep anxiety if we’re deploying our product teams appropriately…” - C-Suite @ a Public Company\
📣 “All my calls… in Gong. Feature requests … in Notion. We’ve got Salesforce. Why, in 2025, am I still grepping around for feature requests like a caveman?” - Head of Sales @ a Series B Startup\
📣 “… we’re tracking feature requests on spreadsheets” - GTM @ a Major LLM Provider

Companies KNOW they should do better… but without the right tools, they are:

* Getting outmaneuvered by competitors by failing to adapt to customer trends as they come up
* Wasting hours manually tracking and escalating tasks that end up sitting in a backlog
* Worrying if users will care about their “strategic investments”.

# 💭 📖 **The Solution**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90532&key=user_uploads/12690/7fd4ffb6-0954-4fb8-b661-3063088bae79)

We instantly bridge this divide between customer-facing roles and product development by:

1\. Extracting ALL actionable tasks from a variety of sources (transcripts, Slack/Discord messages, GitHub issues…)

2\. Consolidating duplicate asks and prioritizing them by theme

3\. (optionally syncing to project management platforms like Linear/Notion until we displace them…)

4\. Closing the loop with them, so you go from feature launch to immediate customer engagement & guaranteed impact

**We’re building teams of AI agents that:**

🤖 - understand the context of roles, projects, companies, and customers

🤖 - rank work on various heuristics like opportunity size, effort, and team goals

🤖 - make direct connections between customer asks and R&D’s work

🤖 - personally follow up with users or revitalize the pipeline to guarantee a positive business impact of work

Our technology can also easily transition to save orgs countless hours by eliminating work about work, like updating the state of tasks from meeting transcripts/messages and giving status updates while reprioritizing.

# 🤜💥🤛 **The Team**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90532&key=user_uploads/12690/f58ce5b7-6361-4c95-9035-6fd470b271d3)

(pre-YC vacation together in Jeju)

We’re close friends since college and multiple-time founding members of prior startups. We recently crossed paths at Asana, where Brian was an AI Tech Lead, while Bernie led Enterprise Authorization projects.

We’re leveraging our experience to combine the cutting edge of memory and knowledge base management with AI Agent Permissions for Enterprise to build the future of work.

We fully understand that work management structures are crucial to providing the necessary context for AI to deliver real enterprise value, and we’re not scared of any existing players in this space.

# 💡 The Opportunity

Our mandate is to disrupt the work management industry that has a **$50B TAM**, but we’re starting first by truly understanding and prioritizing what a company works on. As agents get better and commoditized, we aim to be best positioned to help companies get the work done faster.

The existing tools in this space can charge 5-6 figures a year for speculative and limited insights from customers at best, and they don’t even make the connection to R&D’s real work. We can instantly help validate/derisk costly roadmap plans, as well as help companies adapt to their customers’ needs immediately, providing millions in value.

We’re also personally seeing some very large investments (millions) in hiring teams to build internal systems to try to connect impact to work that is still manual at heart. Our partner said that if you’re seeing someone build something painful just for themselves… you’re on to something.

### 🟠 CALLING THE YC COMMUNITY 🧡

We’d love to meet more of you!\
🗣️ In a CRO, Sales, GTM, or Customer Success role, and want your requests prioritized? \
🗣️ Product Leader wanting to validate your strategy and get measurable results?\
🗣️ Building the latest in AI knowledge bases and memory?

Let’s talk!\
\
Would appreciate any **warm intros** to the above as well! We’re looking for partners to grow _with us_ to become the most efficient, most _actually_ customer-centric companies in the world.\
\
Hit us up at [founders@kestral.team](mailto:founders@kestral.team) or book a demo call, even if you’re just a little curious at https://kestral.team

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90532&key=user_uploads/12690/a70b5c3b-593a-4a99-87a0-e8eb5e72e44e)

launches.title: Bluejay - Quality Assurance for AI Voice Agents
launches.body:
**TL;DR:** Bluejay **learns** about your agent, **mimics** your customers, and **simulates** every customer interaction **_BEFORE_** you release your product. With Bluejay, **simulate 1 month of customer interaction in 5 minutes.**

If you are building a voice agent, let us[ run a sanity check](https://cal.com/rohanv) for you.

**Mission:** enable developers to trust their AI voice agents.

**Problem:** We were **sick and tired** of manually call-testing our voice agent 50 times before every release. Turns out, **so was everyone else** building voice agents. 

**Solution:** So, we built a platform that **does 100x the testing we could ever do, in minutes.** From there: fix the bug laundry list, re-run Bluejay’s test suite, and push to prod[.](https://youtu.be/bpWu_0TWIP4)

**Think about it:** SaaS has robust, feature-rich E2E testing platforms, CI/CD, and regression testing. _Why don’t AI voice agents have the same?_

For us, building Bluejay wasn’t a “let’s see if this works” idea. 

It was a no-brainer. 

**Key Features:**

* **Mimic: Hyper-realistic Customer Simulations:** Generate a custom workforce of **digital humans** to test every conversational turn of your voice agent. Our digital humans speak/have varied languages, accents, background noise, tone, delivery, emotion, and vocal punctuation. They’re better at being customers than your real customers…
* **Skywatch: Production Observability:** Another no brainer. Why stop at testing your agents pre-production? We tell you what went wrong with production calls, and how to fix it.
* **Research-backed Evaluation:** Bluejay learns about your agent’s goals, and tells you how close it got to achieving them. And of course, the standard stuff: latency, redundancy, hallucination, tool calls, interruptions, sentiment… anything worth knowing, really.

Voice agents **_need_** automated, scalable testing. And we won’t stop at voice. 

**The Team:**

[Rohan](https://www.linkedin.com/in/rohanvas/) is ex-AWS Bedrock, and went to UChicago studying CS + Econ. He built a profitable SaaS company in college.

[Faraz](https://www.linkedin.com/in/farazmsiddiqi/) is ex-Microsoft Copilot, and did his undergrad/masters in CS at UIUC, where he researched high quality synthetic data generation and context compression for LLMs.

**Do us a solid:**

If you are building voice agents, give us a shot:[ ](https://getbluejay.ai/)[https://getbluejay.ai](https://getbluejay.ai%5B.%5D\(https://getbluejay.ai/\))[.](https://getbluejay.ai/)

Or, book a call here:[ https://cal.com/rohanv.](https://cal.com/rohanv)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90520&key=user_uploads/1376037/a4ba8c15-48ca-4c91-aa17-0a3754baf70f)

launches.title: Better Auth - The Authentication Framework for TypeScript
launches.body:
Hey! 👋 We’re building Better Auth - a comprehensive, framework-agnostic authentication framework for TypeScript. It lets you roll your own auth directly on your backend and database, without relying on 3rd party services. From basic sign-ins to complex enterprise systems all with great DX.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j_HjHmprVOs

Auth has been a pain point for many developers in the TypeScript ecosystem for a while. Other open-source libraries require a lot of additional code for anything beyond basic authentication. So, we set out to build a comprehensive auth library - framework-agnostic, with a robust set of features out of the box, a plugin ecosystem for everything else you might need, and great documentation.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90320&key=user_uploads/1184116/dec3dc74-8395-4d83-b062-c2f3271b8164)

Since launching v1 just 5 months ago:

* **13K+ GitHub stars** and **350K+ monthly npm downloads**
* We've grown into one of the **most influential** and **well-loved** open source projects in the TypeScript ecosystem.
* Used in production by great teams including YC companies and major OSS projects including [folo](https://github.com/RSSNext/Folo), [same](https://same.new/), [dokploy](https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy), [zero](https://github.com/Mail-0/Zero), [onejs](https://github.com/onejs/one) and many more.
* We’re the recommended auth library by **Next.js, Nuxt, Astro**, and other top JS frameworks.
* A thriving community with **5K+ members on Discord,** **7K+ followers on X**, and a growing ecosystem of adjacent libraries built by community members.
* Featured by creators like Theo, Dev Ed and more

To take it further, and after seeing the pain points of our current users, we're building an **infrastructure layer** on top of the framework to extend the library with functionality we can't offer through the framework alone:

* A comprehensive admin dashboard with user management & analytics
* Bot/fraud/abuse detection
* Global session storage
* and more…

To be clear – we’re not building a third-party auth service. Our goal is to make rolling your own auth so ridiculously easy that you’ll never need one.

Get started with the library here: [better-auth.com/docs/installation](http://better-auth.com/docs/installation)

Join the waitlist for infra: http://better-auth.build/

Star the repo: https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth

launches.title: Parsewise: Extract Validated Data from Complex Documents 🔬
launches.body:
Hi everyone, we’re [Max](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mwhofer/) and [Greg](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gergely-csegzi/), and we’re building [Parsewise](https://parsewise.ai/) 👋

👉🏻 Watch the video: https://youtu.be/ZFNH0M6Q3fw

**❌ The Problem**

Business experts waste hours each week on **manual, repetitive data tasks**. Extracting and validating information from complex documents is slow and error-prone. As a result, analytics, benchmarking, and reporting **processes are brittle and expensive**.

**Current AI solutions** like ChatGPT are black boxes that generate **unreliable outputs**. Intelligent document processing tools require technical expertise, resulting in limited productivity gains.

**The data monkey era is over!** We believe that business experts have struggled with complex documents long enough. We 10x their productivity while improving the quality of their outputs.

**✅ The Parsewise Solution**

Parsewise extracts trusted information from complex documents, supported by these core features:

* **End-to-end Traceability**: We trace every single output (text, number, date, etc.) to its exact source and highlight it with bounding boxes. _No more black boxes._
* **Granular Human Control**: Business experts directly review and modify data extraction logic and consistency check strategies. _No more re-prompting._
* **Exhaustive Processing**: Our agents exhaustively parse data, proactively flagging issues. _No more second-guessing._

👉🏻 Parsewise is easy to use: https://youtu.be/69kEn5cYbvA

**💬 What Our Users Are Saying**

_“We have cut the analysis process from weeks to days, and most importantly, we have more confidence in the results than before.”_

* Head of Family Office

_“The processing took a while, but the results are perfect. We ran the same test with Snowflake’s Document AI, and it was frankly disappointing.”_

* Lead Data Analyst at a Large Asset Manager

We have helped **cut week-long processes relying on parsing complex documents into hours**.

**🤝 The Team**

We met studying CS at Oxford University in 2017.

**Max (CEO)**: Ran his first business at 12, founded a data science consultancy next to his PhD, and conducted >20 PE due diligence projects at Bain. BSc, MSc, and PhD in CS and Econ.

**Greg (CTO)**: Built the earliest production AI use cases at Palantir, with top project conversion, working in life sciences and insurance, having been deployed to 6 countries. Ask me about parsing manga-style insurance documents 😉

**🚀 Call to Action: Free a Data Monkey**

We’re **live with pilot customers**, looking to **free more human data monkeys** of their lousy work!

The most relevant industries and teams are:

* Industries: Investment management, reinsurance, life sciences
* Teams: Risk & compliance, analytics, data & AI engineers

Contact us at [founders@parsewise.ai](mailto:founders@parsewise.ai) for more information and a demo.
launches.tagline: Turn complex documents into validated information that business users can trust.

launches.title: The LLM Data Company - Workspace for Evals
launches.body:
[**The LLM Data Company**](https://www.thellmdatacompany.com/) creates tooling to write, version and execute evals for models and agents. We help you measure performance and define rewards for reinforcement learning.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56LpwoPxqjc](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56LpwoPxqjc%5C)

Evaluating model performance is an opaque art and vanilla LLM judges do not provide the necessary signal to measure output quality. Additionally, modern GRPO-style RL techniques offer rapid, generalizable improvements to model performance, but they require well-specified eval datasets to be used as rewards. We help you quickly specify high signal evals across a variety of unstructured tasks with aligned graders, fine-grained rubrics and fast iteration.\
\
Our eval workspace – [**doteval**](https://www.doteval.com/) – offers a Cursor-like experience to edit evals-as-code against our .yaml schema. Version evals across checkpoints, replace manual effort with AI-generated diffs, and compare eval runs on tight-execution loops to align them with your IP. This way, you can confidently determine whether you should upgrade to Claude 4 or stay on Gemini 2.5 Pro, or whether this new 12,000 word prompt actually creates net improvement over that 8,000 word prompt. You can also one-click export the spec to be used as the training set for RL and post-train your own model.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90688&key=user_uploads/2567589/e6c9c568-81ef-4057-bdff-4ad49982f76c)

\
Today, we work with frontier AI teams to benchmark performance for complex model tasks. If you are interested in early access to doteval, need help creating an evaluation dataset, or are trying out GRPO or RFT and want something to quickly train against, please reach out at:\
[**founders@thellmdatacompany.com**](mailto:founders@thellmdatacompany.com)

name: Tinfoil
one_liner: AI that runs on the cloud with the privacy of on-prem
long_description:
Tinfoil makes it easy to make your AI workloads provably private, without changing your code. You get the privacy of on-prem deployments, while running on the cloud.

We’ve built a full-stack platform on top of the latest NVIDIA GPUs offering confidential computing capabilities, meaning that you don’t have to tradeoff performance for privacy. 

Under the hood, we integrate a suite of recent advances in secure hardware technologies, in particular NVIDIA’s confidential compute mode available on Hopper and Blackwell. When combined with Tinfoil’s software stack, companies can prove their security claims rather than relying on unenforceable statements like "trust us, we don’t log your queries.” Tinfoil guarantees that all data always stays private and cannot be accessed by anyone other than the end user — not even by Tinfoil or the cloud provider it’s processed on. 

The founding team combines deep academic and industry experience in security and internet protocols. Tanya was previously a systems engineer at Cloudflare, where she built Internet security protocols used by billions, and contributed to the Workers AI platform. Jules and Sacha recently completed their PhDs at MIT where they worked on secure hardware and privacy-preserving technologies. Jules has also worked at NVIDIA on their confidential computing team. Nate has deep infrastructure experience, starting in high school when he built a mini-CDN that got him an internship at Cloudflare. Tinfoil was born from our personal frustration with the false choice between access to powerful AI and data privacy.

As AI becomes tightly integrated into our lives and business workflows, it will touch an ever increasing amount of sensitive personal and proprietary data. Right now, the only solutions are DPAs, band-aids like PII redaction, or the nuclear option of running everything on-prem. These solutions are not scalable.  By making it easy to deploy provable privacy, Tinfoil promises to unlock significantly deeper AI adoption and integrations, just as TLS on the Internet enabled e-commerce to flourish by securing credit cards on the network.

If OpenAI is creating “God in a box”, we are putting God in a blackbox, so Satan can’t spy.

launches.title: Tinfoil: Verifiable Privacy for Cloud AI
launches.body:
Sending your most sensitive or proprietary data to OpenAI et al?

Sick of deals getting stalled during enterprise or government security reviews?

Hate deploying on various configurations of on-prem infrastructure environments?

Say less ✋

We’re [Tanya](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tanya-verma-130a23124/), [Jules](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jdrean/), [Sacha](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sacha-servan-schreiber-308341305/) and [Nate](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nate-sales/) from[ Tinfoil](https://tinfoil.sh/). What we’re building at Tinfoil sidesteps these concerns because we can host models while guaranteeing zero data access and retention.

We let you run powerful models like Llama, Deepseek R1 on cloud GPUs without you having to trust us – or the cloud provider – with your private data.

Since AI performs better the more context you give it, we think solving AI privacy will unlock more valuable AI applications, just how TLS on the Internet enabled e-commerce to flourish knowing that your credit card info wouldn't be stolen by someone sniffing internet packets.

https://youtu.be/wnwI22qT-QQ

**Who we are**

We come from backgrounds in cryptography, security, and infrastructure. Jules did his PhD in trusted hardware and confidential computing at MIT, and worked with NVIDIA and Microsoft Research on the same, Sacha did his PhD in privacy-preserving cryptography at MIT, Nate worked on privacy tech like Tor, and I (Tanya) was on Cloudflare's cryptography team.

 We were unsatisfied with band-aid techniques like PII redaction (which is actually undesirable in some cases like AI personal assistants) or “pinky promise” security through legal contracts like DPAs. We wanted a real solution that replaced trust with provable security, and addressed our personal frustration with the false choice between exploring cutting-edge AI capabilities and personal privacy.

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcicUJrVGkJrvHFqW2CaNEpGzvSfbjySaAR3k-Q8fbf56JtXg8xAJa5MJrYn-RIdJjFirmZ4khWay_UpV6WhnZKZEE9ApI5HX97jRKGw4mJOTblXrujRY_9xcCvGPL139p2QaKd1g?key=xi6EV3GMAYXvlmorGP948w)

**The magic sauce**

Running models locally or on-prem is an option, but can be expensive and inconvenient. Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) is not practical for LLM inference for the foreseeable future. The next best option is using secure enclaves: a secure environment on the chip that no other software running on the host machine can access. This lets us perform LLM inference in the cloud while being able to prove that no one, not even Tinfoil or the cloud provider, can access the data. And because these security mechanisms are implemented in hardware, there is minimal performance overhead.

Up until recently, secure enclaves were only available on CPUs. But NVIDIA confidential computing recently added these hardware-based capabilities to their latest GPUs, making it possible to run GPU-based workloads in a secure enclave.

Believe it when you see it, but Tinfoil has negligible performance overhead despite the strong security & privacy guarantees.

**Getting Started**

**The best part is you can start using confidential AI chat and inference with Tinfoil today!**

**Try our private chat: [tinfoil.sh/chat](http://tinfoil.sh/chat).**

[**https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FuFszT0_vXk**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FuFszT0_vXk)

**Build with our API:** Drop-in replacement for the OpenAI chat-completions API with Tinfoil

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXfBq_bx4bvZAzdB9BTzMg9KSE8UB2bKQO5uqfF5eoZkEWZFUtlbFnZpeD-m_PwaCVgUWftTt3QDLTW-r84u2dvUEGQ0ddbbQuq082ClI48l2cY4jWX-kWG1G6ZfwjNh8GN-EdAVJg?key=xi6EV3GMAYXvlmorGP948w)

We support several popular open source models like Deepseek R1 70B, Llama3.3 70B, Mistral 3.1 24B. Missing your favorite model? Just ask us to add it!

Try out our free version running Llama3.3 70B in [Colab](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1DhpUSmSWjxERnEo3U0qyAyApfcdIhvMv?usp=sharing).

See how Nate psychoanalyzes himself by sending all his iMessage chats to Tinfoil!

https://www.loom.com/share/2381c02ba51043528c6d3bdf61270bc0?sid=9ea0e955-ae68-4ce4-9c86-d06cab18d25c

**Deploy your AI Application**: Make your AI application enterprise-ready in a matter of minutes. Here's a demo of how you can use Tinfoil to run a deepfake detection service that could run securely on people's private videos:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_8hLmqoutyk

We encourage you to be skeptical of our privacy claims. Verifiability is our answer. It’s not just us _saying_ it’s private; the hardware and cryptography let _you_ check. Here’s a guide that walks you through the verification process:[ ](https://docs.tinfoil.sh/verify)https://docs.tinfoil.sh/verification/attestation-architecture.

**The Ask**

If you think this sounds interesting, or too good to be true, contact us at [**founders@tinfoil.sh**](mailto:founders@tinfoil.sh)**!**

We’d love to hear from you, whether you’re a:

* startup looking to sell into regulated industries
* government agency that does everything on-prem but doesn’t trust your AI team to handle sensitive data
* neocloud trying to secure enterprise customers in regulated industries that don’t migrate from the big clouds to you
* company providing your employees dead-simple confidential LLM chat app

You can also learn more on our [**blog**](https://tinfoil.sh/blog), and subscribe to our [**LinkedIn**](https://www.linkedin.com/company/tinfoil/) and [**Twitter**](https://x.com/TinfoilAI) to follow updates!

name: Jeevy Fabrication
one_liner: AI Driven EPC - Weld Fabrication Contractor
long_description:
Jeevy Fabrication is an AI-powered contractor that connects complex weld jobs to the best-fit shops—fast. We deliver top-tier QA and total transparency, all at better traditional outsourced pricing.

Our software reduces bid and scheduling time for our in-network shops by over 80%. It converts manufacturing drawings into an accurate bill of materials and a resource-loaded, high-fidelity schedule—eliminating costly errors and rework. Using this our in-network fabricators can bid on more jobs and deliver more reliable results than their competitors. 

We also offer our clients a streamlined purchasing and project tracking experience. Clients submit purchase requests, track schedules, access key documents, and receive real-time photo updates—all in one place. We provide traceability for easy material review and maintenance of domestic content standards as required. Faster decisions, fewer delays, complete visibility.

launches.title: Jeevy Fabrication: The AI Fabrication Contractor
launches.body:
# **TLDR**:

# Jeevy Fabrication is a AI driven fabrication contractor for welded assemblies. We deliver higher quality QA and schedule transparency while maintaining competitive pricing.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4lB7YAlHF1U

# **What we found**:

If you are building rockets to Mars or fusion systems, getting complex welded assemblies built to spec, on time, and on budget is mission-critical—**and incredibly hard**.

Outsourcing to smaller weld shops can save money, but often at the cost of quality, schedule delays, and lost traceability. Precision assemblies often arrive dirty, out of spec, or late because these shops lack the project management horsepower needed to maintain the rigor high-stakes hardware demands.

**Quick reality check:** Processing one drawing properly—with a detailed schedule, test plan, and QA flow—takes \~9 hours. With only a 10% win rate on bids, a small shop could spend 90 hours just to land one job. That’s not scalable when you’ve got one or two engineers.

# **Our approach**

We figured it would be awesome if we could offer the same high quality results of in-housing at the price of outsourcing a job. Our software reduces bid and scheduling time for our in-network shops **by over 80%**. It converts manufacturing drawings into an accurate bill of materials and a resource-loaded, high-fidelity schedule—eliminating costly errors and rework. Using these tools, our in-network fabricators can **spend less time bidding and deliver more reliable results than their competitors**. ‘

**We handle the bids, purchase materials, and allocate jobs to shops in our network** that have the right capabilities and available capacity. By owning the job end-to-end, we ensure quality and adherence to key project milestones. In-network shops benefit from smarter scheduling tools and a steady stream of work to fill their downtime.

# **About the Team**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90270&key=user_uploads/2560244/fd3594e1-0826-4e36-9631-04058ff16474)

We’re brothers—and that’s a desktop DAC (Direct Air Capture) we built together as a side project. We’ve always known we’d start a company together—it’s been part of the plan for as long as we can remember. And we’ve always said it had to be a rock ’n’ roll fueled adventure!

Our dad was a serial entrepreneur, and dinner conversations were filled with stories and lessons from his ventures. That’s just how we grew up.

**Jeevs**: Spent several years at SpaceX designing and building welded assemblies for launch pads in South Texas. The genesis of this idea came from the pain Jeevs experienced while sourcing parts for launch critical systems. “...why is there water in my cryogenic liquid oxygen pipe?? It’s like they’re trying to kill us!”

**Vinay**: Several years of experience writing software for energy grid optimization projects. Worked at Rondo Energy designing and modeling grid scale heat batteries. He has a computer science and electrical degree from Princeton University.

# **Our ask**

Need a welded part built? Know someone who does? Please let us know!

launches.title: Chiron - Grammarly for Math ✏️
launches.body:
Hey there 👋

We’re [James](https://x.com/J4mesBooth) and [Max](https://x.com/MaxB00th) - brothers and cofounders of [Chiron](https://projectchiron.org).

# 📌 **TL;DR**

Chiron is an [iPad app](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/project-chiron/id6502346822) that understands math as it’s written - like Grammarly for algebra. We’re both Oxford math grads, have tutored for a decade, and we’re creating the future of learning which will be entirely 1-on-1.

[Launch Video](https://youtu.be/Ec8Nwe0EaSU)

# ❌ **Problem**

With AI that’s so great at math, why can’t it teach at near-human quality?

* Math is handwritten ✏️
* Math has to be practiced not read 🧮
* AI is rubbish at spotting _your_ mistakes 🔍

# ✅ **Solution**

* Freeform writing on a whiteboard app ✍️
* Accuracy of a calculator with symbolic logic 🔢
* Real-time feedback on every stroke (< 300ms) ⚡

# ⚙️ **How we do it?**

With tens of thousands of lines of Python and Wolfram Language code. Writing on an iPad, we convert the stroke data to LaTeX, parse it, ask a million symbolic questions about it with reference to the problem’s _ground truth_ (the lines with a blue index), and assess whether it is right, wrong or something in between.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90706&key=user_uploads/1522067/b06893f5-bab0-4021-b09e-c8d38b33e4ee)

We do **not** rely on the vibes of a language model to assess the details of their working - too slow and unreliable. Many students give up on LLMs for genuine collaboration when they mislead them on topics the student finds difficult.

**We can handle a lot of math already.**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90706&key=user_uploads/1522067/df464a12-f051-4c0a-8c03-90e660079c40)

# **💡 Core insight**

We tried all the AI tutor desktop formulations we could imagine, but beyond the obvious interface challenge, AI is exceptionally poor at spotting the subtle mistakes students often make. LLMs are great at doing correct math, but much worse at pulling out an error within the many lines of messy student reasoning.

We started performing a symbolic analysis of the student’s working as context for the AI to boost accuracy - **but then we realised we could give this straight to the student.** This was when we started to feel the magic.

# **🙏 Our Ask**

So far, _every_ single teacher we’ve demoed our iPad app to in person has immediately started work greenlighting a pilot. Let us know if you can introduce us to any math teachers teaching between Algebra I and Calculus I.

And you can check out Chiron on the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/project-chiron/id6502346822) now - or share with any students who might benefit from it!

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90706&key=user_uploads/1522067/7b18b9c0-1e00-49fa-a8bb-d6ab7bb7d080)

Cheers, James & Max
launches.tagline: The Booth Brothers are building an iPad app that understands math as it's written

launches.title: Combinely - AI coworker for accountants
launches.body:
Hey everyone, we’re [Tom](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tominvernizzi/) & [Arthur](https://www.linkedin.com/in/arthur-granacher/) – co-founders of [Combinely.](https://combinely.ai)

### **TL;DR**

Accountants spend **30-40% of their day in Outlook** – chasing clients, replying to questions, and digging through past emails for context.

Built by an ex-Deloitte/Google team, **Combinely’s AI-coworker proactively takes on work**, helping accountants handle everything from answering client queries to producing & reviewing deliverables.

Watch the 60-second demo:

<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gcy1-b2uJ9M>

**Know an accounting firm ready for AI?** Connect us → [tom@combinely.ai](mailto:tom@combinely.ai) / [Book a call](https://calendly.com/d/cn29-5dx-6bz)[.](mailto:tom@combinely.ai)

---

### **Problem**

#### Client communication

30-40% of an accountant’s day disappears in Outlook – chasing documents, answering client questions, and hunting for context.

#### Seasonal workload

Tax season crams a year’s workload into a few intense months – leading to client dissatisfaction, more mistakes, and staff burnout.

### **Solution**

**AI coworker that cuts time spent in Outlook in half.**

#### What it does

* **Learns from past work** to draft high-quality answers and first-pass deliverables.
* **Builds a live profile for each client** to understand their needs, history & quirks.
* **Acts like a teammate**: proactively gets to work as soon as an email comes in.

#### The impact

* Saves **1-2 non-billable hours** per employee, per day.
* Lets firms **serve more clients** without proportional head-count growth.
* **Relieves busy-season** stress and errors.

---

If the above resonates, reach out to [**tom@combinely.ai**](mailto:tom@combinely.ai) or [**book a call**](https://calendly.com/d/cn29-5dx-6bz). Thank you!
