launches.title: Sixtyfour - Bloomberg Terminal for sales
launches.body:
Enterprise sales teams spend 50% of their time on research that misses the mark. Here's why — and how we're fixing it.

Hey everyone! We’re Saarth & Christopher – the founders of Sixtyfour. 👋

**TL;DR**

Sixtyfour AI is the Bloomberg Terminal for sales. We work with hypergrowth companies to deploy custom research agents that map their Total Addressable Market and deliver real-time market signals, fully tailored to what matters most.

Customers like **Mercor**, **Traba**, **Hockeystack**, and **Conduit** use Sixtyfour to stay ahead of the curve.

https://youtu.be/s45NR6diBPo

**🧠** **The Enterprise GTM Problem**

If you’re selling into a niche or regulated market ( health systems, manufacturing, fintech, govtech, and so on), you already know: generic data platforms don’t work.

Here’s why:

**💡 “Intent signals” are too broad**

Most tools will tell you someone visited a pricing page. That’s not useful when you’re selling a $250K solution into a regional hospital network or a logistics hub in the Midwest.

**🧱 The nuance is everything**

Enterprise sellers ask real questions:

Did that manufacturing facility just expand its fleet?

Does it have two or three parking bays?

Did that nursing home file a new Medicare cost report?

Is the new VP of Ops a better entry point than the outgoing admin director?

These are the signals that drive pipeline and predict fit, and no off-the-shelf platform can give you that.

**🔍 Static filters can’t model your ICP**

Try finding “companies that just adopted Drift, expanded their marketing team by 30%, and hired a new CRO in the past 90 days” in traditional tools. Impossible. Our agents live in that world

**✨ The Sixtyfour Advantage**

We don’t sell contact lists. We build intelligence infrastructure for your GTM engine.

**📍 Custom TAMs, always current**

We work with your team to define and continuously update your market using real-world, dynamic data — regulatory filings, facility attributes, staff movements, and even track infrastructure like parking lot size.

**📡 Proprietary real-time signals**

From Medicare cost report changes to decision-maker exits to new vendor adoption — we detect what matters to your team, as it happens.

**🧠 Deployable custom ML models**

Have internal data on close rates, deal velocity, or expansion triggers? We plug it in.

We can train and deploy custom ML models to estimate buyer readiness, ICP fit, churn risk, and more, directly tailored to your pipeline data.

**🤖 Agents that think like your best rep**

Our AI agents mirror your go-to-market motion, tracking, qualifying, and notifying you at the exact right time.

**👥The Team**

We’re both repeat founders who have built and sold into complex markets.

Saarth is a UC Berkeley Data Science grad and ex-Whatnot (YC W20), Deepgram (YC W16), and Stanford researcher. He previously sold Internalize, built one of the first conversational AI agents (Dart), and has been building products since age 10.

Christopher, a Cornell dropout, led GTM at Onyx (YC W24) and built sales AI tools at Symbl. He’s a CalHacks AI winner and ex-analyst at Cornell Atkinson, with deep experience across AI, ops, and consumer tech.

We’ve lived the pain of building GTM systems by hand, and we’re building the platform we always wished existed.

**👋 Our Ask**

🏢 Know a GTM, RevOps, or sales leader at an enterprise or hypergrowth vertical SaaS company? Send them to [sixtyfour.ai](http://sixtyfour.ai) — we’d love to chat.

💬 Frustrated with generic signals and shallow filters? Let’s build something that works for your team.

Every intro, share, and shoutout means the world. Thank you — we’re just getting started.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90535&key=user_uploads/804300/0c80ad45-4d97-43f6-8fed-9a5782416b19)

name: Opusense AI
one_liner: An AI agent to generate construction field reports while on site
long_description:
Opusense AI automates field report writing for construction field inspectors. Instead of typing up notes at the end of the day, inspectors can now walk a site, speak observations aloud, snap photos, and let our AI assistant generate a detailed, organized report on-site and in real time.

Combined, the founding team has over 15 years in the construction industry. Writing up these field reports used to take up at least 20% of the week. With Opusense, we cut that time by 5x. Our team combines deep construction experience with technical expertise, Roya has a PhD in civil engineering, and Michael has worked at multiple construction tech startups.

Why hasn’t this been done before? Construction is slow to adopt new tech, and reporting is messy, photos, voice notes, and field notes all live in silos. Turning that into a clear, structured report requires real insight into how inspectors work and what clients need. Only now, with advances in AI, can we process unstructured data adequately to generate high-quality reports in real time.

The opportunity is massive. Every inspection firm and contractor is struggling with documentation. Manual reports slow them down, create inconsistencies, and delay handoffs. We believe AI can do this better, and Opusense is proving it.

launches.title: Opusense – AI-Powered Field Reports for Site Inspectors
launches.body:
# **TL;DR**

Opusense turns field notes, voice memos, and photos into fully formatted inspection reports **automatically**. Used by engineers and inspectors in construction, infrastructure, and consulting to save time each day, reduce errors, and keep branding consistent. It’s like having a reporting assistant in your pocket!

📌 Interested in using Opusense at your firm? Book a demo: [cal.com/royac](http://cal.com/royac)

🎥 Launch video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hV26sN5Buls

# **❌ The Problem**

Most field teams still rely on writing notes by hand and typing them into Word templates hours or even days after leaving the site. It’s slow, error-prone, and easy to fall behind. For firms managing dozens of active sites, the reporting backlog is the most painful part of the job. No engineer enjoys writing the same reports over and over. It’s an overlooked market, but consultants are on every construction site, and inspections in the US alone make up a $30B industry.

# **✅ Our Solution**

**Opusense is your AI-powered reporting assistant.**

📱 On-site just open our mobile app and speak or type notes, and snap photos

🧠 Our AI turns raw inputs into structured reports tailored to your firm’s format and style

📄 Instantly export as Word or PDF — zero formatting needed

It works offline on any phone or tablet  — no laptop, no end-of-day chaos.

_Field oversight for managers back at the office? Don’t worry_ —  _we’ve got a solution for that!_

Our users also have access to a web interface which shows real-time reports as they are generated.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90178&key=user_uploads/1672839/9dcabf16-bcf2-44f0-b457-eb31559ce72d)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90178&key=user_uploads/1672839/dea94169-a70b-4bf9-98dc-2a0d63210a2e)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90178&key=user_uploads/1672839/3b3b5009-bbe4-46bf-829d-80f44f8d83c3)

# **💼 Who It’s For**

* Engineering consultants (third-party consulting firms)
  * Across all field departments (BQA, Structural, Environmental, Geotechnical, etc.)
* Site inspectors

We’re already live with multiple firms across North America including multinational corporations.

# **🛠 The Backstory**

Our CEO Roya has a PhD in Civil Engineering from the University of Waterloo and a MSc in Advanced Infrastructure Systems from Carnegie Mellon. She previously worked as a site inspector at engineering consulting firms, where the firsthand frustration of field reporting inspired Opusense. Our CTO Michael has a background in ECE from the University of Waterloo. He focused on building AI systems in the fields of robotics and self-driving cars and previously worked in startups in the construction industry, giving him insight into what users need in this field. We created Opusense because reporting was the worst part of the job, so we decided to get rid of it. 

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90178&key=user_uploads/1672839/70a68664-803c-439d-a73a-1d54936691f8)

# **Let’s Chat**

Know someone who deals with field reporting chaos?

Want to try Opusense yourself?

✉️ Shoot me an Email: [rcody@opusense.com](mailto:rcody@opusense.com)

🌐 Learn more: [opusense.com](http://opusense.com)

launches.title: Docucod 🐟 Automatically generate and maintain your project documentation
launches.body:
Hello world 🏄 we are [Hemang](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hemangkandwal/) and [Anguel](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ahristozov/) from [Clidey](https://www.linkedin.com/company/clidey/), and we are building [Docucod](https://docucod.com/)!

**TL;DR:**

**Docucod automatically generates and maintains complete, always-up-to-date documentation—straight from your codebase.**

Demo video: https://youtu.be/SAaZq9UHAic

# **❗** What is the problem?

On average, developers spend **20–30% of their time** maintaining documentation—and that doesn’t even include the time it takes to create it in the first place. That’s nearly **12 hours in a standard 40-hour week**, often more if you're part of a fast-growing team.

Most tools are still manual and time-consuming, stealing hours better spent building, selling, or scaling.

Great documentation isn’t just helpful—it’s a **growth engine**. Look at Stripe: their docs earn trust and convert users.

The truth? At most companies, documentation is an afterthought (we haven’t written ours yet either!) And we get it—“documentation specialist” usually isn’t on anyone’s job title.

# 💡 What is the solution?

**Docucod auto-generates and maintains always-up-to-date documentation—straight from your codebase.** You continue building, we’ll focus on the documentation.

It fits effortlessly into your workflow, whether you’re a small team or managing complex repos.

From onboarding guides to API references and system diagrams, Docucod delivers clear, comprehensive docs with zero manual work.

Fully editable and always in sync, it lets you ship fast **and** document well—without compromise.

# 🧠 How it works:

* Connect your GitHub account and select a repo.
* Docucod scans your repo to understand its structure and functionality, building an intelligent knowledge graph that maps out components, features, code flow, and so on.
* It creates a structured documentation plan, outlining sections, navigation, and individual pages.
* Docucod generates rich content with diagrams and contextual clarity.
* Finally, it automatically pushes the documentation back to your repo for deployment.

# 😎 Want to see some real examples?

https://github.com/clidey/whodb-docs - deployed at http://whodb-docs.docucod.com/

https://github.com/clidey/todos-docs - deployed at https://todo-docs.docucod.com/

# 💯 Who Are We and Why Did We Build This?

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90620&key=user_uploads/1558575/1eddcff2-4b1a-4343-847d-eb35680c9693)

We’re Hemang and Anguel—friends, builders, and longtime hackathon teammates. After years working at places like Palantir, J.P. Morgan, and Morgan Stanley, we saw one issue everywhere: documentation gets rushed, postponed, or skipped—and the fallout is always the same.

We built Docucod because this isn’t a people problem—it’s a systems problem. The fix isn’t better habits. It’s automation.

> **We’re here to make documentation sexy again.**

# 🤔 Is Docucod right for you?

**Don’t use Docucod if:**

🚫 You enjoy rewriting GitHub auth instructions.

🚫 You love writing and maintaining docs by hand.

**Use Docucod if:**

✅ You want docs that stay up to date—automatically.

✅ You want new hires productive on Day 1.

✅ You’d rather ship than document.

# 🥹 Our ask:

If this resonates with you, **get in touch:**

[hemang.kandwal@clidey.com](mailto:hemang.kandwal@clidey.com), [anguel.hristozov@clidey.com](mailto:anguel.hristozov@clidey.com), or

https://calendly.com/clidey/conversation-with-clidey-15-min - if there’s a time that you’d like to speak but it shows as unavailable, please just message us!

If you owned documentation or know someone who owns it now, we would love to get a warm introduction.

Let’s make documentation an asset—not a chore.

That’s our fish! 👇

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90620&key=user_uploads/1558575/afe2507e-ada5-46a5-b9f8-93eb3ab48a36)
launches.tagline: Write code, not documentation. Docucod auto-creates and updates docs from your codebase and PRs—so your team stays focused on shipping.

name: HABIT
one_liner: Reshaping neighborhood services with robotics. Auto details are first.
long_description:
HABIT is deploying robotic services to your neighborhood. 

No need to buy a $30,000 humanoid for $300/week worth of labor. No maintenance, fleet management, or wasted time customizing robots for your use case. Our global locations will support your stores, hotels, homes, and cars with on-demand robotic services that are cheaper, better, and equipped for the job.

HABIT is establishing our physical presence with the first-ever robotic car detail: orangedetail.

A hand wash or detail is still the only way to clean your car without paint damage. That’s why Americans will spend $4.2B on details in 2025. orangedetail combines the speed and convenience of a tunnel wash with the high-margin pricing ($50-$3,000+) and meticulous care of a professional auto detailer.

HABIT turns general intelligence into specialized robotic expertise.

Our multi-stage training framework distills knowledge from large-scale robotic foundation models into efficient student architectures and applies targeted fine-tuning with supervised methods on real-world data and reinforcement learning in simulation. The result: consumer-ready robotic experts, precisely optimized for any vertical with minimal cost, complexity, or overhead.

launches.body:
**TL;DR** - HABIT is building a **robotic car detail**. Convenience of a tunnel wash + premium services of a human detailer. 

**Watch our launch video to learn more!**

https://youtu.be/gOQL87xoUxk 

**Team: SWE / Investment Banker + Applied Scientist**

* [Michael](https://linkedin.com/in/michaeltrehan): prev. Sr. SWE at Radiant Nuclear ($150M+ raised); Investment Banker at JPM
* [Harish](https://www.linkedin.com/in/harishkpalani): prev. AI/ML Research Scientist at Twitch & Amazon

* A single operator with locations in just 21 states earned $1B last year

**But car details suck**

* Automatic washes scratch paint and don’t offer services like ceramic coating ($1,500+)
* That’s why Americans spend $4.2B a year on manual details and hand washes
* Human detailers are slow (hour-long wait), expensive ($50+), and inconsistent

**So HABIT is building the first robotic car detail**

* Throughput and convenience of an automatic wash
* Results and premium price point of a human — starting with exterior details

**Car detailing is our first vertical**

* Small businesses across America don’t want to buy, maintain, or equip a humanoid fleet
* HABIT centers will act as your neighborhood’s humanoid fleet manager

**Our ask:** Car wash operators have been lining up for our system. So if you know a car wash operator (or are one), hit us up! [founders@habitrobotics.com](mailto:founders@habitrobotics.com)

launches.title: 🦾 Kaizen - Instantly integrate into websites without APIs
launches.body:
The purpose of software is fundamentally changing, from platforms that track your work, to agents that complete work on your behalf. We’re building [Kaizen](https://www.kaizenautomation.com/), the platform for building software that does work on the web.\
\
Hey y’all! We’re [Ken](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ken-acquah-45b397123/) & [Michael](https://www.linkedin.com/in/michael-silver-853952129/) — the founders of Kaizen!

**📚 TL;DR**

With Kaizen, developers can integrate with any web application **in minutes, instead of weeks**. **Leading AI companies** use Kaizen to read and write from legacy portals in **logistics**, **healthcare**, and **financial services**.

[Launch Video](https://youtu.be/flw30r5vWyk)

### 🔗 **The Integration Problem**

In most industries, **the biggest bottleneck to automation is integration**. In these sectors, operators will interface with hundreds of web applications: between systems of records, customer portals, and proprietary internal software. **Building integrations across all these systems was previously impossible, leaving much of the economy mired in repetitive, manual workflows.**

For software vendors in these industries, this pain is most acute. Long integration times **stall customer onboarding, halt product velocity, and strictly bound the value they can provide to customers**. Startups are forced to choose between severe limits to feature capabilities and staffing large internal “integration” teams.

As AI agents rapidly scale, **this problem only gets worse**. Tools like voice agents, AI scribes, or procurement copilots are ready to work _on behalf_ of users but are stopped in their tracks by authenticated websites without UIs.

### **🥁Introducing: Kaizen**

**💻 How does it work?**\
Within [Kaizen](https://www.kaizenautomation.com/), developers construct a set of “blocks” describing your automation. We leverage computer use models to create deterministic automations for any website.

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXf7WyATvregN5i_3XfB-drcta62yQeAn6vSWWJFjJAxwd63FfPN31VNK7TgUfE_mopwAAPx88yzyvzLBeo7T_kn0vSdFb1RS1UFiYi_0KGDekc8sz0OWS1ZvQwtBh8-PoIXRymocA?key=_Ybxg5buJr7nan_b4Td9Og)

Kaizen exposes a powerful [API](https://docs.kaizenautomation.com/api-reference/workflows/execute-a-workflow), developers can use to programmatically trigger automations. With Kaizen, your application can automatically complete forms, retrieve critical business data, and execute end-to-end processes on behalf of your users.

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXfCeKs_JBambiElHCLRdIe5484RmX7rSfb1epyQBw-104cm3oWotpzWofcQvJrqx_CfBglkynZmrphexWRcg2zPdOlB2hA5Oe0I1mbN1or9fjAx6sY7nptmsCbiM5OcQplJGwE-9Q?key=_Ybxg5buJr7nan_b4Td9Og)

**🕵️ Who’s it for?**\
Kaizen helps engineering teams in traditional industries (logistics, financial services, healthcare, insurance) accelerate their integration roadmap. Use cases we enable include:

* Logistics agents that automatically bid across hundreds of shipper boards.
* RCM automation software that dynamically completes forms for hundreds of payer portals.
* Tech-enabled lenders that leverage data from thousands of municipal, county, and state government websites.
* and many, many, more…

**🤔 Why Kaizen?**

2025 will be the year of browser agents, and Kaizen is the best platform for you to launch your own.

* **Reliable, fast workflows:** Customers come to us after trying computer use agents that can’t reliably log in to a legacy portal. Kaizen caches each action it takes to ensure workflows run fast and reliably.
* **We handle the plumbing:** Kaizen automatically handles browser session management, 2FA authentication, and anti-bot measures. To launch your first workflow, you simply need to describe it in English.
* **For developers, by developers:** Most solutions in this space are rigid and brittle, making it hard for developers to fully own their automations. Kaizen is [API-first](https://docs.kaizenautomation.com/api-reference/workflows/execute-a-workflow) and supports arbitrary code snippets, giving product builders maximum flexibility.

### 👥 **The Team**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90644&key=user_uploads/539074/ea8aec2e-463b-4cc7-a1af-464f5a9a519a)

We met six years ago at MIT, hacking on zero-knowledge proofs and image generation algorithms. Since then, Ken’s led automation teams in the freight industry, building LLM-powered browser workflows across a maze of portals. Michael spent six years at MIT CSAIL researching web-scale information retrieval, then developed deep infrastructure expertise at [Meta](https://www.meta.com/) and [Gather](https://www.gather.town/).

We’ve lived through the pain of manually stitching together web automations—and we’re building Kaizen to ensure no engineering team experiences that again.

### 🙏🏼 **Our Ask**

We’re looking to onboard more engineering teams across **financial services**, **healthcare**, and **logistics** and would really appreciate your help. If you or someone you know is struggling to automate work on websites without APIs, send them to [kaizenautomation.com](http://kaizenautomation.com).

Ticket Wallet is an AI-powered resale platform for season ticket holders and brokers.
We automate pricing, listing, and distribution across all major marketplaces.

Today, most tickets are still sold manually: spreadsheets, guessing prices, and listing on one site at a time. The biggest brokers outsource pricing to teams in the Philippines… 

We built Ticket Wallet because we lived this. Truman has been flipping tickets for the last 5 years. Ryan built pricing software after seeing the mess first-hand. We’ve turned that pain into a product.

Since launch, we’ve onboarded $3M+ in ticket inventory, signed up 100+ paying sellers, and started working with pro teams. We charge 10% per ticket sold. This is our wedge into the $26B resale market.

Other platforms cost you money. We make you more of it.

launches.title: Ticket Wallet - AI-Powered Ticket Resale
launches.body:
🎟️ **TL;DR**\
**Selling tickets sucks…** We’re building Ticket Wallet - an **AI-powered resale platform** **for ticket brokers.** We automate pricing, listing, and distribution across all major marketplaces. 

We do everything you just press sell.\
\
(**P.S.** If you have season tickets and need help selling, message us!)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a_Z4VG8kJJ4](https://youtu.be/a_Z4VG8kJJ4)

🌐 **The Origin Story**\
Ryan and I (Truman) met on the Princeton Men’s Soccer team and have been best friends for nearly 8 years. He studied computer science with a focus on AI/ML, and I studied econ. Ryan could build, I could sell - we just needed something to work on.

We finally got the chance our senior year when we tried selling our own season tickets.

It was terrible. The process was manual, time-consuming, and completely outdated. That pain quickly turned into an obsession. 

💥 **The Problem We’re Solving**\
It's really difficult to sell tickets, especially if you have a lot of them. Brokers are the **power sellers** of the industry, often moving **$10M+** in ticket volume annually. Yet they are stuck using spreadsheets, updating prices manually, and listing tickets on one site at a time. You can think of it like day trading on the stock market 10+ years ago. Even crazier, the biggest brokers are hiring pricing teams in the Philippines…

It’s 2025. We have self-driving cars but ticket sellers are still updating rows in Excel and refreshing StubHub?

🔨 **What We’re Building**\
Ticket Wallet is the first **AI-powered selling system for ticket brokers.** We price, list, and manage their tickets across all the major marketplaces (Ticketmaster, StubHub, SeatGeek, Vivid Seats, Gametime, Tickpick, AXS, etc...) Sellers **just press “list”** and we handle the rest.

Since launching, we’ve onboarded over **$3M in ticket inventory**, **100+ paying sellers**, and we’re **starting to work with pro sports teams**. We charge 10% of every ticket sold.

Ticket brokers using Ticket Wallet have seen a **27% increase in revenue**  per ticket sold. We run their entire business 

The market for ticket brokers in the US is **$26.3B.**

**🔑 Key Features:**

* AI pricing that updates 24/7
* Listings pushed everywhere automatically 
* Central dashboard to manage inventory 
* Analytics to track progress and sales
* Zero manual work
* Website and mobile application

It’s like giving sellers superpowers - or at least their weekends back.

**🧿 What We’re Looking For:**

* Feedback from anyone selling tickets (or trying to!)
* Warm intros to pro teams, ticket brokers, or season ticket holders
* YC Alum with sports/entertainment connections or partnerships we should explore
* Download our mobile app on iOS (Ticket Wallet):

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ticket-wallet/id6463562809

**🔋 Other Marketplaces Cost Money. We Make You More.**

Truman & Ryan\
(Ticket Wallet, YC X25)

launches.title: RunRL: Improve LLMs and agents with reinforcement learning.
launches.body:
Hi! We’re Derik and Andrew, and we’re building RunRL: the platform that lets you run reinforcement learning on your AI.

We used to run an AI research lab together, and Andrew dropped out from his RL PhD to provide you the greatest reinforcement learning experience possible.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rPP5YNMA4GE

# The problem

For a generic LLM agent, every day is like the first day on the job. Tools and tasks need exhaustive explanations. Even still, agents are too unreliable for deployment.

# Our fix

RL fine-tuning produces specialist models that intuitively know what to do. It uses the algorithms that produced DeepSeek R1, but customized for your use case.

Simply give us a reward function that tells us what’s good and what’s bad—and we’ll make your model improve.

### Example 1: chemistry

You’re trying to make a model that generates potential drug candidates for COVID. You want them to bind as tightly to the active site of Sars-CoV-2 protease as possible, but using Claude+thinking+web-search only gets you a binding performance of 22. Making a better model is as simple as defining the reward to be the binding performance of the model’s outputs:

```
def reward(output):
    molecule = parse_SMILES(output)

    if valid_molecule(output):
    return binding_performance(output)
else:
    return -1
```

loading it up on [RunRL.com](http://RunRL.com), and hitting run:

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXdybuN1eu2Y3fSZi4m9Wc9YR4a-YYACWTt_jxx611-UVsNZ_G-UriMLuSW0JDalz65ixrgYYEIQcc8p1ni8bz2RpLp1HZcX0YIfTVfa1mE-TqFNL787gI94VNHHfcIy4mVoFxlqKQ?key=Wlf0KwcYIPK-rxwiB_U0-Q)

So, a model 175x smaller than Claude learns to outperform the frontier models!

### Example 2: agents

You have an OpenAI or Anthropic-based agent, but it’s not as reliable as you’d like it to be. Maybe your agent already does what you want most of the time, but isn’t consistent enough to be trusted in production. RL can help with that too: it reinforces good behavior and makes your agent better at rule-following, information extraction, and document navigation in high-stakes environments. Join our beta [here](https://www.runrl.com/products/agentflow/)!

# Run RL!

If you’re using AI and you want your model to be better, and you have a way of describing what “better” is: you’re ready to [run RL](https://runrl.com).

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90475&key=user_uploads/1161067/2e061652-2c07-473b-a95d-8fb07cdc36cd)

launches.title: Morphik: Open‑source multimodal RAG that works on technical docs
launches.body:
Hey YC! 👋 We’re Adi and Arnav, co-founders of Morphik (https://morphik.ai).

### **TL;DR**

* **Problem:** Knowledge workers spend a lot of their time searching complex documentation with diagrams, tables, or spreadsheets, just to find relevant information. Text‑only RAG misses details, hallucinates, and provides half-baked responses.
* **Solution:** Morphik embeds whole pages (image + text, no OCR), auto‑builds a knowledge graph, and serves it through a UI, SDK, or REST API. We have 90 % accuracy on arXiv QA (and we can fine-tune for your use case 🙂).

Watch our demo video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3adZQhm5JZY

### **Problem**

RAG breaks the moment documents stop being blobs of text.

* Knowledge workers spend a lot of their time (people we spoke with said 50-70% time just in the research phase). eg. electrical engineers finding perfect PCB spec, pharma companies trying to search ELNs for similar experiments.
* 80% of enterprise knowledge lives in diagrams, tables, images, CAD, scanned pdfs, not .txt.
* “Multimodal” models still hallucinate or miss key context because the retrieval step sees only text, or they rely on tools to retrieve diagrams, or context. (https://docs.morphik.ai/blogs/gpt-vs-morphik-multimodal)
* Teams glue together OCR, vector DBs, and regex‑heavy ETL that becomes a brittle monstrosity.

### **Solution**

Directly embedding and search over page images

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXdzvQJeEBmnvZI1Mkl2ZYCtsN0AG4Mx5JpcN4RtivMfndGshgTkj1uZcb8BkFAkXXNCpg9TPqeIKsqCXscaLzGDNO2e8TFn8naJPkJ_XtceDHlwNrAAcV69QGYlzSOwvdofI7FksQ?key=wmYsqYRKzN1ploJFaFpgwCeu)

When you ingest in Morphik, in addition to OCR, we create direct embeddings for the image of a page (or frames in a video). When you ask “Colpali comparison to standard RAG”, the LLM sees the actual page image, so multimodal models can reason over arrows, labels, scales, and colours just like a human.

### **Rules Engine**

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcOXXa3wTpZV26zi8kaucVOt2QuUgKKfrdvlyqlFfeHmDUudWpNaS-r6KNm5--4Joz4rE5tsiu_NDqlHnRE914l7ad4YtKRRLc_X1gm7BteBR0aMN446aia7LGA1l7b2UJMor97?key=wmYsqYRKzN1ploJFaFpgwCeu)

When ingesting, you can define rules for data extraction (which would again consider tables, diagrams), or define natural language rules for PII redaction, or content transformation.

### **Deployment ready, scalable**

Morphik comes built in with folder scoping, end user scoping, GPU accelerations, and fine grained permissions, so you can prototype and deploy with enterprise grade features. It’s end‑to‑end, so you don’t scramble to make duct tape fixes.

### **One more thing…Morphik Research Agent**

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcL9LvkrH861vRDhuFlYlBy0LsjlhMOYVBLRLdnj903G5L3QMgx12ziGZJhO_h2SzAakjD27e0Yeu4XZwmsE4Yv1BGNRj-OGc41i798xy_UW9MVHISzJy0GBrTsOWWqWBGdtGKhmg?key=wmYsqYRKzN1ploJFaFpgwCeu)

Our research agent uses Morphik’s retrieval, graph, and extraction APIs as tools. It chains them automatically, jumping from doc to doc, node to node, seeing figures, till it finds the needle in the haystack, or has enough context to answer your questions. “Describe the third pin on the USBC21 diagram” will get the diagram, find the pin, jump to the table with pin descriptions, jump to page 13 to “find more details on page 13”.

### **Why we might be interesting to you**

* Building an internal ChatGPT over messy manuals? Morphik is the fastest way to ship something users _trust_.
* Developing an AI product? Swap your vector‑DB‑plus‑duct‑tape stack for a single SDK call.
* Researching graph‑RAG? CAG? We have it all.

### **Our Ask 🙏**

1. **⭐ Star / watch** https://github.com/morphik-org/morphik-core – open source momentum matters.
2. **Introductions** to teams drowning in technical docs (healthcare, manufacturing, legal, electrical engineers).
3. Tell us **what still hurts in your RAG stack**, comment, **DM, or email** [founders@morphik.ai](mailto:founders@morphik.ai) or [book a call](https://cal.com/adityavardhan-agrawal-x6jyhq/30min).

Thanks for reading!

Adi & Arnav
launches.tagline: Turn your complex private data into grounded answers

launches.title: Nomi - Cursor for Sales
launches.body:
Stop guessing on sales calls. Know exactly what to say.

**TL;DR:** Nomi gives you real-time sales advice during calls. See what to say, what to ask, and how to close. Plus free AI note-taking forever.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90601&key=user_uploads/2099666/4266c492-2256-4b58-9cbb-7c2f094e12fe)

### The Problem

You're on a sales call. The prospect asks a tough question. You freeze. Or worse, you ramble.

They ask about your API limits. You're not sure. They push back on pricing. You cave too early. They want a technical deep-dive. You lose the room.

Look, everyone has off days. But here's the thing - AI is everywhere now. So why are you still making these preventable mistakes?

Even when calls feel great, deals die the next day. Why? Because you missed the key moment to close.

## Meet Nomi: Real-Time Sales Copilot

Nomi listens to your calls and shows you exactly what to say. Right on your screen. As you talk.

* See the perfect response to any objection
* Get instant questions that move deals forward
* Know the exact moment to ask for the close

One customer went from **$100K to $360K** in two weeks using Nomi. He had the pipeline, we had the sales fuel.

PS: Nomi is always learning. We use reinforcement learning and gradient boosting techniques to continuously improve your sales playbook and your custom model.

## Free AI Note-Taker Included

Forget paying $500/month for meeting bots. You get:

* Unlimited recordings and transcripts
* Smart summaries sent after each call
* Calendar sync - it joins automatically
* Auto-builds your sales playbook from winning calls
* Fills your CRM automatically after each meeting
* Built with [Recall.ai](http://Recall.ai) (YC W20) infrastructure

All free. Forever. Not a trial.

## Enterprise Ready

Your data is safe. Security provided by [Probo](https://getprobo.com) (YC X25). SOC II, GDPR ready, and CCPA ready.

## Start Today

Ready to get more deals done?

* **Sign up at**: https://app.heynomi.com/register
* **Email us**: founders@heynomi.com
* **Text us**: +1 (415) 235-5978

---

—

---

_Your job is to get deals done. Our job is to make it easy._

launches.title: Casco - Agentic Red Teaming for AI agents and apps
launches.body:
Hi everyone - we’re Rene and Ian, ex-AWS AI & Security, and we’re thrilled to introduce [Casco](https://casco.com)! Casco prevents AI agents and apps from messing up by evaluating them for security, safety, and accuracy.

Casco already secures AI systems deployed in 60% of Fortune 500 companies.

https://youtu.be/SWPnB-GADdE

**The Problem** 

Companies building AI agents and apps face a disproportionate amount of cybersecurity threats that put their business at risk. 73% of enterprises experienced at least one AI-related security incident (that they know of) in the past 12 months, with the average incident cost amounting to $4.8m. It takes 40% longer for companies to identify and address these AI-related incidents.

Existing solutions do not work for these companies:

1. Automated scans yield low-quality, noisy security findings.
2. Thorough security evaluations are cost-prohibitive to most companies.
3. New AI attack vectors are emerging faster than companies can adapt.

**Our Solution: Casco’s supervised, agentic red-teaming**

Casco proactively uncovers critical vulnerabilities before attackers do. Here’s how:

1. **Sophisticated, AI-Driven Attack Simulation:** Casco uses advanced techniques, just like an expert human red teamer, to devise and execute multi-step attacks against your AI agents and apps.
2. **Human-Validated Expertise:** The AI evaluations are supervised and validated by our team, ensuring high-fidelity findings. We’ve built and secured AI systems, applications, and cloud infrastructure at AWS, Microsoft, and the US government.
3. **Actionable, Compliance-Ready Reports:** Casco provides comprehensive reports with reproduction steps, risk explanations, and remediation guidance, aiding compliance with SOC 2, NIST AI RMF, EU AI Act, and ISO 27001.

**Our Story**

As founding members of the Generative AI team at AWS (Lead Engineer + Security, Head of Product), we witnessed the evolving landscape of AI agents and applications. We identified emerging security gaps as traditional security practices struggled to keep pace with this new paradigm.

Recognizing the critical need to secure AI systems, we decided to build Casco. Our mission is to empower builders to innovate confidently, knowing their AI systems are secure.

**Secure your AI agent and apps**

Is your AI agent or app secure?

* [**Book a Demo**](https://calendar.app.google/LZybyH27Pd4ScXPk6) to secure your AI systems

launches.title: Lucis - Live 100 healthy years from a simple blood test
launches.body:
Hey YC [👋](https://emojipedia.org/waving-hand)

We’re [Max B](https://www.linkedin.com/in/maximeberthelot/), [Baptiste](https://www.linkedin.com/in/bdebever/), and [Max G](https://www.linkedin.com/in/maxguerois/) - co-founders of [Lucis](https://www.lucis.life/).

### **TL;DR**

**Lucis turns regular blood tests into actionable health insights - so people can act before it’s too late.** In 4 months, we’ve helped 500 people in Paris get ahead of chronic diseases. Today, we’re expanding across Europe.

https://youtu.be/a5fX1K5hnvU

### **The Problem In Europe**

85% of deaths are caused by preventable chronic diseases. That’s more than 4 million lives lost every year just in Europe. Yet, the healthcare system remains reactive, and people receive care only after something goes wrong.

Those seeking comprehensive preventive care, including blood testing, analysis, and expert guidance, typically resort to private longevity clinics that charge over €50K per year. **Such premium healthcare remains inaccessible to the vast majority of people.**

### **Lucis: Health Insights in Your Pocket**

_“If you're tired of being in the dark about your health, not knowing where you stand or what to do next, Lucis is built for you.”_

Lucis goes beyond vague checkups and unreadable lab reports. It provides a clear health baseline, tracks progress over time, and translates complex biomarker data into personalized guidance people can actually implement in their daily lives. All at a fraction of the cost of a private clinic.

You’ll get answers to questions like:

_"Am I aging faster than I should?"_

_"Is my testosterone at a healthy level for my age?"_

_"How can I improve my next marathon performance?"_

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90454&key=user_uploads/1454634/0a347d82-7c9b-4fef-8c72-bf70511ce761)

Here’s how it works:

* 2 full health check-ups per year
* See how your body’s doing with 15 health scores and your biological age - and track your progress over time.
* Personalized action plan across nutrition, sleep, and movement
* Access to longevity add-on tests, like microbiome, continuous glucose monitoring, and food sensitivity tests.

### **The Team**

We started Lucis because we’ve lived the problem ourselves.

Baptiste lost a close relative to a condition that could’ve been caught earlier. Max B has spent the last decade deep in biohacking, testing everything from supplements to wearables. At 27, Max G turned his health into an experiment - tracking sleep, diet, and training - and improved nearly all of his biomarkers in the process. We know what it’s like to search for clarity and get none.

**Lucis is what we wish we had - and now, we’re building it for everyone else.**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90454&key=user_uploads/1454634/830d7470-4a85-446e-b427-38ec7343d441)

### **Since launching our beta just 4 months ago:**

* **30,000+ people** have joined our European longevity community.
* **30+ lab locations** opened across France
* **2 new European cities** - now live in Lisbon 🇵🇹 and London 🇬🇧
* **500+ people in Paris** used Lucis to get ahead of chronic illness
* **10 AI Startups** have gifted Lucis as a health benefit for their employees

## 

### **Our Vision**

**Lucis isn’t just a product - we’re building a completely new healthcare system in Europe.** One that lives with you. And works for you quietly, every day.

We started with blood, but our ambition goes far beyond a single input. We are building Lucis, the intelligence layer for your health. Right in your pocket.

### **Ask**

If this resonates with you

* Know someone in Europe who wants to live 100 healthy years? Use **“YCHEALTHY5”** for a 5% discount at checkout. 👉 [Lucis for you](https://www.lucis.life/)
* Want to gift Lucis to your employees? 👉 [Lucis for Startups](https://www.lucis.life/for-startup)
* For anything else, contact us at [founders@lucis.life](mailto:founders@lucis.life)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90454&key=user_uploads/1454634/6e40d23b-ed02-4d06-809b-20c4c1bb48fc)

throxy is building AI Sales Agents that book meetings for companies selling into traditional industries like manufacturing, logistics, education, and finance.

Outbound is broken—generic automation gets ignored, and legacy sectors are hard to crack. throxy fixes this by running bespoke, fully-managed outbound systems for sales teams. We combine AI Agents with human experts to deliver hyper-personalised campaigns that consistently generate six-figure qualified pipelines.

Since 2023, throxy has powered outbound for B2B companies, from industrial manufacturers to fintech providers, replacing the need for internal SDR teams or heaps of tools, with a solution that outperforms in both speed and quality.

Our founding team has built AI at JP Morgan, scaled businesses from age 14, and led enterprise sales from Seed to Series D. We’re not just automating outbound, we’re redefining what sales execution looks like in traditional industries.

throxy is the AI SDR purpose-built for the sectors software forgot.

launches.title: throxy | Book meetings without the busywork.
launches.body:
Hey everyone 👋 — we’re **Bergen**, **Pablo**, and **Arnau**, and we’re building **throxy**.

Hiring SDRs is expensive. Managing tools is a full-time job. Agencies spam your market and burn trust.

We started throxy in 2023 because we lived the chaos, and knew there had to be a better way.

<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3q1Ud9V5GP8>

### ❌ The Problem

* Building an SDR team takes months, and burns $150K+ before you see results.
* Tool stacks (Clay, Instantly, Apollo, etc.) require constant management and constantly break.
* Most agencies rely on automation and generic messaging that _kills trust_.

Companies selling into legacy industries suffer most, where reaching the right decision-makers requires **trust, precision, and care**.

If you’ve sold into sectors like manufacturing, logistics, healthcare, or finance, you’ve felt it: **complex buyers, long sales cycles, and real consequences.**

Spray-and-pray doesn’t work here.

**We win where others fail — in industries where trust isn’t optional, and precision means pipeline.**

### ✅ Why Throxy Wins

Where most AI sales tools generalise, **we specialise**.

We design, build, and run **fully-managed outbound systems, so you don’t have to** — combining AI-powered execution with human-level strategy.

You tell us your ICP and how many meetings you want. We handle the rest.

* 🔍 **AI-powered research** to find real decision-makers — not just job titles
* ✍️ **Hand-written** **messaging** with your buyer’s language — not templates
* 🛠 **Deliverability stack**: domains, warmup, inboxes — all done for you
* 🧠 **Human-led strategy** from operators who’ve sold in these sectors
* 📅 **Qualified meetings**, delivered to your calendar — no tools, no SDRs, no micromanagement

We’re already generating **six figures in pipeline** for B2B companies selling into hard-to-crack industries like manufacturing, logistics, finance and healthcare. Built for founders, CEOs, CROs, and sales teams.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90134&key=user_uploads/1293483/4da51dcd-3789-4946-af08-86ccf54ca594)

### 💡 Why We're Building This

We believe outbound should be **automated, intelligent, and deeply humanised,** not a messy stack of disconnected tools and guesswork.

Sales teams should focus on building relationships and closing deals, not juggling tools, bloated teams or manual workflows.

**throxy’s vision is a world where outbound is fully automated yet precisely human, freeing up human capital to think, connect, and close.**

### 👋 Meet the Founders

* **Bergen** built his first online business at 14 and brings operational execution at scale
* **Pablo** ran enterprise sales from Seed to Series D, and knows how to break into tough markets
* **Arnau** led early GPT-2 and BERT systems at JP Morgan and drives AI & product

### 👇 Want to see what “done-for-you” outbound _actually_ looks like?

We’re live. We’re booking meetings.

And we’re looking to partner with more companies targeting traditional industries.

If you're scaling outbound and are not getting results, let us run your outbound, so you can run your business.

📬 [founders@throxy.com](mailto:founders@throxy.com) | 🌐 [throxy.com](https://throxy.com/?utm_source=ycombinator&utm_medium=post&utm_campaign=yc_launch&utm_id=yc_launch)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90134&key=user_uploads/1293483/b5efeb76-2c0b-48ef-91c4-eeb1b4939e5f)

name: Lyra
one_liner: AI-Native Zoom For Revenue Teams
long_description:
At Lyra, we believe B2B sales hasn’t meaningfully evolved in decades — until now. The next industrial revolution is here, and we’re building the platform to power it.

Modern buyers want less talk, faster decisions, and seamless experiences. Lyra helps sales teams close more deals, shorten sales cycles, and operate more efficiently — all with minimal rep involvement.

We built our own meeting software from the ground up with a real-time AI agent at its core:
- Surfaces and personalizes relevant sales collateral using live conversation intelligence
- Keeps deals moving by answering buyer questions when reps are offline
- Replaces decks, screen shares, and long email threads with a single interactive workspace — called a Lyra. It hosts your meetings, onboarding, and integrates tools like DocuSign to give buyers a seamless path from first call to signed contract

Hundreds of sales calls are already hosted on Lyra, including several YC companies. We hit $100K ARR in our first two weeks.

We’re rethinking the sales stack from first call to signed contract.

launches.title: Theta: Self-Learning for AI Agents
launches.body:
### **TL;DR**

Theta is building self-learning and real-time adaptation for AI agents.

We’re starting with an intelligent memory layer so agents can remember and learn from previous interactions. With a simple four-line addition to your existing code, our memory layer uses real-time learning to analyze every run for mistakes and optimizations. The relevant insights are then passed on to your agent during future runs. 

We’ve already improved the accuracy of OpenAI Operator by 43% with 7x fewer steps taken. If you’re building AI agents where reliability and speed are priorities, book a meeting [here](https://calendly.com/d/cndj-84h-9qz) or contact us at [founders@thetasoftware.ai](mailto:founders@thetasoftware.ai).

\
https://youtu.be/TRNWfhyUI4E

### **The Current Approach**

Agents struggle to adapt to complex, real-world workflows. Workflows are dynamic, but agents remain static.

* They get stuck in loops, repeating mistakes and requiring constant human guidance in the right direction. Your prompts get longer and longer as you try to hard-code solutions.
* Even when your agent successfully completes a task, this long process starts all over again for any future run. Starting a new Cursor chat or Operator session means losing all of the insights and “aha moments” your agent had.

Learning is fundamentally iterative, but agents can’t learn because they have no memory across runs.

### **How Theta Works**

Theta is building the infrastructure for agents to self-learn and adapt in real-time. The first component is an intelligent memory layer that learns from your agent’s previous runs. Just add four lines of code to your agent stack to get started:

* At the end of the current run, Theta generates and embeds an analysis of your agent’s trajectory. It identifies critical steps and assesses overall performance.
* Before the next run, Theta generates a detailed plan based on the specified task. It gathers relevant insights and optimizations based on previous runs.
* With real-time learning, the memory layer continues to improve with more runs—meaning your agent gets better and better with zero human intervention.

Using this memory layer, we were able to improve the accuracy of OpenAI Operator by 43%. With optimized trajectories, Operator also took 7x fewer steps, resulting in better speed and cost.

### **Our Ask**

If you’re building agents that need to perform dynamic, real-world workflows at the highest accuracy and speed, reach out to [founders@thetasoftware.ai](mailto:founders@thetasoftware.ai) or book some time [here.](https://calendly.com/d/cndj-84h-9qz)

### **Our Team**

Rayan has previously done ML research as Head of Product at DeepSilicon. He’s been childhood friends with Tanmay since third grade, who previously built an AI browser and developed browser agents at MultiOn. During Rayan’s freshman year of college, he met Gurvir, who built distributed ML systems at Cornell, focusing on post-training and RL.

launches.title: Novoflow - The next-generation AI call center for the healthcare industry
launches.body:
Hey everyone 👋

We’re **Georges and Mathieu — co-founders of Novoflow**.

### **TL;DR**

Novoflow’s multilingual voice agent answers every inbound & outbound call, schedules directly inside any EHR (Epic, Athena, Medent—even 1990s HL7 feeds), and slashes no-shows. Clinics can reclaim **up to $50k/month** on average in missed revenue without hiring another receptionist.

https://youtu.be/LQA-QeiY_F4

### **❌ The Problem**

The old reception model is breaking. Outsourced call centers, dead-end IVRs, and half-integrated schedulers still miss 42% of patient calls. Each unbooked physician hour stacks into a $50,000 monthly loss in revenue per average independent clinic. Medical practices are stuck because decade-old and proprietary EHRs can’t accept real-time integrations from next-gen solutions.

### **🏥 Our Solution**

**Full-stack AI receptionist**

1. **24 / 7 voice AI** greets patients in 25+ languages, verifies insurance, and classifies intent in real-time.
2. **Universal EHR plumbing** writes, reschedules, or cancels appointments natively inside any system.
3. **One-hour go-live**: point our SIP trunk at the clinic’s number—no new phones, no code.
4. **Dashboard & KPIs**: abandonment, call-to-appointment conversion, provider utilization, no-show rate.

Early adopters project a **10% jump in provider utilization** and a **22% lift in call-to-appointment conversion**—with happier patients to match.

### **🙏 Our Ask**

* Know an independent clinic, multi-specialty group, or surgery center bleeding revenue to missed calls?
* Have friends or family running front-desk operations that need multilingual coverage?
* Want to beta-test features like outbound recall automation or balance-due collection?

👉 Intro us! We’re only onboarding **3 more clinics this month**.

[mathieu@novoflow.io](mailto:mathieu@novoflow.io) | [georges@novoflow.io](mailto:georges@novoflow.io)

### **Why We’re Building This**

We spent two years as French & Spanish medical interpreters. Receptionists called us after hours because patients couldn’t communicate, and clinics lost money while care was delayed. We realized **voice AI + universal EHR integration** could fix the bottleneck for the 100k+ clinics still trapped by legacy software.

### **👬 The Team**

* **Georges** – CMU engineer and in the voice AI agent space for 5+ years.
* **Mathieu** – Emory University Scholar, ex-medical interpreter, been in the healthcare space for 2+ years

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90451&key=user_uploads/1763646/7ced6963-dce3-4c84-8854-0c11fbe5cf2f)

We fly on-site, launch the same week, and target **$40k+ monthly savings** per clinic.

Thanks for reading — tear apart our approach, ask tough questions, or just say hi!

launches.title: Prism - AI that watches session replays and tells developers what to fix 🔍
launches.body:
Hey everyone 👋

We're [Alex](https://x.com/spicy_liu), [Land](https://x.com/LTantichot), and [Rajit](https://x.com/RajitWrites) - co-founders of [Prism](https://x.com/teamprismai).

# **TL;DR:**

Prism is an AI that watches session replays and tells developers what to fix.

https://youtu.be/xmvlRom8BNA

# **Problem**

At Rajit’s previous company, they built a new onboarding flow, set up a dashboard to analyze it, and realized that it was broken. The problem was that this realization came four months later.

This is the core insight that led us to start Prism.

Existing product analytics solutions are inflexible. They require comprehensive instrumentation and break every time an engineer adds a new flow or modifies an existing one.

With Prism, developers get insight into what's broken on day one. No event-tracking necessary.

# **Solution**

Prism uses vision models to watch session replays and identify friction. For our customers, it's like having a support engineer sit with every one of their users.

People get value from Prism in one of two ways.

### 1. Semantic search

_Rather than watching hundreds of hours of session replays, developers can ask “what are the main pain points users are experiencing?”_

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90346&key=user_uploads/551584/e3e366c0-be08-4b7d-a351-dd8f6deea3f3)

### 2. Insight generation

_Prism identifies what the issue is, who’s experiencing it, and what a developer can do to resolve it._

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90346&key=user_uploads/551584/fc5fd965-6693-45d1-ae61-a323920f205e)

# One more thing...

While building software may be increasingly commoditized, we believe that the relationship people have with their users will never be. Prism is an AI that enables our customers to know their users better than they know themselves.

If you want to become customer-obsessed, you can get started at [prismreplay.com](http://prismreplay.com).

You can also book a demo to chat with us at [cal.com/team/prismai/demo](http://cal.com/team/prismai/demo).

Mobile bugs hurt: crashes kill ratings, broken checkouts drive churn. QualGent helps teams scale QA effortlessly and avoid Sonos-level disasters.

With prior research experience at Nvidia, Maryland, and Berkeley, the team saw a clear opportunity: use AI to scale QA.

QualGent’s vision is to close the loop on software creation. As AI enables engineers to code 100x faster, QualGent eliminates the next bottleneck—software verification—unlocking truly scalable, end-to-end software development.

launches.title: QualGent: AI Quality Assurance agent for mobile software testing
launches.body:
Today, we’re launching QualGent, an AI Quality Assurance agent for mobile that helps companies catch more bugs and ship much faster without hiring more human QA testers. One customer hit **#3 in the App Store’s Education category** by improving their app quality and release process with QualGent.

https://youtu.be/k1eSm6QvO9c

**🐛 The Problem: Mobile QA is a Bottleneck**

Shipping a great mobile app is hard. Even top teams struggle with flaky end-to-end tests, missed edge cases, and regressions that slip past CI.

Script-based automation tools like Playwright, Selenium, Appium or Espresso break often. Visual diff tools miss functional bugs. And in-house human QA teams can’t scale with today’s release cycles.

CTOs, VPs, Directors of Eng, and QA leads at fast-growing companies are asking:

> Why does our test suite say green when our users say broken?

**🛠️ Why We Built This: From frustrated mobile engineers to reinventing QA**

We’ve been mobile engineers at Google who shipped products like Android XR, Quick Share, Stadia, and foldable phones. We’ve seen firsthand how slow, flaky QA can derail a great product. We built QualGent so teams can catch real bugs faster, ship with confidence, and stop wasting time maintaining fragile tests.

We're grateful to be part of the YC community and excited to bring modern AI to a painful, expensive problem that slows down almost every mobile team we’ve met.

**⚙️ The Solution: QualGent - Your AI QA Copilot**

QualGent uses computer-use LLM agents and vision models to mimic a real human tester:

1. You describe a test in natural language (“Sign up, go to settings, change theme”)
2. Our AI agent runs that test on real iOS and Android devices in the cloud
3. It taps, swipes, scrolls, types, speaks, listens - just like a human
4. And gives you video, logs, and test reports for every step

No more rigid scripting. No more emulator-only limits. No more test maintenance hell.

Our AI agent self-heals, handles dynamic pop-up content, navigates unexpected UI changes, and catches bugs like a pro.

**🧠 Our Vision: Complete the AI coding-testing loop to ship quality products 100x faster**

Our vision is to close the loop on software creation. As AI enables engineers to code 100x faster, QualGent eliminates the next bottleneck—software verification—unlocking truly scalable, end-to-end product-driven software development.

**📢 Try it and Help Us Spread the Word: Let’s reimagine mobile QA together**

1. Book a demo with us and see QualGent in action on your app!
2. Know someone leading mobile engineering? We’d love a warm intro.

We rethought what QA could be with AI, you’ll want to test this. Let’s make releasing great mobile apps a joy again.

https://qualgent.ai

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90415&key=user_uploads/297983/ad94ce99-b2ca-43c6-91b8-0131fbe39fc2)

launches.title: Human Behavior: We reveal why users stay, leave, or pay
launches.body:
![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90280&key=user_uploads/2397615/2f936c17-95eb-44f0-9823-8f500e75a907)

🎥 What if there’s an AI that watches every user so it has full contextual understanding of your webapp. 

**tl;dr:** We’re just that! By analyzing all session replays, we extract behavior patterns that drive retention & revenue – without requiring manual event tracking. We sell to product teams at high growth startups like Delve, Conduit, etc.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Dvt3COkC-U

**Can’t watch all your session replay videos?** We’d love to talk to you: [founders@humanbehavior.co](mailto:founders@humanbehavior.co) or https://cal.com/humanbehavior-founders/30min 

**❌ The Problem**

Two options to understand how your product is used:

1. Product analytics (like Mixpanel or Amplitude): Great for aggregating data but miss user context.
2. Session replays capture absolutely everything, but there's no good way to aggregate them to learn anything useful.

"How many users abandon my product after a long LLM generation time? How long do enterprise vs free users spend on feature X?" These questions become difficult to answer with traditional methods.

**💡Our Solution**

We built Human Behavior to give you the best of both worlds using vision AI that actually watches your users. No more choosing between high-level analytics or drowning in session videos!

Without AI, thousands of session videos can be overwhelming. Now you'll never have to set manual feature tracking again – retroactively explore feature usage patterns from all your past users without wasting engineering time and effort.\
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D12guaaJeJ8

**👬 The Team**

We're Amogh (Stanford CS), Skyler (Berkeley CS), and Chirag (UChicago CS) and we've spent countless hours watching session replays ourselves. We worked on VLM research at Stanford NLP Group and UChicago Database Group, commercializing it to give the best customer behavior insights.

**🤝Our ask:** 

* Check us out at https://www.humanbehavior.co/!
* Stay in touch! If you know any companies with too many replays, we'll watch it for them! We'd also love to understand how you'd use the product. Email us at [founders@humanbehavior.co](mailto:founders@humanbehavior.co) 
* If you like what you see, we'd love to chat! Book a call with us here: https://cal.com/humanbehavior-founders/30min

 

_(P.S. Thanks to [gatekeep.ai](http://gatekeep.ai) for letting us use their data for a demo!)_

launches.title: Alkali – The AI Copilot for Chemical Process Design
launches.body:
**TL;DR:** Scaling a chemical process from lab-scale result to commercial plant can take years and hundreds of millions of dollars. Alkali’s Engineering Copilot (ProcessMate) uses AI to catch process design errors and automate equipment sourcing – keeping your projects on time and on budget.

[Demo!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JRsBGalf-7k)

**The Problem:**

As chemical engineers, we’ve seen how design errors and procurement delays derail project schedules and budgets:

* **Engineering Rework:** Projects often undergo 10+ design iterations due to incorrect equipment selection, overlooked safety requirements, or careless design errors.
* **Procurement Delays:** Complex part sourcing, manual quote/response workflows, and relentless vendor follow-up (chasing confirmations, shipments, exceptions) can delay projects by months.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90604&key=user_uploads/2744343/38799444-2d92-431e-9e5c-807e9fe1bbbb)

**Our Solution:**

[Alkali Engineering](https://alkali.engineering/)’s ProcessMate platform streamlines error checking and procurement. Free engineers to do creative work, get projects built on time!

1. **AI-Driven Design Checks** – Like an engineering spell-check for your schematics, AI identifies design errors before it’s too late.
2. **Smart Equipment Selection** – Cross reference your engineering designs and vendor catalogues to help you get the right parts, faster.
3. **Version Control & Chat Interface** – Interpretable version control for engineering schematics. Version control is no longer just for software engineers!

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90604&key=user_uploads/2744343/c4d82b46-885d-4547-b33e-ede8406b033f)

**The Team:**

* [Emmett Goodman](https://www.linkedin.com/in/emmett-goodman/) (PhD, Stanford – ex-AWS GenAI Labs): Led delivery of GenAI solutions for AWS’s flagship customers, showcasing “art of the possible” solutions.
* [Victor Miller](https://www.linkedin.com/in/victor-v-a514248b/) (PhD, Berkeley – ex-Shell Engineer): Led 8-figure chemical engineering infrastructure projects.

**Our Ask:**

We’re looking to talk to:

* Project managers fighting schedule overruns
* Industrial vendors wanting faster RFP/RFQ cycles
* EPC/Engineering firms interested in piloting AI-driven design validation and procurement

👇 Know someone who fits? Email us at [founders@alkali-eng.com](mailto:founders@alkali-eng.com) !

name: Besimple AI
one_liner: We make data annotation simple
long_description:
Spin up your own data annotation platform in 60 seconds!

High-quality, human-reviewed data is essential for improving AI models.  Yet, many teams still use outdated tools or spreadsheets that aren’t built for complex data from LLMs and AI agents. This slows down iteration, drives up costs, and makes model performance unpredictable in real-world use.

With Besimple, you can generate your own platform for annotating AI evaluation and training data instantly.  Simply paste or stream any type of raw data—text, chat, audio, video, or LLM outputs—and we'll instantly generate a tailored annotation interface, clear guidelines, and an automated human-in-the-loop workflow.  Our AI Judges quickly learn from human annotations, take over labeling for easy cases, and evaluate live production data, letting your team focus only on critical edge cases.

Key differentiators
1. Instant custom UI - Automatically generate tailored annotation interfaces just by uploading your data. Adjust easily whenever data or needs change.
2. Tailored guidelines – Import any existing guidelines or we will draft new ones aligned with your business goals, ready for annotation
3. AI Judges for real-time evaluation – AI-powered judges continuously improve by learning human preferences, automatically labeling data and flagging tough cases for expert review.
4. Enterprise-grade deployment – On-prem optional install, and robust user management for internal SMEs, external vendors, or Besimple’s vetted annotators.
5. Lightning-Fast Setup: No code, no plugins—just drop in your data, set guidelines, and you’re good to go.

Today we power evaluation and training pipelines for leading AI companies in customer support, search, education, and more.  For example, the leading AI grading company Edexia uses besimple to annotate hundreds of decisions and improve their evals.

Besimple is built by a team that has done this before. Yi Zhong and Bill Wang built the annotation platform for Meta’s Llama models, significantly improving quality of data and shortening model development cycle.

Reach out!

If you’re building an AI product and struggle with good eval or training data —or if you have models in prod with no idea why they fail—let’s talk. We’ll show you how to launch a custom annotation flow in a minute, bootstrap an AI Judge in an afternoon, and start shipping better models tomorrow.

launches.title: Besimple AI – Spin up your own data annotation platform in 60 seconds🚀
launches.body:
Hey there!  We are [Yi](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yzhong94/) and [Bill](https://www.linkedin.com/in/8illwang/), from [Besimple AI](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/besimple-ai)!  Struggling with data annotation?  Keep reading!

💎 **TLDR**

With Besimple, you can generate your own platform for annotating AI eval and training data instantly.  Simply paste or stream any type of raw data and we'll instantly generate a tailored annotation interface, clear guidelines, an automated human-in-the-loop workflow, and AI judges to scale your insights.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hw-EVKdOhds

## **❌ The Problem**

High-quality, human-reviewed data is essential for improving AI models. But teams today face significant challenges:

* **Complex LLM Workflows**: Most AI startups and even the largest AI companies use spreadsheets for annotations to “move fast”. It is brittle. And it breaks down quickly for dynamic, multimodal, agent-based LLM use cases.
* **Annotation Bottlenecks**: As models get better, only domain experts and someone on your team can improve model performance.  They quickly get overwhelmed when guidelines and data change constantly. This is expensive and slows model iteration.
* **No Feedback Loop**: After a model ships, interesting production data isn’t automatically fed back into evaluation or training, missing opportunities for ongoing improvement.

## **✅ Our Solution:** 

1. Instant custom UI: Just paste or stream your data and we create a custom annotation UI for your task.  We support text, chat, audio, video, LLM traces, and more. 
2. Tailored guidelines: Import any existing guidelines or we will draft new ones aligned with your business goals, ready for annotation
3. AI Judges for real-time evaluation: LLM-based “judges” continuously learn from incoming annotations to evaluate live traffic and flag borderline cases for human review.
4. Enterprise-grade deployment: On-prem optional install, and robust user management for internal SMEs, external vendors, or Besimple’s vetted annotators.
5. Lightning fast setup: No code, no plugins—just drop in your data, set guidelines, and you’re good to go.

**Traction:** The leading AI grading company Edexia uses besimple to annotate hundreds of decisions and improve their evals.

## **The Team**

We’re **Yi Zhong** and **Bill Wang** —who built the annotation platform for Meta’s Llama models. We founded Besimple AI to help everyone spin up a Scale AI in 60s.

# **🙏 Our asks**

We’re on a mission to make _continuous, high-quality data_ the easiest part of AI development. If that resonates, let’s chat!

1. Reach us at [**founders@besimple.ai**](mailto:founders@besimple.ai)
2. Book demo [here](https://calendly.com/yi-besimple/besimple-ai-intro-call).
3. Or join our self-serve waitlist on our [website](https://besimple.ai/)!

We’ll show you how to launch a custom annotation platform in under a minute!

launches.title: Jazzberry - AI bug finding with real code execution
launches.body:
Hello everyone, 

We’re Mateo and Marco, and we're excited to introduce Jazzberry, an AI agent for finding bugs. Jazzberry is powered by running your code in a secure sandbox and integrates directly into your pull request workflow on GitHub.

**Try it here →** <https://jazzberry.ai>

<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L6ZTu86qK8U>

**Why we built Jazzberry**

AI code generation has dramatically increased the amount of code that is written without the tools for bug finding keeping up, leading to a world with more buggy code that is hindering developers. To improve bug finding, we’ve created an AI agent with the ability to run snippets of your code. We're not just flagging potential issues based on code patterns; we're observing the real behavior of your software. Here’s how it works.

1. When you create a pull request, Jazzberry gets to work.
2. Your repository is cloned into a microVM.
3. Our agent examines the contents of the pull request to guide its search. It can write and execute code in the microVM as it looks for bugs.
4. Jazzberry returns a clear markdown table directly as a comment.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90047&key=user_uploads/2557020/31d75b00-abc3-4a60-8ef5-b3a685edfcd5)

**Real Bugs, Real Impact**

We've already seen Jazzberry make a tangible difference for our early users. So far, Jazzberry has…

* successfully identified a SQL injection vulnerability
* discovered a critical logical error in API key validation
* [found an incorrect page navigation](https://blog.openint.dev/how-we-scale-prs/) (see below, we are formerly known as Prophet)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90047&key=user_uploads/2557020/864328cf-c4b9-4b9a-b267-e9059a158f32)

**Who we are**

We have been friends for over a decade, and are coming together to create Jazzberry. Marco completed his MS at the University of Stellenbosch specializing in LLMs for automated test suite generation. Mateo completed his PhD at the University of Colorado Boulder with a research focus on reinforcement learning and formal methods.

**Our Ask**

* **Try it out** – Jazzberry is available now with a free trial at <https://jazzberry.ai>.
* **Contact us** – We’d love to hear your feedback and what bugs Jazzberry helps you catch. Reach us at [founders@jazzberry.ai](mailto:founders@jazzberry.ai).
launches.tagline: We're creating the best AI agent for bug finding

founders.title: Founder

founders.founder_bio: Building Vesence.
founders.title: Founder

launches.title: Vesence: Cursor for Transactional Lawyers
launches.body:
**TL;DR:** We are building Cursor for Lawyers. We turn Microsoft Word into an IDE for contracts, and build agents operating in the background. Our initial focus is on Transactional Law Firms, and agents built for quality-assuring projects and documents according to the firm’s best practice.

We have already rolled out Vesence firm-wide at our first enterprise client with a lot of love from both associates and partners.

Know any Transactional Lawyers? Let’s connect: [founders@vesence.com](mailto:founders@vesence.com).

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nr1Q7S6A84I

**Problem:**

Imagine programming in Apple Notes.

No linting, no cursor, you are on your own.

That is how it is for many lawyers to draft and review contracts in Microsoft Word.

At law firms, the stakes are extremely high. Every mistake can hurt your reputation badly. Associates need to deliver under time pressure, partners demand extreme attention to detail, and your clients will not accept any blunders.

Given the attention to detail needed in the work, working on complex projects under constant time pressure, we are starting with quality-assuring agents (i.e. a linting system for contracts).

The consequences of shipping "bugs" in a legal document can be catastrophic, but even the best firm still rely on manual review to catch mistakes.

**What We’ve Built**

Vesence offers quality assurance AI agents available straight in Microsoft Word to handle tasks such as:

* **Apply firm-wide Standards**: Apply writing style guides and best practices consistently across all practice groups in the firm
* **Ensure project-level alignment**: Flag inconsistencies across multiple deal documents, for example auto-checking the SPA against the original term sheet
* **Verify document consistency**: Catch defined term slips, bad cross-references, logical gaps, and miscalculations within a single document

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90570&key=user_uploads/2486274/99f83828-eeb2-4d36-9c69-e8401e4ab7b5)

**Why This Matters**

Let’s hear it from our users:

“You saved me 4 hours last night.”

“I’m never sending out a document/project again unless I’ve used Vesence.”

“This is how AI should feel like. Intuitive and extremely helpful.”

**Associates** love Vesence as they can produce exceptional internal deliveries under less pressure to seniors and partners. **Partners** love the tool as their teams hand them better quality work and follows the firm’s best practices.

The interest we have seen from transactional law firms is great, but we also received inbound from other professional service providers that care deeply about quality and the reputation of their firms, including Investment Banks and Management Consultants.

Basically, the holy trinity of where the ‘pls fix’ culture thrives.

**Who We Are**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90570&key=user_uploads/2486274/e3b7f4e8-f03a-448d-9af8-fabe96a9feea)

The founders **Henrik Hansson** and **Ludvig Swanström** have known each other for 8 years, and worked together at the YC startup Depict S20 (founded by the CEO and Founder of Lovable).

To build Vesence, we spent a couple of months living at a law firm, to refine the product and user experience alongside lawyers.

We have already rolled out the product firm-wide at a law firm.

**Our Ask**

Know any partners, innovation managers, or associates at transactional law firms? Please connect us!

Have you ever worked at a law firm, management consultancy firm, or an investment bank and faced brutal pls fix tasks? Please share them with us!

Reach out to us at: [founders@vesence.com](mailto:founders@vesence.com)
launches.tagline: AI Agents inside of Microsoft Office for Transactional Law Firms.

launches.title: Klavis AI: Open Source MCP integrations for AI Applications
launches.body:
![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXfaf-JCp7xVd7cfcFqnv8fCZLojSwklRbqBbGneCbhutbc4iEcgcNNQ46j73KsOKaN3qH5fhVCVUQQpp696KnBWJfz5DnhcuS5nqKod2-9Fn2p-LJ3Yd9rEM9zIJg11ce5bTmkp-Q?key=HpOTxrRvVOxut3yp-iTaNhMb)

Hey Everyone 👋,

We are [Xiangkai](https://www.linkedin.com/in/xiangkai-zeng/) and [Zihao](https://www.linkedin.com/in/zihaolin123/) - co-founders of [Klavis AI](https://www.klavis.ai/).

**TL;DR**

Klavis AI provides [open source](https://github.com/Klavis-AI/klavis) MCP integration for AI applications. Integrate enterprise-grade MCP servers with your AI application in a minute, and scale to millions of users using our open-source, hosted MCP servers with multi-tenancy auth, and skip MCP client-side development hassle.

**Ask:** Can you introduce us to companies working on AI agents and applications that need different external integrations? Contact us at [xiangkaiz@klavis.ai](mailto:xiangkaiz@klavis.ai).

Launch video: https://youtu.be/HFn5xWC6cAk

**The Problem**

* **Missing Native Authentication & User-based Authentication:** Lack of built-in and user-based authentications in MCP servers creates security risks and adds development complexity, hindering production use.
* **Lack of Enterprise-Grade Servers:** Available MCP servers are frequently underdeveloped personal projects, lacking stability, features, and remote capabilities essential for enterprise environments.
* **Client-Side Connection Barrier**: Accessing MCP servers requires developing the clients, creating technical overhead and hindering adoption, especially for existing function calling infrastructures that lack native MCP support.

**The Solution**

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcq7Lridm_hh7ACd4DFh6Zcsc38dMU3Kp8X9MdK55P_JuQVQ-ZMA6Pc75Qs7C0wc3vDdjlMOVmTCHNVZ-5MUpNbrLibGrFzzcARZme9csIpjPP5yENtddc01TW1newc1A1pGFepKw?key=HpOTxrRvVOxut3yp-iTaNhMb)

Klavis AI solves these problems by:

* **Secure, Enterprise-Grade Hosted Servers:** Launch stable, enterprise-grade MCP servers instantly via API. Our hosted solution includes built-in OAuth & multi-tenancy auth, eliminating security gaps and complexity.
* **Skip Client Development Hassle:** Use our API to connect any remote MCP servers from your existing backend, or let users interact immediately through our pre-built Web, Slack, and Discord clients.
* **Trust Through Open Source:** Our MCP servers and clients are open source, ensuring transparency and fostering community trust.

**Concrete Example**

Imagine you want your AI agent to interact with your company's Jira. Instead of building a custom Jira integration and wrestling with authentication, use Klavis AI. With simple API calls, you instantly get a secure, hosted Jira MCP server ready to go. It handles OAuth and user-level authentications automatically, letting your AI securely query tickets right away – no MCP client coding required.

**Why Us**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90202&key=user_uploads/259581/6621b1de-ea41-46f4-bc9e-97b0676a7c97)

Xiangkai previously worked as a Senior Software Engineer on the Google Gemini at Google Deepmind. His work involves building the function calling infrastructure for Gemini and supporting multiple Gemini agentic feature launches. The challenges in the MCP space resonate strongly with his background, and he's very excited to bring his insights and energy to accelerate innovation here.

Zihao previously worked on Lyft’s Rider team and Nordstrom’s analytical data platform team, with expertise in scaling systems for millions of users and NLP background from University and Master studies.

**🙏 Our Asks**

* **Share & Intro:** Can you share this post and introduce us to companies working on AI agents and applications that need different external integrations?
* **Connect:** Email me at [xiangkaiz@klavis.ai](mailto:xiangkaiz@klavis.ai) if you’d like to learn more or chat.
launches.tagline: Klavis AI is open source MCP integrations for AI Applications. Our API provides hosted, secure MCP servers, eliminating auth management and client-side code.
