launches.title: ParaQuery - 5x your data warehouse's efficiency
launches.body:
![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90162&key=user_uploads/1091672/94e086c6-918d-4975-94ca-5aece8bff85a)

Hey, I'm Win, founder of [ParaQuery](http://www.paraquery.com).

We're building a bigger query engine with up to 5x cost efficiency compared to BigQuery by using cost-efficient cloud GPUs.

**Ask:** Do you know someone optimizing their data warehouse? Email [win@paraquery.com](mailto:win@paraquery.com) or sign up [here](https://paraquery.com/waitlist)!

**4x'ing** BigQuery efficiency with ParaQuery: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uu379YnccGU> 

# **The Problem**

Data is the new oil and you're feeding your products with a bunch of it. But to do so, you need to build, maintain, and optimize your data infra. That's either a huge timesink, or you're bleeding cash to ignore it, or someone is breathing down your neck about this month's cloud bill. Why can't we just ship features?

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90162&key=user_uploads/1091672/419acb3d-1195-4842-a80e-df02ac0d332f)

Whether it's those 20-minute+ Presto queries, or your exploding BigQuery bill (which happens to be tracked in real time), your data infra is letting you down.

# **Our Solution**

ParaQuery runs on highly-parallel, throughput-optimized cloud-available hardware, perfect for data processing workloads: **GPUs**!

Our system abstracts out the infra required to serverlessly accelerate your logic. With the extreme efficiency of GPUs, it's half the cost and double the performance of competing solutions like Databricks and BigQuery, without any platform commitments.

For SQL-based data warehouses like BigQuery, you can use ParaQuery with minimal changes to your queries. And since it's fully Spark-compatible, there's no vendor lock-in. It integrates with literally anything which has a Spark connector, on any major cloud. We can even deploy on GPU clouds.

ParaQuery makes data processing as simple as specifying:

1. Inputs
2. Output
3. Logic
4. Run!

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90162&key=user_uploads/1091672/a6cded39-2da7-432b-9129-014a593caaae)

# **Why?**

I've been looking into GPUs and parallel programming for over 12 years – starting out with crypto. I left that field pretty fast, but I never stopped thinking about efficient compute and GPU acceleration. Even more so when, years later, I had to wait for my laptop to finish 18-hour physics simulations. And during my professional career, I've also had to wait on my fair share of 20-minute+ analytical queries.

In fact, I hate waiting. ParaQuery is productizing an arbitrage of hardware efficiency, and I'm not waiting any longer to do so.

# **Ask**

1\. If you know anyone who is running any big data processing scenarios (including MLOps), I'd love to learn more about their use case and see if we're a fit! 

2\. If you want to try it out, sign up for our waitlist at [www.paraquery.com](http://www.paraquery.com), or just email me ([win@paraquery.com](mailto:win@paraquery.com))
launches.tagline: ParaQuery is the GPU-accelerated Spark + SQL engine for your big data needs.

name: MorphoAI
one_liner: AI powered CAD for robotics and machine engineering
long_description:
We're building an AI powered platform for engineers that are building new robots and machines. 

We allow users to invent and modify machine designs in a matter of minutes, not years. Ayna and Andy, the co-founders, met during their time at Harvard and started this in 2024 as their programs were wrapping up. We're commercializing 10+ years research done by our team at Harvard and MIT on this space. Our team wrote the very first papers on applying GenAI and optimization algorithms to compose robots from parts and applying computational design to fine tune machine designs. We're bringing in our deep knowledge of modifying equipment and integrating it into factories keenly understanding what makes hardware hard. 

We take in parts under consideration, constraints and tasks at hand and our algorithm formulates and fine tunes from 100s of possible design options. All in a few clicks, so engineers can push hardware to market faster and companies can benefit from the inventions being done by their R&D teams. We already have two paying customers in the OEM and system integrator spaces. 

We are venture backed and supported by a GBP 2.5MM grant by ARIA, the UK Government's invention agency.

launches.title: MorphoAI - AI‑powered computer‑aided invention for robotics and machine engineering
launches.body:
We’re Ayna and Andrew, and we’re building [MorphoAI](https://morpho.ai/). We’re a team of manufacturing tech experts and MIT PhDs who have written 30+ papers on foundational research of AI design methods for robotics engineering. We met at Harvard last year and decided to help people develop hardware at the speed of software. 

In our research, we demonstrated capabilities that allowed engineers to generate 100s of verified optimal designs from parts and task requirements in minutes, and now we’re translating those findings to a product for robotics & automation. We’re cutting R&D cycles by 50 %+ and letting teams ship better hardware, faster!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iGmXIsoUc2Y&feature=youtu.be

### **Problem**

Designing a new robot, machine, or work‑cell still feels like 1985: weeks of manual CAD drawing, long prototype‑and‑test loops, and “does it even work?” uncertainty. A single product can take 40‑100 iterations and burn through months of engineering time. This all amounts to $240B spent on mechanical design each year. https://www.morpho.ai/ 

### **Our Take**

What if you could take requirements and ideas into _validated machine designs_ automatically? We’re building that for hardware—so engineers can explore more, better-performing designs, fine-tune the ones likely to work, and land on an optimal design before the first part is cut. Engineers input and tasks and constraints (_what the robot must do)_ and their favorite parts to build with, and MorphoAI’s software auto‑generates, verifies, and fine tunes manufacturable designs in minutes—cutting R&D cycles by 50 %+ and letting teams ship new hardware faster. 

### **The MorphoAI Platform**

1. **Generate** hundreds of verified design candidates from parts and task requirements in minutes, and select the concepts to fine-tune.
2. **Simulate** full‑dynamical behavior with optimal, verified controllers.
3. **Optimize** for cost, performance, weight, manufacturability, and more.

The result is a ready‑to‑manufacture machine design, programmable motions, and BOM—delivered in minutes, not months.

### **Team**

* **Ayna Arora** (CEO, Co-founder) – Harvard Business School; Former VC, 2x founder in manufacturing tech setting up factories across the world.
* **Andy Spielberg, PhD** (CTO, Co-founder) – MIT CSAIL; Harvard PostDoc (digital manufacturing). 30+ papers on Optimization algorithms in robotics design.
* Founding team: Allan Zhao (MIT PhD on GenAI for robot design), Amira Abdel-Rahman (Havard + MIT PhD on design for hardware) Han Wang (simulation expert in research+industry).

We’re also backed by ARIA (UK Government’s Invention Agency) with a 2.5MM GBP Grant.

### **What’s Possible Today**

Our early users are:

* Resizing robot geometry and motors to maximize reach and payloads.
* Redesigning workcells to minimize costs, design time, and improve margins.
* Auto-generating new end-of-arm tooling designs from parts in hours, not weeks

### **Big Picture**

MorphoAI is the “compiler” for the physical world. As we expand our capabilities, any company will be able to invent machines that were previously infeasible— shrinking $MM R&D budgets and accelerating everything from factory automation to medical innovation to planetary exploration.

### **Let’s Talk**

Building a new robot or a new cutting-edge machine? We’d love to talk. Drop us a note at [**hello@morpho.ai**](mailto:hello@morpho.ai) .
launches.tagline: Turn parts and task requirements into working machine designs in minutes, not years.

He holds a PhD from TU Wien and has worked with NIST, Microsoft Research, NII Tokyo, and Nvidia. Aldo has also advised startups and enterprises on building reliable, real-world AI systems.

launches.title: Eloquent AI: The AI Operator for Financial Services
launches.body:
**🎯TL;DR**

Eloquent AI is the first AI Operator built specifically for financial services to automate complex, regulated customer service operations beyond frontline support. 

Our AI Operator learns to securely navigate your existing systems simply by observing your standard operating procedures (SOPs)—automating up to 96% of tasks without any engineering effort.

[Introducing Eloquent AI](https://youtu.be/vsPg2VFtSt4)

**🙏Our Ask**

**If you’re running a fintech or insurtech and looking to automate customer service operations, we’d love to help.** Just reach out at [founders@eloquentai.co](mailto:founders@eloquentai.co).

**❌ The Problem**

Financial institutions want AI-driven efficiency, yet adoption remains below 1%. Why? Generic AI agents fail in regulated environments due to: 

↳ Constant hallucinations 

↳ Compliance risks

↳ Heavy engineering requirements stalling action automation

Financial services require AI built specifically for regulated workflows—seamlessly integrated into legacy systems, delivering reliable actions, not dead-end conversations.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90355&key=user_uploads/2611648/abf0478b-90df-4099-ada2-236b3510cb84)

**✅ Eloquent AI: End-to-end customer support automation. Zero APIs required.**

Unlike  generic AI agents, Eloquent AI goes beyond frontline support to fully automate customer support end-to-end. Instead of relying on cumbersome API integrations that require long dev cycles, our AI Operator learns directly from observing your SOPs and team’s actions, securely navigating your internal systems exactly as human agents do.

**Automate complex, multi-party workflows**—unfreeze accounts, handle AML/KYC checks, adjust repayments, or update claim statuses without escalations.

**Deploy rapidly with no internal engineering required**—Eloquent AI learns securely by observing your team through multimodal technology, enabling our operator to reason and interact across both language and visual inputs.

**Ensure compliance effortlessly** with our proprietary LLM, Oratio, trained specifically on your financial regulations for secure, auditable interactions.

**Integrate seamlessly**—connect AI directly to your CRM, databases, and support platforms for chat, voice and email support.

**Confidently resolve complex queries**, ensure accurate routing, and eliminate hallucinations through continuous simulation and rigorous evaluation.

**🚀 The Impact**

Trusted by leading financial institutions, Eloquent AI drives immediate operational efficiency:

* **24/7 Coverage:** Consistent, high-quality customer experience across all channels.
* **Up to 96% Automation**: Scalable automation handling nearly all regulated customer requests.
* **4x Cost Reduction:** Significant operational savings, achievable in weeks.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90355&key=user_uploads/2611648/9e7d65b6-d1d6-4728-895e-c7d72e1444f7)

## **See What Eloquent AI Can Do For You**

Tired of wrestling with generic AI and manual workflows? Eloquent AI gives you fully automated, compliant customer operations—with zero coding required.

📅 Book your demo: https://calendly.com/tugce-eloquentai/demo

📬Reach us directly: [founders@eloquentai.co](mailto:founders@eloquentai.co)

**Founders**

Eloquent AI is founded by [Tugce Bulut](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tugcebulut/), a second-time entrepreneur with deep expertise deploying large-scale AI solutions for Fortune 500 enterprises, and [Dr. Aldo Lipani](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aldo-lipani/), a Machine Learning professor, who also runs a research lab specializing in multimodal LLMs.

name: Scalar Field
one_liner: Reinventing the trading terminal — one intelligent agent at a time.
long_description:
We are Scalar Field, and we are redefining the Bloomberg terminal with AI.

Founded by Aman (ex-Tower, ex-Goldman) and Ramakant (ex-Microsoft), Scalar Field is already trusted by 800 traders, generating $74,000 per month in revenue.

Our core hypothesis is simple: whenever an analyst, trader, or quant looks at a Bloomberg or FactSet terminal, they are—consciously or subconsciously—trying to verify a hypothesis. Current terminals make this process cumbersome, requiring users to sift through endless screens of data.

At Scalar Field, we are rebuilding the trading terminal from the ground up, enabling users to directly test their hypotheses in real time, cutting through the noise and accelerating decision-making.

founders.founder_bio: Building the future of trading research
founders.title: Founder

launches.title: Scalar Field: Reinventing the Trading Terminal, One Intelligent Agent at a Time
launches.body:
Hey YC! I’m [Aman](https://www.linkedin.com/in/amandeep-singh0/) (ex-trader from Tower Research and Goldman Sachs), building **Scalar Field** with my co-founder [Ramakant](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ramakant-yadav1/) (ex-Microsoft).

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oOwJB5R4HxA

### **The Problem We're Solving**

Why does anyone log in to a trading terminal like Bloomberg or FactSet?

Because — whether consciously or subconsciously — there’s a **hypothesis in their mind**. Something they're trying to validate as they jump across **charts, news, fundamentals, and macros**.

But here’s the issue: **Terminals today are built like giant dashboards**.\
What traders and analysts actually want is to **test and validate ideas**, not just observe data. So we asked ourselves — why not **rebuild the terminal from scratch** to do exactly that?

---

### **What We’re Building**

At **Scalar Field**, we’re reimagining the trading terminal from the ground up using **intelligent agents**. We started with retail traders as a way to build credibility with institutions—and already have around 800 paying traders, over 34,000 signups, and **$74,000** in monthly revenue.

Our goal is simple:\
**Let users test any market hypothesis instantly — and intelligently.**

We’re building a terminal that can:

→ **Run compute-heavy backtests** across multiple datasets (fundamentals, prices, macro, alternative data)\
→ **Spin up agents** that reorganize dashboards based on new signals or events\
→ **React to live market changes** and even **initiate trades** when conditions match your criteria\
→ **Persist memory across sessions** — so your research trail is never lost\
→ **Chain multi-hop workflows:** e.g., _If ETF flows spike and earnings surprises drop, highlight affected sectors and show next trade ideas_

It’s not just data access — it’s **agent-driven insight and action**.

---

### **🚀 Try it Now: [Scalar Field](https://scalarfield.io)**

---

### **🎁 YC Deal**

We’re offering **2 months of Pro+ free** to all **YC X25 founders and alums**.\
Use code **YCOMBINATOR** or just email us: [**founders@scalarfield.io**](mailto:founders@scalarfield.io)

---

### **What We’re Looking For:**

* **Feedback** from LLM / infra builders
* **Warm intros** to PMs, RIAs, analysts, or macro researchers
* **Ideas** on scaling persistent memory + multi-hop reasoning

We’d love to hear your thoughts!

— **Aman & Ramakant**\
📧 [founders@scalarfield.io](mailto:founders@scalarfield.io)
launches.tagline: Test any market hypothesis instantly — and intelligently.

launches.title: Bramante Biologics - American drug manufacturing
launches.body:
We manufacture pharmaceutical drugs faster than current methods and in the USA. We are building microfactories that can handle the upcoming wave of AI-designed drugs and safeguard against biothreats.

[Launch Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W_lJOs7k7nI)

### **The Problem**

America is at risk of ceding leadership in advanced biomanufacturing to China.

* **Drug manufacturing is moving to China;** 79% of US biotech and pharma companies already have at least one contract with a Chinese firm, _primarily because they are faster._
* **China is investing billions in biotech**; one third of new compounds licensed by US pharma are now _discovered and manufactured_ in China, up from almost none five years ago.
* **Over-reliance on foreign biomanufacturing is a national-security risk;** agile, on-shore manufacturing is critical to protect our nation against future biothreats.

### **Our Solution**

A contract development and manufacturing organization (CDMO) for advanced drugs, rebuilt from the ground up to address the future of America’s biomanufacturing needs.

* **Faster biomanufacturing**; Our platform leverages advanced methods to accelerate production timelines and de-risk scale-up.
* **Modular container factories**; our form factor is a standard shipping container that can be brought up to operation in roughly two weeks and shipped where it is needed.
* **Supply-chain independence;** by vertically integrating and manufacturing critical equipment in-house, we secure production against global disruptions.

### **Why It Matters**

* **Drugs can be developed faster**; shorter production cycles move life-saving drugs from the lab to the clinic up to a year sooner.
* **More drugs can be developed**; we will be able to manufacture the thousands of low-volume, personalized biologics that will be designed by AI.
* **Strengthening US autonomy;** rapid-deploy, U.S.-based capacity protects the nation from supply shocks, geopolitical turbulence, and potential bioweapons.

### **Who We Are**

We love biomanufacturing. Together, we built Protein Evolution, an industrial biotech company that turned plastic waste into new textile fibers. Scott is ex-McKinsey and a Yale mathematician (he loves a good cost model almost as much as he loves America). Mike earned his PhD in Bioengineering from Penn after completing Penn’s M&T program in undergrad (he builds DNA, software, and bioreactors).

### **Our Ask**

**Please reach out** if you work in drug development, work at a CDMO, or have experience working with or at the FDA: [**founders@bramantebio.com**](mailto:founders@bramantebio.com)

**Follow along** on our journey:

* [**www.bramantebio.com**](http://www.bramantebio.com)
* [**www.linkedin.com/company/bramante-biologics**](http://www.linkedin.com/company/bramante-biologics)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90667&key=user_uploads/547597/1ed9b2f2-f6d9-4253-b3b0-f7561d246977)

_Let’s build the infrastructure tomorrow’s medicine deserves, right here at home._

long_description:
Property appraisals suck — September’s new federal rules will make them even worse.

ValueMate’s LiDAR-plus-AI app captures a property in a three-minute walkthrough and delivers a regulator-ready report on our dashboard, slashing cycle times by 80% for the valuation firms already on board.

In the next few months, every bank, AMC, and independent appraiser must switch to the new format or watch loans pile up. ValueMate handles the transition end-to-end, with zero tape measures, zero data entry, and zero closing delay.

We’re transforming the multi-billion dollar appraisal industry with technology that captures millions of 3D data points per walkthrough.

launches.title: Zero – AI Native Email
launches.body:
**TL;DR:** Zero is an open source AI-native email client that organizes your inbox, summarizes threads, writes replies, and lets you chat with your email, so you can stay effortlessly on top of work.

**What is Zero and how does it work?**

Zero makes email work for you, not the other way around (checkout our launch video below!).

[Launch Video](https://youtu.be/3Hy3jEQQVFQ)

Zero uses AI to:

* **Prioritize** emails and surface what matters most
* **Summarize** long email threads into quick takeaways
* **Draft** and **Reply** to emails automatically
* **Organize** your inbox into smart categories, let you chat with your inbox, understand projects, and plan your day.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90228&key=user_uploads/2556219/4f2601b3-7b85-4447-8b75-9f78c3d6c314)

**Problem**\
Traditional email clients are outdated and passive. They overload you with notifications, bury important messages, and force you to manually manage threads, tasks, and follow-ups. Meanwhile, most “AI” email tools are just bolt-on features, slow, clunky, and unaware of the full context of your inbox.

**Our Solution**\
Zero is built from the ground up as an **AI-native email platform**. That means every part of your experience, from prioritization to replies, is powered by a deep understanding of your inbox and your workflow. Zero doesn’t just help you **handle** email, it helps you get **ahead** of it.

* AI that thinks like a human assistant, not a search algorithm
* Real-time summaries and smart organization that adapts to your day
* A seamless way to interact with your email through natural conversation
* Fully open source for complete transparency

**Try Zero**

Instead of drowning in an endless stream of emails, Zero gives you a live, intelligent inbox you can actually control.

We just launched our public beta at [**0.email**](http://0.email).

If you’d like to chat with us or learn more:

📅 Book a meeting: [**https://cal.com/team/0/chat**](https://cal.com/team/0/chat)

📧 Email us: [**founders@0.email**](mailto:founders@0.email)

launches.title: Hemut: AI-Powered Truck Management Software
launches.body:
**TL;DR:** AI-powered truck management software to automate back-office operations for trucking companies.\
[**Check us Out!**](https://drive.google.com/file/d/18BF2PM5YkSSTOXs9yqM_CQ0jv2Gy9xFD/view?usp=sharing)

**The Problem and Solution:**

Trucking has always been a mission critical industry, with nearly 70% of all US goods hauled via trucks, resulting in a need for continuous operations. This results in an industry that hasn’t paused for a tech update in years; in my time in the industry, I saw dozens of offices running on pen and paper or excel spreadsheets, documents being sent in WhatsApp group chats connected to printers, and I myself had 3 phones all on hold menus with different people. And even the largest of companies today navigate a maze of outdated, poorly integrated point-solutions.

So, alongside Anthony and Sam, I decided to build a product that rectifies those problems. With Hemut’s software, you can replace pen and paper scribbles with intuitive oversight of even national level fleets, replace the WhatsApp group chats and manual data entry with AI document parsing, and eliminate the need for 3 phones with AI agents to automate inbound/outbound calls. With Hemut, trucking companies can execute every step of the trucking workflow—from finding and booking a shipment, driver communication, and logging every last dollar—all on one platform, with efficiency never seen before.

**The Story:**

At 16 years old, I got kicked out of my home and faced homelessness, working 100-hour weeks at a motel where I met a truck driver who I eventually helped file paperwork for. Siezing the opportunity, I also helped file paperwork for his friends too, eventually saving enough money to start dispatching trucks and put a roof over my head.

Fast forward 6 years to the end of 2024, I realized that voice AI would eventually be capable enough to automate a lot of the bottlenecks I encountered during my time in the logistics industry.

**Our Ask:**

Always looking to learn about the cutting edge of tech and the people driving the innovation so feel free to say hi. If you also happen to know anyone in the trucking industry (veteran trucker. investor, or dev), we’d love to be introduced!

**Contact:** [cheema@hemut.com](mailto:cheema@hemut.com)
launches.tagline: Legacy Logistics, Rebuilt with AI.

Relixir helps teams automate end-to-end GEO by granting instant AI search engine visibility on their product, identifying search result blindspots for competitor/gaps, and then generating high quality content from original customer/team insights.

We're moving fast, signed 15+ pilots and 5+ paid customers seeing results in production. Join us and start using Relixir! 

The founders Sean and Dennis built an early version of a GEO system that amassed 300k+ views, 5k+ clicks/mo, and 10 inbound calls/wk at their prev. company.

**Intro**\
\
Relixir ([relixir.ai](http://relixir.ai)) is building the AI GEO - Generative Engine Optimization - platform to help teams rank higher & sell more on ChatGPT, Perplexity, etc.\
\
AI search is taking over, and _all decision makers_ are now using AI assistants to make purchase decisions.

However, getting mentioned by AI search is a new black box for teams who are struggling to navigate/maximize their recommendation rate.\
\
**How it works**

With Relixir, companies can now:

1. Gain instant visibility into their AI search engine analytics
2. Identify competitor recommendations, blind spots, and information gaps
3. Auto-publish GEO-optimized content to flip rankings in their favor

**Founders**\
\
Founders [Sean Dorje](https://linkedin.com/in/seandorje) and [Dennis Zax](https://linkedin.com/in/dennis-zax-704165201) are _Berkeley dropouts_ who built the first internal GEO system at their previous company to rank #1 in 20+ searches by auto-producing a high-quality content farm.\
\
**Mission**\
\
Relixir’s mission is to transform content marketing by using AI search engines to diagnose what truly resonates with customers, moving beyond keyword gaming to create authentic content that evolves with your brand & captures your product's genuine voice.\
\
**Join us**

Join Relixir and get to the top of AI search today. Reach out: [sean@relixir.ai](mailto:sean@relixir.ai)

launches.title: Mesmer — Cursor for CTOs
launches.body:
Hey YC, we’re [João](https://www.linkedin.com/in/joaopdepaula/), [Lucas](https://www.linkedin.com/in/lucasbrunosilva/), and [Sergio](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sergio-bergmann/), cofounders of [**Mesmer**](http://mesmer.co/) — **Cursor for CTOs.**

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TMO7TQUZIuU

We’re **repeat founders and CTOs behind startups like Glio (S13) and [Origin Financial](http://useorigin.com/) ($400M)**. In every team we built, we ran into the same challenge: each new customer, employee, and feature made it harder to understand what was actually going on. We spent our days in back-to-back meetings and chasing status updates, and forced our teams to do busywork just to keep us in the loop. **Yet we still didn’t see problems until something broke**.

AI is already making the 10x engineer possible. But there’s no solution that helps **product development orgs — and product leaders — 10x themselves**. That’s what we’re building.

# **Enter Mesmer**

**Mesmer gives founders and CTOs full context on their org without drowning in meetings or chasing people for updates**. It watches the work itself — code, specs, designs, meetings — to build a live, detailed picture of what’s going on. Our customers can keep their teams fast, flat, and focused as they scale — and free from busywork.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90395&key=user_uploads/178/c0f0220d-62be-4e38-9246-ecd3c2493a79)

We are starting with **an AI chief of staff for product development orgs**. Every week, it delivers a report showing what actually happened across all in-flight projects: what moved forward, what shipped, and what’s stuck. Founders and CTOs can then ask questions and get in-depth answers based on their team’s actual code, specs, and designs, like:

* Why is this project slipping?
* Who’s the best engineer to unblock it?
* What architecture did we use in this repo?
* How does the business logic work for this categorization engine?
* What changed in the roadmap last week?

**We’re already live with 10+ companies worth over $3B** and have reviewed over 70M lines of code along the way. We’d love to help you, too.

# **Special Offer**

We’re onboarding companies as fast as we can, but, if you’re a CTO leading a team of 20+ engineers (or know someone who is) **email me at [joao@mesmer.co](mailto:joao@mesmer.co) and we’ll skip the line** to help you run a flat, fast, focused org right away.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90395&key=user_uploads/178/0a177036-5476-45b7-bd33-cfd2b5fb72a3)

name: chrt
one_liner: chrt is a platform for Time-Critical Logistics
long_description:
chrt is a platform for Time-Critical Logistics. We enable businesses to deliver their most critical items same-day.

Time-Critical Logistics is a $30B market growing at a 20% CAGR driven by growth in American healthcare and manufacturing.

Businesses that place time-critical orders are enterprises who have urgent items they need to deliver ASAP. These orders are critical in nature and often require white glove service -- think therapeutic treatments for healthcare providers or specialized equipment for manufacturers. 

chrt provides a marketplace of professional couriers who pick up and deliver these orders. We build the software these couriers use to handle the shipments, including a driver app and fleet management tools. This gives us full control of the shipment and allows us to provide shippers with end-to-end tracking. It also allows us to intervene early if we notice something is going wrong.

We’re software engineers that became friends years ago at McKinsey. Kyle is an expert in Time-Critical Logistics, having led strategy at a leading startup in the space. Aaron is an expert at designing and implementing AI systems to handle complex coordination. We were shipping code together on nights and weekends for years before chrt; now we’re also shipping freight.

name: MindFort
one_liner: Fully autonomous offensive security agents & models
long_description:
MindFort is building fully autonomous AI agents powered by their in-house models that can find, exploit, and patch complex vulnerabilities in web applications at massive scale. MindFort agents use the same principles as human penetration testers to understand their target and figure out the best ways to work together to exploit it.

While security teams were already behind with legacy tools and processes, AI coding is make the problem worse. AI generates code far faster than human teams can secure it; MindFort can match that speed and scale. Our agents will become critical as organizations scale up development with AI.

launches.title: MindFort.ai - Fully Autonomous Security Agents
launches.body:
![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90555&key=user_uploads/525065/9bbd9d91-5dba-43e0-9412-2c45bac5782a)

Hey everyone! 👋 We're Brandon, Sam, and Akul - Co-founders of [MindFort.ai](http://MindFort.ai).

We're building fully autonomous AI security agents that find, validate, and patch vulnerabilities in web applications and networks at machine speed and scale.

https://youtu.be/Oe-errlwaow

## 🔥 The Problem

Security is fundamentally broken for most engineering teams today:

* **Scanners are unreliable** - They flood engineers with 30-50% false positives, wasting precious development time
* **Traditional pen testing is too slow** - It happens quarterly at best, costs a fortune, and takes weeks to complete
* **AI-accelerated development creates new risks** - Teams are shipping code faster than ever, but security reviews have become an even bigger bottleneck

The result? Companies are forced to choose between shipping fast or shipping secure. Engineering teams lose **\~20%** of their time dealing with security issues or slowing down to accommodate outdated security practices.

## 🚀 Our Solution

[MindFort.ai](http://MindFort.ai)'s autonomous security agents work 24/7/365 to find, validate, and patch vulnerabilities:

* **Find** complex vulnerabilities like a human tester would
* **Validate** every finding to eliminate false positives
* **Patch** with intelligent fixes that integrate directly with your codebase
* **Scale** to thousands of tests in an instant, giving coverage never possible before

Unlike solutions that slow development, MindFort accelerates it by eliminating security bottlenecks. Our platform is already finding vulnerabilities in production systems that other tools miss, identifying issues in bug bounty programs, and scoring high on human penetration testing benchmarks.

## 💡 Our Story

Brandon worked as a PM at ProjectDiscovery, a security scanner company where he led development of the Nuclei cloud platform from an open source tool to an enterprise ready product. He then joined NetSPI, one of the world’s largest penetration testing firms, to build generative AI tools for human testers. He sat with countless customers across both companies, learning about their struggles in securing attack surfaces at scale.

Akul received his masters in computer science from the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, and was drawn to AI and security early on in his academic career. He co-authored multiple papers on using LLMs to perform various cybersecurity attacks, worked on creating novel benchmarks for hacking agents, and participated in red teaming and model safety programs at both OpenAI and Anthropic.

Sam worked as a senior engineer at Salesforce, where he led security for a large business unit, Tableau. During his time there, he worked first hand on keeping a large scale product secure. Between juggling security assessments, validating findings, and managing remediations inside of a large organization, he had seen it all. He began experimenting with ways to use AI to help solve some of the issues he faced at Salesforce and even worked on a demo of a tool to perform agentic code review through a DARPA program. He recently completed a master’s degree in cybersecurity at UC Berkeley.

We all met through our work and research. Early on, we all realized that the future of security was going to belong to AI agents, and that the coming tidal wave of new code generated with AI would need a solution of equal magnitude.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90555&key=user_uploads/525065/51cbc28d-9ff7-41b3-af19-d3e9fc23ef0a)

## 🔮 Our Vision

Security should accelerate your business, not slow it down. We're creating a world where security testing happens continuously and vulnerabilities are patched autonomously, **keeping your product and your users safe, while letting you ship faster.**

## 👇 Our Ask

Ready to ship quickly and securely? 👉 **Visit [mindfort.ai](http://mindfort.ai) to request access**

📧 Email us directly: [founders@mindfort.ai](mailto:founders@mindfort.ai)

launches.title: Probo - Open-source compliance platform
launches.body:
Hi everyone!

We are Antoine and Bryan from Probo.

We do your SOC 2 (and other) compliance, making sure you don’t waste time on useless tasks.

Over the last 2 months, we've already worked with 39 companies to get SOC2, HIPAA or ISO27001 without the hassle. 

https://youtu.be/i-IT5hYwemY

## **What’s broken**

Compliance.

As an auditor, I asked companies for the same checklists and sent the same doc requests, over and over. Founders wasted time filling in boxes without thinking.

Looking back, it was mindless busywork that frustrated everyone.

## **What we are building**

Probo acts like your compliance **team.** You tell us how you work, and Probo does the rest:

1. Set the _right_ requirements - not overkill
2. Handle docs, risks, controls, evidence
3. Run the audit
4. Keep everything up to date afterward

Founders shouldn’t lose weeks to this stuff. **Even one day is too much.**

## **What’s next**

Three things:

* **Open source**: Commoditize existing tools 
* **AI powered:** Agents to continuously monitor and maintain things up to date
* **No third-party trust:** proofs are end-to-end verifiable

If you’re building and don’t want to lose weeks on compliance,

If this sounds like something you’ve wished existed,

=> [founders@getprobo.com](mailto:founders@getprobo.com)

=> [www.getprobo.com](http://www.getprobo.com)

jobPostings.companyOneLiner: AI compliance copilot for hospitals to maximize insurance payouts

launches.title: WorkDone – AI compliance autopilot 👨‍⚕️ for hospitals and clinics 🏥
launches.body:
Hi! We’re [Dmitry](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dmitrykarpov/), [Sergey](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yudovskiy/), and [Alex](https://www.linkedin.com/in/odinalex/) — co-founders of [WorkDone](https://www.wrkdn.com/).

**TL;DR:**

Every year, **250 million insurance claims — worth billions of dollars — are denied due to documentation errors**. Many are never recovered. We connect directly to hospital EHRs, monitor clinical staff activity logs in real time, and use AI agents to detect and fix compliance issues before they become risks. **Since the beginning of YC, we’ve reached $54k ARR** and have a growing number of commercial pilots with hospitals and clinics across the U.S. and PoCs with healthcare enterprises.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PrcEY8WgmSk

**Problem:**

One small documentation mistake — like recording a medication time incorrectly — can destroy a family’s finances.

These errors are often made by exhausted clinicians after 12-hour shifts and are caught by automated insurance systems that instantly deny the claim.

**Hospitals don’t discover the problem until it's too late** — after the claim is denied, the audit triggered, or the reputation damaged.

Documentation errors are the invisible threat in modern healthcare. They’re not caused by negligence, but by broken systems: cluttered interfaces, overworked staff, and legacy EHRs that make it easy to click the wrong time, forget a discharge note, or miss a required signature.

**And it’s not just claims** — these small errors lead to failed audits, regulatory fines, delayed discharges, and increased burnout.

Hospitals end up with compliance teams that are reactive — chasing mistakes days or weeks after they happened, often without resolution. The cost isn’t just money. It’s morale, trust, and patient safety.

**Solution:**

WorkDone is an AI compliance autopilot that prevents small documentation errors from becoming costly disasters in real time.

We integrate directly with hospital EHRs, monitor clinical activity in real time, and use AI agents to detect and fix issues — like missed discharge notes or wrong medication times — before they trigger claim denials or audits.

When a problem is found, our AI opens a quick conversation with the responsible staff member to confirm and correct it immediately.

**We don’t just alert**. We resolve — and help hospitals run smoother, reduce pressure on teams, and recover revenue that would otherwise be lost.

**What Experts Are Saying:**

"WorkDone’s proactive approach is a game‑changer in reducing preventable errors and enabling real‑time accountability in care delivery.”

— [Joel N.H. Stern, PhD](https://www.linkedin.com/in/joel-n-h-stern-07a4342/)\
Professor of Neurology & Molecular Medicine, Zucker School of Medicine at Hofstra/Northwell

**Team:**

[Dmitry](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dmitrykarpov/) (CEO) and [Sergey](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yudovskiy/) (CPO) are second-time YC founders with a strong track record in building B2B enterprise products and go-to-market channels. Sergey comes from a full medical family and has deep personal ties to the problems we're solving in healthcare. [Alex](https://www.linkedin.com/in/odinalex/), (CTO), is a seasoned engineer who built apps used by 25M+ people worldwide and led the development of a full AI agent architecture at his previous multimillion-dollar startup.

**Asks:**

We're actively looking to connect with:

* **Hospital executives and clinic owners** who want to stop losing revenue to preventable compliance errors and team burnout 
* **Providers' CFOs and compliance leaders** who are tired of fighting with clinical staff over documentation and want a system that just works
* **Medical institution advisors and operators** who care about transforming broken workflows
* **Reporters and storytellers** covering the untold side of healthcare — the back office chaos that leads to financial disaster

If you're building, reporting on, or fighting to fix this problem — DM us, email us at [founders@wrkdn.com](mailto:founders@wrkdn.com), or grab 15 minutes with us here [Book a call](https://calendly.com/d/cnpv-x29-nzc/workdone-demo).

Let’s save healthcare from the inside out.
launches.tagline: WorkDone helps hospitals avoid denials, audits, and fines by catching and fixing documentation errors in real time.

launches.title: Rimba - AI for Energy & Industrial Compliance
launches.body:
Hey everyone, we’re Tim and Akshay – cofounders of **Rimba** 👋

**TL;DR**\
AI, transportation, electricity... All run on massive amounts of energy, and America is running heading to an energy crisis. It’s incredibly difficult to build or operate energy projects, and REGULATORY COMPLIANCE requirements made it even harder. Energy companies are slapped with $$$ tens of millions in penalties while buried in a mountain of spreadsheets, PDFs, and forms to stay compliant.

We’re building **Rimba** to fix that.

**\*\*Ask:\*\*\
Know someone or work in energy (mom, dad, aunt, grandpa)? Introduce us [timothy@rimba.ai](mailto:timothy@rimba.ai) or send them our [LinkedIn Launch](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/y-combinator_rimba-yc-x25-is-ai-for-energy-industrial-activity-7329943880416612352-aryT?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop&rcm=ACoAABs6HnMB3XNRo_a9KqN2METPAum-VybW7UA).**

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MoNWA6gVa6Y

## **❌ The Problem**

## Compliance today is manual, error-prone, and incredibly expensive. From low carbon fuel reports, like

**LCFS, RFS,** to air permits, from tax credit filings to prevailing wage documentation, and more.\
A look at the numbers:

* $23B+ is spent annually on energy compliance in the U.S.
* $2B+ in annual fines
* Not to mention the missed incentive and tax credit revenue. Plus 1,000s of hours lost spent on copy-pasting values across spreadsheets, data cleaning, and filings.

And yet—there are **no modern tools** built for how energy producers actually operate: across spreadsheets, legacy software, and passing data back-and-forth.

## **💡 Our Solution:**

## **One Platform for Energy & Industrial Compliance Automation**

## **Rimba** is building the compliance operating system for the industrial sector.

1. We monitor and extract operational data from **any source**—ERP Data, meter data, PDF—and turn it into **clean, structured, and report-ready data**.
2. Verify data and reports for regulations, such as:

* LCFS / RFS / Air Permits
* Prevailing Wage
* Sustainability Certification

1. Catch issues early and avoid mistakes that lead to costly penalties

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ph3RtlbTy64

## **✅ The Result**

* **Millions avoided in fines**
* **80% reduction** in time and resources on monitoring, data cleaning, and reporting.
* **Reduction of risk through visibility**

\
**🚀 The Team**\
Both Tim and Akshay worked in regulatory compliance, and bonded together through the struggle and their love for burgers.

[Follow Rimba on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/rimba-compliance-automation/about/)

* Tim (CEO) was formerly Head of Compliance and Legal Counsel at a mining and energy company. He spent years navigating a maze of regulations, environmental certification, and audit prep across spreadsheets, PDFs, and on-the-ground operational data. He didn’t just witness the problem. He lived it.
* Akshay (CTO) was an AI Engineer at Klarity (W18) where he focused on transforming unstructured documents into structured data, streamlining compliance processes for finance and accounting teams. His experience includes building high-reliability systems at Goldman Sachs and Adobe; now he’s applying them to energy compliance.\
  \
  📩 Email us at [**timothy@rimba.ai**](mailto:timothy@rimba.ai)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90502&key=user_uploads/1078902/1bb07ce5-734a-42ad-90fb-6be5bd95609d)
launches.tagline: We monitor energy facilities and turns messy operational data—no matter the format—into clean, validated compliance reports.

launches.body:
Hey YC!

We’re [Dimitri](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dimitri-kassubeck-69764647/), [Thomas, ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/thomas-rapilly-00481167/)and [Clément ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/cl%C3%A9ment-sengelen-09261354/)- co-founders of [Moby Analytics](https://www.mobyanalytics.com/en) - and we’re ending manual work in audit, so auditors can reclaim time for high-value thinking.

❌ **Problem**

**Auditors spend 50% of their time on the wrong things.**\
Chasing documents, sorting PDFs, and manually checking numbers.\
All of it steals time from what truly matters: analysis and judgment.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90445&key=user_uploads/2582095/26d5c027-fc6c-434d-8700-11f9eb9ae60a)

💡**Solution**

At Moby Analytics, **we’re ending manual work in audit**—so auditors can reclaim time for high-value thinking.

With Moby, auditors automate repetitive tasks and analyze data, in their own way. We’ve built the first AI platform that **lets auditors create and deploy their own AI agents**—no code needed. Just prompts and audit expertise.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ivqOkh9xBaU

🔨_Create an Agent :_

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90445&key=user_uploads/2582095/baaf0c19-b22e-4300-9789-660aa1803099)

**👌Team**

We’re three long-time friends—**Dimitri**, **Thomas**, and **Clément**—on a mission to bridge the gap between audit and tech.

We started by building a data analytics agency, **training hundreds of auditors to use data and AI tools**. And we saw firsthand what they could achieve when they had the right tools.

**That’s why Moby exists: to unleash auditors’ potential.**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90445&key=user_uploads/2582095/776ce6eb-ea8f-4bdf-ab1c-cee5b9ae8ed2)

If you answer “yes” to any of these, we’d love your help:

* Can you introduce us to **audit firm leaders** (CEO, Chief Transformation Officer, CTO)?
* Can you introduce us to auditors who have a **strong interest in AI** solutions?

Contact: [dimitri.kassubeck@mobyanalytics.com](https://dimitri.kassubeck@mobyanalytics.com)

launches.title: Delty - Your AI Staff Engineer
launches.body:
Hey everyone 👋 we’re [Lalit](http://linkedin.com/in/lalitkundu) & [Catherine](http://linkedin.com/in/cat-catherine-zhao), co-founders of [Delty](http://delty.ai). 

# **TL;DR**

🚀 Delty is _your_ AI Staff Engineer, trained on your team’s code, docs, and systems. With its deep systems understanding, it helps design and iterate upon enterprise-scale software systems.

Use Delty to:

* **Design** new features, services, or migrations with an expert AI teammate.
* **Supercharge** AI coding agents like Copilot with systems and team context.
* **Onboard** engineers fast—ask Delty how your systems works.

**Ask:** Is your software engineering team seeing the gap between AI prototypes and enterprise-scale software implementation? Email [lalit@delty.ai](mailto:lalit@delty.ai) or [book a demo here](https://calendly.com/founders-delty/15-minute-meeting).

https://youtu.be/RymhaAeeOr4

# **🚩 The Problem**

The most impactful engineering happens _outside_ the codebase, in designing systems, technical strategy, and implementation planning.

But today’s AI tools skip all that. They write code without understanding your systems or engineering norms, leading to tech debt, incidents, and rework.

Staff engineers have expert systems knowledge, guide teams, and scale quality. AI tools can’t do that today. It looks good in demos, but breaks down in production.

# **🛠️ Our Solution**

We’re a team of former Google staff engineers and AI experts building **Delty—AI that works like an expert enterprise engineer**, not just a code generator.

Delty develops a **deep system-level understanding** of your codebase, team practices, product, and engineering norms. You onboard your context once and Delty becomes a persistent, trusted teammate.

Use Delty to:

* 🧠 **Design systems with a thinking partner**

  Get first-pass design docs, architecture feedback, and tradeoff discussions

  ![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90407&key=user_uploads/1494518/446133ae-9e63-4baf-a1c5-6a49a182bbfb)

* ⚙️ **Supercharge your AI coding agents with system context**\
  Make Copilot or Cursor aware of your systems, dependencies, and conventions

  ![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90407&key=user_uploads/1494518/cefc284e-dee4-4543-8bc4-8e6feeb05fe7)

* 🧑‍💻 **Get 24/7 help from an experienced engineer**\
  Ask deep technical questions and get clear, informed answers

  ![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90407&key=user_uploads/1494518/6be33ee2-0832-476b-8729-823bd1feddd9)


Hear from our users: _“Delty proposed an idea I hadn't even considered. It felt like pair-designing with a Staff Engineer who had been working at our company for years.”_ 

# **👫 The Team**

Lalit and Catherine built large-scale systems together at YouTube, handling billions in revenue. That’s where they first saw the gap: AI tools that could code, but couldn’t engineer.

**Lalit** launched Google Pay in India and rose to Staff Engineer at YouTube in just six years. He led a 45-person team building monetization systems driving $XXB+ ARR. A lifelong programmer, his journey began with competing in the ACM-ICPC World Finals during college.

**Catherine** started her career at YouTube as a SWE before joining Google’s APM program, where she worked on ChromeOS and internal GenAI infrastructure, including multimodal model evals and AI agents for enterprise use. She holds a BA in Computer Science from Dartmouth.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90407&key=user_uploads/1494518/dc1935e3-d2b0-4d83-9f63-b5cd8ae73e7b)

# 

[🙏](https://emojipedia.org/folded-hands) **Asks**

🚨 Running into scale issues with Copilot or codegen tools?

Delty is live and helping teams already.

* 👉 [Book a 15-min demo](https://calendly.com/founders-delty/15-minute-meeting) and see how an AI staff engineer actually helps.
* 📩 Questions? Email [lalit@delty.ai](mailto:lalit@delty.ai).

Share this post! If you know anyone in your network who is leading an engineering team (director of eng, VP of eng, or CTO), please share this post or our promo video below.

* Follow us on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/delty-ai), [X](https://x.com/delty_ai), and learn more at [delty.ai](http://delty.ai).

https://youtu.be/RymhaAeeOr4

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90407&key=user_uploads/1494518/d4a5b787-0b2b-4181-85c0-722113e8a588)

name: Cotool
one_liner: Free your security team to hunt threats, not handle workflows
long_description:
Cotool is an agentic security platform that eliminates manual and repetitive work for security teams.

Today’s cybersecurity teams remain bogged down by alert fatigue, context switching, and documentation overhead. Security teams don't need more dashboards with "AI-powered insights" — they need their time back.

Cotool empowers teams to build security their way. Our platform provides an AI co-pilot that automatically assembles context across tools, a no-code agent builder that transforms successful investigations into reusable automations, and automated report generation, providing comprehensive documentation in seconds.

Unlike solutions that force teams to adapt to vendor workflows, Cotool puts the power of AI directly in practitioners' hands, letting them shape tools around their unique processes. Early users have already cut time spent on investigation and detection engineering by 70%.

launches.title: Cotool - Composable AI Agents for every Security Team
launches.body:
Hey everyone 👋

We're [Eddie](https://www.linkedin.com/in/eddieconk/), [Logan](https://www.linkedin.com/in/logan-carmody/), and [Max](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mmpollard/) – co-founders of [Cotool](https://cotool.ai).

### TL;DR

Cotool uses AI to automate repetitive security workflows so teams can focus on threat hunting instead of manual tasks. Our early users have used the copilot and agents to cut investigation time by 90% and increase detection quality & coverage. Book a demo to learn how you can do the same!\
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GnyZuJGQ5C0

### ❌ The Problem

Security is complex, but the problems facing most teams are not:

1. Alert Fatigue: Hours lost to false positives, while genuine threats slip by unnoticed.
2. Context Switching: Investigations requiring constant toggling across 5-10 disconnected tools just to assemble basic context.
3. Documentation Overhead: Teams spend more time as technical writers than security practitioners, bogged down in endless reporting.

Before founding Cotool, we collaborated with cutting-edge security teams including OpenAI, Coinbase, Figma, and DoorDash, experiencing these universal challenges firsthand.

Advancements in AI now offer an opportunity to truly reimagine this model; by building intuitive, collaborative tools that complement, not replace, security professionals.

### 👷 Our Solution

Cotool provides a suite of Agents and an AI co-pilot designed specifically for security teams, streamlining workflows and reducing frustration through:

* Seamless Investigations 🔍: A true AI co-pilot that works alongside security engineers during alert triage, investigations, and detection engineering; automatically gathering relevant context from across tools so they can focus on reasoning, not tool-hopping.
* No-code Agents 🤖: Turn successful debugging flows into reusable agents, then refine their behavior with natural language prompts and connect them to any tools Cotool has access to, with granular permission controls.
* Automated Documentation 📊: Generating thorough, accurate reports in seconds, freeing up valuable security practitioner time.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90398&key=user_uploads/2254937/d59dd9d1-e396-4f77-8dce-283a5e31c4ee)

### 👨‍💻 The Team

We have worked together for years and co-founded Cotool in 2025.

[Max Pollard](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mmpollard/) (CEO) led the forward deployed engineering team at Material, working directly with security teams to understand their workflows and pain points. He built the team up from one to 8 engineers and embedded himself with the world's best security programs. Previously he worked as a SE at Okta. He holds a BA in Business and Computer Science from UC Berkeley.

[Eddie Conk](https://www.linkedin.com/in/eddieconk/) (CPO + Head of AI) spent the last 3 years at Material Security, leading the ML Engineering function. He developed and trained AI models for detecting Phishing emails at scale for some of the largest and most secure companies in the world. Previously he was an ML Engineer at Apple, and holds a BA in Computer Science from UC Berkeley.

[Logan Carmody](https://www.linkedin.com/in/logan-carmody/) (CTO) was an early engineer and the technical lead for the Phishing Protection product at Material Security. He helped develop the proprietary language and compiler which Material’s threat researchers used to detect Phishing messages and Workspace breaches. He previously was a Staff SWE at LinkedIn working in infrastructure, and holds a BS in Computer Science and Philosophy from Duke University.

Together, we've spent years embedded with some of the world's best security teams. We're passionate about helping security teams focus on what they do best – hunting threats, not handling workflows.

launches.title: Propolis: Building Synthetic Users
launches.body:
**TL;DR: [Propolis](https://propolis.tech) unleashes AI swarms that eliminate QA by automatically testing your product like real users would**. **Our solution, in production, has already become the go to for fast shipping engineering teams.**

**_Ask_**: Do you know any engineering teams bottlenecked by QA or looking to ship faster? Contact us at [marc@propolis.tech](mailto:marc@propolis.tech).

Hi! We’re Marc and Matt, tenured former leads of large and gnarly implementations and deployments at Palantir and Airtable (+ a bunch of startups!). We’re building Propolis.

**❌ The Problem:** Software development cycles have accelerated substantially over the past year. Yet, testing remains stuck in the past, relying on either slow manual QA or brittle automation that breaks with every product change, creating three major pains:

1. Wasted engineering time
2. Delayed releases
3. Bugs reaching real users

These intensify as companies scale, with some dedicating entire teams to QA or accepting that their users will find the bugs for them. But with Propolis, this is finally changing:

https://youtu.be/3AxEHNmTqyc

**🐝 Our Solution:** Propolis deploys autonomous browser agents that think and behave like real users. They build an understanding of your application and communicate with one another. Teams simply provide a URL and credentials, and get access to:

* **Complete test coverage** 🧪: AI agents explore your entire product, discovering and testing every possible user flow.
* **Precise bug reporting** 🐛: Detailed reports delivered directly to Slack, Linear, Github, or wherever with videos, traces, and reproduction steps.

**🙏 Our Ask:** If the above seems like something you or someone you know needs, please get in touch!

We're offering our next batch of customers:

* A walkthrough of our agents traversing your application
* Recently harvested honey for the next 10 companies that sign up! 🍯 (We're recreational beekeepers, hence the name)

Contact us at [marc@propolis.tech](mailto:marc@propolis.tech)

**👬 The Team** Marc and Matt have both personally struggled with the reality of losing precious time QAing instead of shipping, countless hours clicking through flows and writing tests. They’ve bonded over their mutual fondness for deploying solutions that break the mold.

[Marc](https://www.linkedin.com/in/marc-papazian/) was previously Director of Product at an AI startup and a deployment lead at Palantir - where he led work building the operational data backbone for the entire Federal pandemic response. He makes wine halfway across the world in Armenia (ironically, he does NOT like wine).

[Matt](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mattmattmattmatt/) was previously a senior engineer at Airtable, where he worked on infrastructure that helped eliminate the need for manual QA. He’s been frontline for hundreds of product releases and deploys, and knows what it takes to be confident in the code you’re shipping.
launches.tagline: Fully autonomous browser agents that test your application for you.

launches.title: Den: Cursor for knowledge workers
launches.body:
### **TL;dr**

Den is Cursor for knowledge workers.

We make it 10x easier to build AI agents within a Slack/Notion-like platform.

https://youtu.be/OBpZ4RaV_9Y

### **The Problem**

AI agents are great, but impossible for most people to use.

At our previous startup, engineers would ship features during their lunch break using Cursor, while the rest of the team drowned under repetitive tasks.

We believe everyone, not just engineers, deserves 10x leverage on their time.

### **Our Solution**

Den is where you and your team create and collaborate with AI agents. It unifies your entire productivity stack behind one natural language interface, allowing you to create AI agents that work with your team in realtime, and can keep working while you sleep.

We want to deploy trillions of AI agents into the mainstream workforce and unlock the most productive era in human history.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90591&key=user_uploads/2367523/21ef304f-cb23-4dfa-b66e-fa68c0259206)

### **The team**

[**Linus Talacko**](https://www.linkedin.com/in/linustalacko/) previously co-founded _Lyrebird Health_, one of Australia's fastest-growing startups, when he was 19. He scaled the team to 50+ people before leaving to start _Den_.

[**Justin Lee**](https://www.linkedin.com/in/justin1ee/) previously built agents at _Atlassian_. He was hired by Linus as a founding engineer at _Lyrebird Health_.

### **Our Ask**

If you want to build a 10-person billion-dollar company, join Den here: [https://getden.io](https://www.linkedin.com/in/justin1ee/)

📧 Email us: [founders@getden.io](mailto:founders@getden.io)

launches.title: Lumari - AI tool builder for non-technical teams
launches.body:
Hey everyone! We’re [Sam](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samarthlamba/) and [Eshani](https://www.linkedin.com/in/eshanimehta/), the co-founders of Lumari 🔥

**TL;DR:** Lumari empowers non-technical teams to spin up **fully integrated internal apps and agentic workers** without writing any code or wasting budget on inflexible off-the-shelf software.

See Lumari in action: https://youtu.be/iTZgUOUxcgE

# **The Problem ❌**

* Off-the-shelf software forces you into **one-size-fits-none** flows that never match your actual process
* Internal tool requests sit unaddressed in engineering **backlogs** for months
* Most “no-code” tools still require **complex code scripts** and hours of drag-and-drop work
* You pay for 100 generic features to get the one you actually need

The build vs. buy decision is changing. Teams no longer have to choose between rigid tools and slow internal projects.

# **Lumari’s Solution ✨**

Lumari empowers **anyone** to launch enterprise-ready internal apps with no code and no unnecessary SaaS spend.

1. **Describe** your desired features, workflow, or task in plain English
2. Lumari **generates** the UI, backend logic, and multi-step agentic flows
3. We instantly **connect** your apps with deep integrations to your existing tools (CRM, Slack, docs, databases, etc)
4. Internally **deploy** your scalable, secure app or agent without any engineering setup

Teams use Lumari for deal-scoring alerts, call-coaching insights, contract to billing pipelines, customer-health dashboards, and a lot more.

# **The Team**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90564&key=user_uploads/1755497/3a1a90ce-6ebb-49fc-8c0e-6b1cd98be8fb)

[Sam Lamba](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samarthlamba/) is an ex-Google engineering lead who led the development of AI-driven features in Google Meet that scaled to millions of weekly enterprise users, and has received 2 AI patents. Sam also previously worked at Uber and Tesla and holds a degree in Electrical and Computer Engineering and Computer Science from Duke University.

[Eshani Mehta](https://www.linkedin.com/in/eshanimehta/) was previously at Stripe leading payments intelligence products handling $XXX million in volume. She also previously worked at Robinhood and Snap and studied Computer Science at UC Berkeley. 

Sam and Eshani saw this exact bottleneck firsthand. At Google and Stripe, engineering teams had access to powerful, well-supported internal tools… because entire teams were dedicated to building them. But GTM teams weren’t as lucky. Internal requests from sales, ops, or customer teams often sat in backlogs for months, forcing teams to buy rigid tools that didn’t really fit their workflows. They started Lumari to fix that and give non-technical teams that same level of internal tooling power.

# **Our Ask**

* 📅 [Book a meeting](https://cal.com/team/lumari/lumari-demo) with us if this could be useful for you or your team
* Follow us on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/lumari-io)!

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90564&key=user_uploads/1755497/15685d6f-2df7-42a6-851c-9372fbb56798)

launches.title: Code Four – Bringing Our Cops Home
launches.body:
#### **TL;DR**

We auto-generate reports, verify narratives, and surface evidence instantly — cutting desk time by 60% and putting officers where communities need them most.

https://youtu.be/5K72MBx20fg

#### **👮‍♂️ The Problem**

* **40% of a typical shift** vanishes to transcribing body-cam footage, filling forms, and locating clips across siloed systems.
* Manual redaction and video scrubbing **delay** investigations, **strain** budgets, and **erode** public trust.
* Departments **juggle 8–10 incompatible** software tools that weren’t built for today’s fast-paced operations

#### **🚓 Our Solution – the Intelligence Layer for Digital Evidence**

1. **Real-time transcription & summarization** — every body-cam or interview video becomes searchable text + key-frame timelined.
2. **One-click redaction** — faces, plates, minors’ voices, and PII are masked with CJIS-compliant logs.
3. **Context-aware search** — ask “show me every time suspect #42 handled a weapon” and jump straight to the frames.
4. **Autofilled narrative reports** that match your RMS schema and chain-of-custody rules.
5. **Plug-and-play integrations** with leading body-cam vendors, evidence lockers, and CAD/RMS APIs—no rip-and-replace.

#### **👥 Team**

George Cheng, Dylan Nguyen, and Natnael Kahssay started Code Four inside their dorm rooms at MIT and dropped out to continue building the next generation of police tech. We’ve processed hundreds of videos and know every pain point from ride-alongs to record rooms.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90692&key=user_uploads/2369150/be5e77c0-a578-4632-873a-a4faf530de19)

#### **🙌 Our Ask**

* **Intros to Police, Sheriff, Transit, or University PDs** that wrestle with video or paperwork overload.
* **Design-partner agencies** (10–200 officers) willing to co-shape features.
* **We’ll fly anywhere in North America to set you up within 48 hours—no strings attached.**

Email → [founders@codefour.us](mailto:founders@codefour.us)   

Calendar →[ https://cal.com/codefour/30min](https://cal.com/codefour/30min)   

Website →[ https://www.codefour.us](https://www.codefour.us)

**Code Four. Built for Heros. Made to bring them home.**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90692&key=user_uploads/2369150/8c0bbba7-4edd-42c3-8efd-12facc362e44)
launches.tagline: Code Four handles paperwork and frees officers from administrative burdens.

name: LineWise
one_liner: Troubleshoot factory line problems faster using AI
long_description:
LineWise is building an AI assistant for manufacturing teams to get their line back up and running.

When a line goes down, it can take hours to identify the problem. Engineers and technicians scramble, chasing PLC data and logs, flipping through manuals and troubleshooting guides, while production stalls.

LineWise connects siloed data from PLCs, maintenance logs, and machine manuals to triage potential causes for the issue at hand. Once the issue is resolved, LineWise will remember everything for the next time and advocate preventative actions.

free_response_question_answers.answer: Zhichu and James met at MIT, where Zhichu was using vision models for lab logging and root-cause analysis in materials discovery and James was pursuing his MBA. James had previously served as an operational consultant at McKinsey, while Wenbo - a mutual friend of Zhichu - worked as a founding engineer at a food inspection startup. Recognizing the pressing need for AI in everyday manufacturing and operations, they joined forces to bring these capabilities to the front line.

launches.title: LineWise - AI Copilot for Manufacturers
launches.body:
### **TL;DR**

LineWise is building an AI assistant for manufacturing teams to get their production lines back up and running - fast.

We connect siloed factory data (PLCs, maintenance logs, manuals) to triage faults, guide technicians to fixes, and capture every resolution for smarter troubleshooting in the future.

🎥 **Our 60-second Product Launch:\
[https://youtu.be/DfnmQ4k8q-k](https://youtu.be/DfnmQ4k8q-k)**

### **THE PROBLEM**

When a line goes down, it can take **hours** to identify the problem. Engineers and technicians chase PLC logs, flip through outdated manuals, and rely on the one person who “just knows.” While production stalls, tribal knowledge disappears, and the same issues repeat.

### **THE SOLUTION**

LineWise centralizes critical knowledge by integrating siloed data from IoT sensors, maintenance records, and machine manuals. It ranks the most likely causes and guides the team to a fix in just **minutes**. But the best part? It remembers every issue for next time and advocates for preventative actions.

---

### **How LineWise Works**

🔧 Upload an error code image or describe the issue in a message.

🤖 The AI provides a refocused problem statement for confirmation.

📊 The AI dynamically ranks possible hypotheses of causes by probability.

🧠 A human validates each hypothesis to identify the true cause.

🛠️ Resolve the issue by following a step-by-step guide.

🔍 Conduct further investigation to uncover the root cause.

📚 Enrich the knowledge base with insights from the issue and resolution.

---

### **Join Us to Revolutionize Manufacturing**

LineWise partners with forward-thinking manufacturers to minimize unplanned downtime, empower frontline teams, and unlock the value of siloed data within a company. 

If that sounds like you, we’d love to talk.

🔧 **Want to see LineWise in action?** Contact: [info@linewise.io](mailto:info@linewise.io)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90196&key=user_uploads/2371704/9ed0ed2e-2221-436f-8407-534f1abd18a2)

launches.title: Cactus - AI copilot for solopreneurs 🚀
launches.body:
# **❌ Admin is killing solopreneurs**

Every solopreneur starts their business because they love their work. Solopreneurs like private chefs, caterers, photographers, and personal trainers receive hundreds of inquiries weekly. They’re busy working, miss out on great opportunities, and can’t scale their business.

# **💡 What we do**

Cactus (https://oncactus.com) answers the phone, qualifies leads, and handles bookings so the business owner has a full schedule of work. It is the AI Business Assistant that manages the admin so the owner can focus on what they love!

Cactus has empowered 100+ chefs and is growing rapidly! Next, we’ll expand to photographers and personal trainers.

**Check out our [launch video](https://youtu.be/VWeQaySQnY8)**

**1️⃣ We provide every solopreneur with a website**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90199&key=user_uploads/423660/d1d7e29b-8f13-4677-aa86-4381df359716)

**2️⃣ Our AI answers the phone and qualifies customers.**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90199&key=user_uploads/423660/3cdfc4f0-2b3e-4692-8126-247d4e5650e8)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90199&key=user_uploads/423660/af86c212-6e6d-428d-ae06-bce3cba64763)

# **🎯 The Team**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90199&key=user_uploads/423660/7959cd10-8d3f-4416-b16c-b3e74b135eac)

Avinash (left) and Ajith (right) are batchmates from college. Avinash joined Ajith's previous YC startup, where they spent three years working side by side to build the product from scratch.

They became dads and started hiring personal chefs and started as a marketplace to onboard and match chefs with busy families. During the process, we realized private chefs struggle with operations and admin work. We started building AI tools for them and made some of them wildly successful.

# **🙏 Our ask**

If you know any solopreneur or small business that could use Cactus, connect them to us at [**founders@oncactus.com**](mailto:founders@oncactus.com) or send them directly to my cell +1 (415) 747-2607.

Examples of businesses that can use Cactus include private chefs, caterers, photographers, personal trainers, business consultants, coaching agencies, or any entrepreneur managing a high volume of inquiries or calls.

We are entrepreneurs and our mission is to make every solopreneur successful. Cactus will empower the first billionaire solopreneur.

**👉 Try us out at [https://oncactus.com](https://oncactus.com) & Spiky will thank you!**

launches.title: Wavedash — Steam for the web
launches.body:
**TL;DR: Wavedash uses cutting edge browser technology to let gamers play the latest releases with no downloads or installation.**

https://youtu.be/J_33b9malzc

## The Problem

Large downloads and lengthy installs create friction between your game and potential players

## Our Solution

Wavedash uses cutting edge browser technologies (like WebAssembly and WebGPU) to allow players to hop into your game instantly — with no downloads and no installations.

## The Team

Kyler Blue was previously the first employee and Head of Product at Tenor (acquired by Google.) Kyler designed GIF Keyboard and helped build the Tenor API that powers search in the world’s largest apps and messengers.

Raymond (George) Kennedy previously built from-to.app, Stems ST-02, and founded Rhythmm (W18). He also founded Sesh (acquired by GoFundMe) and has been an engineering leader at several startups.

Matt Portner previously founded DefendTheHouse (a 700k subscriber YouTube gaming community) and worked in production at SnapChat and Buzzfeed. Matt is a VFX and design expert with credits in the film and television industry.

## Our Ask

Studios and game devs: partner with us.

Offer: we will port your game to the web and do the eng lifting to get your game on Wavedash. Live your dreams; make a living making games.

📧 Email us: [founders@wavedash.gg](mailto:founders@wavedash.gg)

launches.title: StarSling - AI Portal for Developers That Ship 🛸
launches.body:
Hey everyone! 

We’re Yonas & Daniel - Co-founders of [StarSling](https://www.starsling.dev).

StarSling (https://starsling.dev) is a developer portal that turns your daily unplanned work from all your dev tools into one-click actions, powered by AI. Open your homepage, click on a GitHub, Linear, or Sentry issue and you’ll see an Autofix button that triggers an agent and opens a Pull Request with a fix, all without leaving your portal. It’s AI agents for the tasks that live outside of your code editor, across deployments, performance, incidents, and bugs.

https://youtu.be/-rbrSNyguHY 

**🌄 Our Story**

Daniel led an engineering team at Netflix that built their Internal Developer Portal (IDP), called Netflix Console. It was the central hub for Netflix's 3,000+ engineers, managers and leaders and became the highest DAU internal tool for developers at Netflix.

Yonas built StackShare, one of the largest online developer communities that had over 1.5M registered developers and an enterprise offering used by thousands of companies that integrated tech stack data into their IDPs and other internal tools.

Both of us have seen the challenges that developers at large companies face in keeping their tech stacks healthy across thousands of codebases. We’ve also seen the benefits that a high-quality single IDP brings to engineering teams. We believe that AI agents have created a unique opportunity for developers to get the benefits of an IDP with automation baked in from the start.

**🔥 The Problem**

Developers typically spend \~20% of their time on annoying eng tasks outside of their code editor:

* Fixing exceptions
* Patching flaky CI builds and tests
* Updating engineering docs and changelogs
* Investigating and remediating incidents
* Optimizing slow database queries
* Debugging preview and staging environments
* Rotating expiring credentials and keys

These tasks are spread out across many different developer tools and workflows: Sentry, GitHub, CircleCI, PagerDuty, Supabase, Vercel and many more. StarSling is unifying these tools and bringing AI agents to the rest of the software development lifecycle (SDLC).\
**🧯 Our Solution**

We're building a system of AI agents that perform engineering tasks using the deep context that only exists in an internal developer portal (IDP). One central command center that houses internal services, applications, APIs, documentation and has AI agents continuously improving them. We bring your tools into one system and give you powerful workflows by orchestrating AI agents across these tools.

Our first offering is an agentic developer homepage that shows you your aggregated task list along with actions that AIs can take on your behalf. In your homepage you’ll see: your open PRs, exceptions, tickets, notifications, and more alongside AI agents.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90469&key=user_uploads/7866/d4f9f3c3-e7b9-485b-9920-3d04e80d385f)

Soon StarSling will orchestrate agents across the more complex tasks like investigating incidents. Our immediate goal is to be the interface and “portal” to all the AI agents for the dev tools you already use.

**🔮 Our Vision**

To create a system of AI agents that allows every engineer to spend close to 0% of their time dealing with deployments, performance, incidents, and bugs.

**👇 Our Ask**

If you’re a developer working on a production system, we’d love to show you StarSling and get your feedback!

👉 Signup for the waitlist: https://starsling.dev

📧 Email us: [founders@starsling.dev](mailto:founders@starsling.dev)
