launches.title: Text.ai - AI in your group chats
launches.body:
👋 Hey everyone,

I'm Rushi, CEO & co-founder of [text.ai](http://text.ai). We're thrilled to share what we've been building, **AI that lives where you already chat, no downloads needed**.

**TL;DR**

# **💡 What is **[**text.ai**](https://text.ai)**?**

We've brought AI directly into SMS (US & CA for now), WhatsApp (worldwide), and Telegram (worldwide) which over 5.5 billion people use daily.

No new apps to download, no learning curve, just text and go.

Watch our YouTube product video:

<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SFOBlc6extw>

We also just made the top 5 on [Product Hunt](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/text-ai) this past week! 

# **✅ How to try it:**

1\. Save our contact card: \[[text.ai](http://text.ai)\]

2\. Text directly or add to your group chats

3\. That's it! Works on \[[SMS](https://www.text.ai/)\], \[[WhatsApp](https://wa.me/15626840069?text=What%20is%20the%20best%20Hawaiian%20city%20to%20visit%20for%20Spring%20Break%3F)\], | \[[Telegram](https://t.me/thetextai_bot)\]

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=89968&key=user_uploads/310607/11b0f146-9cef-4d39-9e68-63318cc9299f)

# 

**🤔 Why did we build this?**

Ever tried explaining to your mom how to download and use a new AI app? Yeah... that's why we built [text.ai](http://text.ai).

I built the first version just for fun, a personal travel companion for when I was hunting for hidden veggie restaurants on my first solo trip to Spain & Portugal (I'm vegetarian) and had no internet. It was ridiculously simple but solved a real problem for me.

Then something unexpected happened. Friends started adding our AI to their group chats. They used it to plan Vegas trips, settle restaurant debates, and even as a digital wingman for date nights.

The magic? No one had to download a thing. AI just showed up where they already were. In their messages.

Now we're obsessed with one mission: making AI accessible to everyone.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=89968&key=user_uploads/310607/2bf7fa71-528a-4991-9028-ee07c428c527)

# 

**🚀 Real magic happens in groups**

"TextAI saved our Friday night! Eight people with different diets, and it found this amazing Thai fusion place everyone loved. Even suggested dishes for our vegetarian friend. Now it's our go-to for plans!" - Jackie

No more endless screenshots. No more one person having to take charge. And finally, a solution for that friend who says "I'm okay with anything" and then rejects every suggestion!

We help your group actually make decisions instead of just talking about them.

Or you can use it to roast them.

Either way it works well.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=89968&key=user_uploads/310607/0441afac-10f3-4c9a-85de-e6d04f843e7c)

**👥 The team behind the magic**

Founded by myself ( [@rushishah](https://www.producthunt.com/@rushishah) , ex-Tesla), [@praharpatel](https://www.producthunt.com/@praharpatel) (Ex-Walmart Labs, Eventbrite, Opentable), and [@maniar](https://www.producthunt.com/@maniar) (ex-Gannett Media, McKinsey).

We're three friends who've been building products together since college. We're building [text.ai](http://text.ai) because we've experienced firsthand how technology that's meant to connect people often ends up creating more friction instead.

We believe AI should fit into your life, not the other way around.

# **🔮 What's next?**

We're working towards going from just answers to action.

Soon, from that same group chat, you'll be able to book a restaurant reservation directly without ever leaving the conversation, get group reminders, book each other's calendars, and even purchase items together.

# 

**🙏 We'd love to hear from you**:

* What is the first thing you’d ask [text.ai](http://text.ai)?
* What group chat would you add [text.ai](http://text.ai) to first?
* Which feature would make this indispensable for you?
* Who in your life would find this most helpful?

👉 Try it now: \[[WhatsApp](https://wa.me/15626840069?text=What%20is%20the%20best%20Hawaiian%20city%20to%20visit%20for%20Spring%20Break%3F)\] | \[[Telegram](https://t.me/thetextai_bot)\] | \[[SMS](https://www.text.ai/)(Only US & CA for now)\]

launches.title: Theorem – AI coding that is trustworthy-by-default
launches.body:
### **TL;DR:** **Please give us your most complicated coding problem that _needs_ to be correct. [Sign up!](https://theoremlabs.com/waitlist/)**

Hello World! We’re [Jason](https://jasongross.github.io/) and [Rajashree](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=41ZE3NwAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao)! We think AI code generation is going to be bigger than any of us can imagine.

### **MISSION**

Theorem is an AI and programming languages research lab. Our question: as the models get better at generating code, what is the bottleneck to safely deploying vastly more computation in the world? 

* _Code has bugs._  AI-enabled attackers will increase the volume and velocity of attacks on software infrastructure. Human code review will not scale.
* _AIs are untrusted generators._ In order to deploy AIs in critical systems without fully understanding their generalization behavior, we’ll need robust, scalable methods for overseeing their solutions.

### **OPPORTUNITY**

Programming languages and formal methods is the promise that we can bootstrap roots of trust. Even as complexity of software goes up, we can design simple interfaces for steering with leverage.

Previously, this technology was only applied to the most mission-critical infrastructure, because of the enormous labor bottleneck — requiring years of PhD level engineering work. For instance, Jason worked on the project that wrote the code generator powering trillions of secure https connections everyday, but it took fifteen man-years to complete!

With advances in AI, we’re able to speed this development cycle 10,000 times! As a [wild example](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O9nKMjjb3Hg) of what’s possible, we spent two hours finding what would have been a zero-day in https code from 2011.

### **OUR APPROACH**

We want to build workflows for trustworthy-by-default programming by pushing our best ideas till they break. The current candidate to beat is _program equivalence_ driven development. You oversee a simple reference implementation. We give you an optimized implementation, along with a proof that the programs are functionally equivalent. 

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90592&key=user_uploads/2206829/f5c671df-ac60-4b94-8081-36ae8c0aeda4)

We’re gradually rolling out our programming environment and models. Some use cases from our customers:

* Performance optimization: finding edge cases where hyper-optimized GPU code would fail; getting clear documentation of dependencies that modify behavior in unforeseen ways. 
* Code migration: automating legacy code refactors from Python to Rust while proving no functional change; writing custom kernels to support new services.

**If you work in public infrastructure, finance, hardware, or have other use cases that demand correctness, we’d love to help. Please reach out at [founders@theoremlabs.com](mailto:founders@theoremlabs.com)**
launches.tagline: Formal proofs so even your systems engineers can vibecode

# **🎬 Demo**

_Check out our demo below to see Airweave’s G-Drive and Slack search in action used by Claude Desktop, showcasing how Airweave outperforms Anthropic’s own built-in Google Drive connector ⤵️_

https://youtu.be/XkC5z0AkW8E

# ❌ **The Problem**

* **Agents struggle with vague or informal requests** like _”Resolve that one Asana ticket about auth configs”_ or _“cancel Alex’s Stripe payment for Taylor Swift tickets”_
* **Typically, then agents hallucinate when they can't find data,** or rely on inefficient chains of function calls
* **MCP encourages agent-app interactions, but MCP servers alone don’t make workspaces semantically searchable**

# ✅ **Our Solution: Airweave**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90465&key=user_uploads/1896666/c686c20f-62ac-454c-8d3b-d43ce9c857c4)

* **Airweave connects to productivity tools, databases, or document stores makes their contents searchable for agents**
* **Bottom line:** Your agent gets a simple search endpoint. Your users get reliable, personalized experiences

# **Features**

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90465&key=user_uploads/1896666/d8e186b6-cc60-4b97-802b-f3ef29cf2a4a)

* **Open-Source**
* **Simple yet powerful search interface** via REST or MCP
* **MCP-compatible:** Turn any app into a semantically searchable MCP server
* [**Python & TypeScript SDKs**](https://docs.airweave.ai/sdks)
* **Connect to your agent to your favorite apps** like Google Drive, Gmail, Outlook, Google Calendar, HubSpot, Notion, Jira, Slack, Dropbox, Stripe, Github, etc.
* [**White-Labeled Multi-Tenancy**](https://docs.airweave.ai/white-labeling) to provide OAuth2-based integration across user accounts with secure boundaries
* **File Handling:** Supported formats: DOCX, PDF, PPTX, XLSX, HTML, TXT, PNG, JPEG

# **Examples of How Customers Use Airweave:**

* Legal AI assistants searching Google Drive/OneDrive to give accurate Perplexity-like answers
* Agents for engineering managers scanning GitHub, Notion, and Jira to understand codebases and draft design docs
* Compliance agents verifying marketing materials against current Dropbox financial data in regulated industries

# **🤝 The Team**

Lennert and Rauf met in uni 7 years ago, and have been friends since. Lennert did AI research at Amazon and IBM, and has been working with LLMs since 2020. Rauf is a CS grad and worked as a Data Platform Engineer at fast-growing startups and large enterprise.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90465&key=user_uploads/1896666/d9d8d633-63a6-4c7b-9a3b-1e7ccaefaca8)

# **📢 Our Asks:**

* **⭐️ [Star us on GitHub](https://github.com/airweave-ai/airweave) ⭐️**
* **Book a call** if you’re building agents that need to interact with apps, productivity tools, or databases: https://cal.com/lennert-airweave/airweave-q-a-demo
* **Intro us** to PMs, engineering managers, or more senior at agent product teams and companies: [lennert@airweave.ai](mailto:lennert@airweave.ai)
* [**Join our Discord community**](https://discord.gg/6wDWUhhuu2)

name: sieve
one_liner: AI + human review to solve data cleaning - accessible via API or Excel
long_description:
sieve solves data cleaning for hedge funds and investment firms by delivering clean, reliable data wherever they already work - via APIs for devs and Excel for analysts. Currently, many firms rely on manual review steps where engineers literally receive emails containing data they need to review. sieve replaces that with an API that integrates directly into their existing data pipelines. Instead of raising for human review, they can send all the same information to our API and get clean, trustworthy data back. On top of our API, we offer an Excel integration that lets analysts pull data from any source (filings, pdfs, images - even ones in other languages!) into their models with with just a URL.

Analysts and data scientists complain that AI alone falls short of their accuracy requirements. They end up needing to check AI outputs against source documents to confirm accuracy. We  solve this last mile problem by integrating expert reviewers to catch and correct the issues that AI alone doesn't get right.

launches.title: sieve helps hedge funds extract and clean data from any source directly into their existing tools
launches.body:
**The problem**

Right now, the most sophisticated hedge funds pay over-qualified data engineers to spend hours a day on the under-levered task of data cleaning. It's crazy to anyone outside of the industry, but in finance even earnings dates (the date a company reports earnings) are considered **a known hard problem.**

https://youtu.be/V-OpzDRge3o

**Our ask**

We've solved this problem and our ask to the YC community is - **connect us with anyone you know who works in the investing world and uses data (should be all of them).** You can email us at [founders@usesieve.com](mailto:nicole@usesieve.com).

**Who we are**

After studying CS at MIT, I worked at Citadel and McKinsey, and Savannah worked at Bain. We've dealt with this problem first hand and were amazed that there weren't good solutions.

**What we've built**

sieve lets hedge funds replace manual review in their data pipelines with a simple API call, so their engineers and analysts can get back to more differentiated work. Behind the scenes, we use AI to find and retrieve the appropriate source documents and to extract the requested data. Each data point is reviewed by a team of expert reviewers before being returned to the client. This lets us achieve the level of accuracy hedge funds need, and that AI-only approaches aren't able to achieve.

We offer direct API access and access via other tools like Excel. Watch below to see how the excel integration works!

[**https://youtu.be/r6A1t_X2kZo**](https://youtu.be/r6A1t_X2kZo)

**What the early results look like**

* sieve is able to replace manual data cleaning workflows:
  * accurately (100% match to data that was hand-collected internally)
  * more scalably (weeks of full-time work to review data became a passive background task for the data scientist)
  * more cheaply (easily 60-70% cheaper than existing options, even when that existing option is BPO outsourcing)

In our first week of YC, we were told that we need to be at least one of: better, faster, or cheaper.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90521&key=user_uploads/1591478/5e3dcc39-e2cb-48d4-bf91-5babfba2d701)

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90521&key=user_uploads/1591478/9bec35c3-4989-4973-b5ab-2fd181799d39)

launches.title: Blueshoe – The AI-Native Legal Back Office
launches.body:
**TLDR:** Blueshoe is the legal back office on autopilot. Our AI agents make billing work disappear – reviewing every invoice, streamlining collections, and providing financial intelligence for modern law firms.

We’re working with law firms across the U.S. and managing millions in legal revenue.

Learn more at [blueshoe.com](http://blueshoe.com) or email us at [founders@blueshoe.com](mailto:founders@blueshoe.com).

https://youtu.be/UeV88E3K4iI

**Problem**

Law firms and their clients are hobbled by outdated back office operations—unclear time entries, delayed invoicing, rejected bills, and rigid pricing models. In the U.S. alone, these inefficiencies tie up over $100 billion in law firm revenue at any given time.

Backlogs persist because of outdated, manual workflows — delayed invoice reviews, fragmented financial data, and no visibility into operational performance across the firm.

**Solution**

Blueshoe transforms billing from an administrative burden into a strategic asset. Our AI agents review invoices in real-time, resolve compliance issues, and provide profitability insights across matters, clients, and practices.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90625&key=user_uploads/1499064/16ecb3c9-3f98-4052-8fbd-ef72a80b4178)

This isn’t just about speed or automation—it’s about predictability, transparency, and trust. With Blueshoe, firms gain the financial clarity to price work intelligently, forecast revenue reliably, and demonstrate value accurately to clients.

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXe66zAcMnQd6CVTwSd0uV7TEDqGKXIvrar-yD76RJxJ58Pxb9-P3G2CWRq4co1eeRhth422JLf5CaAbeB1yRwIiIUyARj15yKAjKHyQ_X2ppgGitlcIjYZ6jbb3D8n40lNLI6Crvw?key=GM--uq32ZhXFCCMte1NCRI-9)

We’re live, onboarding U.S.-based firms, and already managing millions in law firm revenue. Our clients report faster billing cycles, fewer rejections, and a better understanding of their practice.

**About Us**

[Casey O’Grady](https://www.linkedin.com/in/casey-og) went from Harvard Law to strategy consulting to building Blueshoe after seeing firsthand how much back-office chaos holds back the practice of law.

[Kai Yee Wan](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kywan/) went from Google to grad school in computer science to spending his days buried in model outputs so that Blueshoe gets smarter with every task.

**Our Ask**\
If you know any law firm managing partners, innovation officers, or legal ops professionals, drop us a note at [founders@blueshoe.com](mailto:founders@blueshoe.com).

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90625&key=user_uploads/1997200/4ecdf8b6-ceab-4e71-93be-d678f7a848de)

launches.title: Cascade Space - Deep space communications as a service
launches.body:
# tl;dr

Cascade Space is building a turn-key communications system for lunar and deep space missions. Our ground station network and integrated software tools work together to maximize uptime and availability, while reducing spacecraft iteration cycles from weeks to hours. 

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90423&key=user_uploads/222992/7b3a56ce-8dc0-48db-a2e5-3badb2afd893)

**Why are we building this and why now?**

The Deep Space Network (DSN), NASA’s global network of ground terminals for communicating with deep space probes, is [oversubscribed by 40% and in desperate need of upgrades.](https://newspaceeconomy.ca/2024/09/02/nasas-deep-space-network-challenges-and-the-road-ahead/) The DSN is all but unavailable for most commercial operations. Companies with missions going to the Moon and beyond have to deal with a patchwork of individual dish operators for every mission, each with bespoke hardware, specs, and interfaces. Furthermore, many of these commercial providers are not able to handle the demand and [operational failures also can lead to loss of mission](https://www.astroforge.com/updates-collection/odint-mission-debrief).

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90423&key=user_uploads/222992/c6aa8968-e567-42e5-8866-866414630f22)

**Comms system design is fraught with peril**

The spacecraft comms system design is tightly coupled to the available ground network. Engineers spend hundreds of hours poring over datasheets, on the phone with vendors and suppliers, and endless email threads, only to put all this data into a giant spreadsheet to make sense of it. Every iteration requires not only painful attention to detail, but also in-depth esoteric knowledge of how radio frequency systems and channel coding schemes work in order to accurately predict in-flight performance. Simple misunderstandings can lead to catastrophic errors in design and configuration.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90423&key=user_uploads/222992/1623d16f-4789-4793-892f-2c7adffc84a7)

**End-to-end comms system validation often doesn’t happen**

Fully integrated testing between the spacecraft and ground terminal is typically cost prohibitive. Instead, engineers compare spec sheets and email configurations to the ground operators, and hope it works in flight (spoiler alert: it often doesn’t). It is routine for spacecraft to fly having never done an end-to-end test of their system with ground terminal representative hardware. The whole process is subject to human error from end to end. 

**This approach to space communications does not scale**

Commercial space ventures beyond low earth orbit have already pushed existing infrastructure to its breaking point, and demand for deep space comms support is expected to grow exponentially over the next decade. We will not have a spacefaring future for humanity until communications for spacecraft become as easy as signing up for cable internet. 

**We are redefining the process, starting with spacecraft design**

Better comms starts at the beginning, in the early trade study and design phase. We are replacing industry-standard spreadsheets with a modern software tool that lets you see how your system will perform with our ground network in real time.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90423&key=user_uploads/222992/4873c5a0-9288-48fe-8d2e-a3a32f3fcad0)

**Test as you fly, fly as you test**

You don’t rise to the level of your expectations, you fall to the level of your testing. We ship you a “ground station in a box,” identical to hardware we’ve installed at the ground stations you will be using, and provide you with a test plan that you can use to test your entire system end to end, with both the space vehicle and the ground terminal in the loop. 

**Launch with confidence**

Fly and operate your spacecraft. Use our API to schedule passes on our network, track your spacecraft, stream data, monitor the ground site, and access recordings.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90423&key=user_uploads/222992/2b01ca98-b6d7-4f8b-9af5-5b93b0613ef0)

**We are rolling out our preliminary network rapidly**

We start by partnering with owners of dishes that are currently unused for any other telemetry applications. This allows us to build out the product and acquire customers with a minimal amount of capital. As we build out the network, we will further expand our network by strategically building our own ground stations in key locations. Our first downlink only ground stations are expected to come online in 2025, with more to follow in 2026.

**We are passionate about your mission success**

[Jacob](https://bookface.ycombinator.com/company/30556) and [Arlen](https://bookface.ycombinator.com/user/2222230) have solved many of these exact problems at company level scales in previous roles. Jacob was RF system architect at SpaceX and Arlen has built complex hardware/software systems his entire career. Collectively they have spent hundreds of hours in mission control, many of those hours dealing with anomalies and outright failures. They are both passionate about building the culture of excellence at Cascade that is required for flawless mission execution.

**If you are struggling with comms for your upcoming mission, drop us a line. We can help.**

https://cascade.space/

launches.title: Aegis - AI Revenue Recovery Engine for Healthcare Providers
launches.body:
We’re [Krishang Todi](https://linkedin.com/in/krishang-todi-a6525b135), [Aarav Bajaj](https://linkedin.com/in/aarav-bajaj-408ab01b1) , and [Dhanya Shah](https://linkedin.com/in/dhanya-shah-97878835b) and we’re building [Aegis.](https://aegishealth.us)\
💥 **TL;DR:** \
Aegis **automates the insurance appeals** **process end-to-end**: from denial detection and compliant appeal generation to submission, tracking, and actionable analytics. We integrate with EHRs, clearinghouses, and payer portals, helping providers and medical billing firms **recover lost revenue and save significant staff time.**

[Launch Video](https://youtu.be/6AYEhYpMjBQ)

\
**🩺 The Problem** \
US healthcare providers lose **$260B+** annually to denied claims, and spend **$20B+** fighting them. Yet **fewer than 15%** of denials are appealed - even though **over 50%** of appeals are successful. With AI-driven denials on the rise, the system is collapsing under its own weight.

The current process of fighting a denial is manual, time-consuming and riddled with inefficiencies. \
\
🧠 **The Solution** \
Aegis plugs into a provider’s existing data stack (EHR, PMS, clearinghouses) to:

* **Detect denials automatically:** Aegis continuously monitors claims data streams from your clearinghouse and instantly flags denied claims without requiring manual intervention. These denied claims are then arranged by priority based on deadline and claim value.
* **Pull patient records, EOBs, and payor docs:** Aegis integrates with the EHR to fetch supporting materials, such as patient records, Explanation of Benefits (EOBs), and payer correspondence.
* **Generate and submit appeal packages:** Using AI trained on successful appeal language and payer requirements, Aegis drafts customized appeal letters, compiles required documentation, and submits the appeal directly to the insurance provider via appropriate channels (fax, portal, or clearinghouse).
* **Track appeal progress and surface denial insights:** Aegis provides end-to-end tracking of every appeal, including submission confirmation, status updates, and final resolution. Over time, it also analyzes patterns in denials- by payer, procedure, provider, and code- to help providers take proactive steps to reduce future denial rates.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90624&key=user_uploads/2684885/a6415c5b-f49e-407a-ae34-dc0f3af6833e)

We cut the cost of appealing a denial by **80%** and reduce the time to file an appeal from **2+ hours to under 2 minutes**.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90624&key=user_uploads/2684885/65b5d60c-b1ca-4c93-9522-eb4cff454dee)

👥 **Team**

We’re a team of three close friends from Carnegie Mellon University with deep, complementary expertise across AI, finance, and full-stack development- built for solving complex problems like healthcare claims. Aarav (CS + ML) brings AI research experience and worked at Palantir, where he helped deploy data-driven solutions at scale. Krishang (Econ + Math) did fixed-income risk modeling at one of India’s top funds. Dhanya (IS + CS) is a seasoned full-stack engineer who’s built production systems at three companies. Together, we’re building Aegis to bring automation, intelligence, and trust to healthcare appeals.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90624&key=user_uploads/2684885/14e2b315-9c6c-44df-af7a-9debc2a477ae)

**🙏 How You Can Help** \
Connect us to:

* CFOs at hospitals / MSOs
* Healthcare leaders open to advising
* Independent practice owners
* Founders who’ve sold into the RCM stack

Please shoot us an email at [founders@aegishealth.us](mailto:founders@aegishealth.us).

launches.title: 🚨 BitPatrol – Secret Detection That Actually Works
launches.body:
**Vibe coding is flooding GitHub with leaked secrets.**

As writing code becomes increasingly accessible, it's easier than ever to accidentally expose API keys, database credentials, SSH private keys, and more.

**TLDR:** BitPatrol detects secret leaks in your source code that traditional scanners miss, helping you prevent costly data breaches.

🎥 **Demo Video:** [Watch here](https://youtu.be/cJwggIj3SZA)

---

### **The Problem**

Secret leaks are happening every day, impacting companies across every industry. Traditional scanning tools attempt to catch these leaks using rigid regex patterns and keyword matching.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90617&key=user_uploads/2475147/274a7869-42fd-41fc-86f4-668846d4d01e)

However, these methods struggle with secrets that don't follow set patterns, allowing critical leaks like these to slip through undetected.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90617&key=user_uploads/2475147/e67f96a4-a636-461e-9434-93a92f23f1ff)

### **Our Solution**

Unlike legacy tools that rely on regular expressions, BitPatrol uses our proprietary machine learning model to detect secrets based on code context and developer intent – not just string patterns.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90617&key=user_uploads/2475147/243b128a-4438-4e39-bf3b-7c6c1b8e3d32)

Once our model flags a potential secret, we reference it against our dataset of billions of public commits, docker images, and open source packages. This helps us rapidly assess the secret's exposure frequency, drastically reducing false positives and solving the issue of alert fatigue.

Using our [GitHub App](https://github.com/apps/bitpatrol), you can trigger actions that occur when a secret is detected, including automated alerts and custom workflows to immediately respond and remediate when a secret is leaked.

### **The Team**

BitPatrol was founded by [Chris Lambert](https://www.linkedin.com/in/~chris), a former Stripe engineer who quickly rose to the top 2% globally on HackerOne after uncovering secret leaks at some of the world’s largest companies—many of which were actively using our competitor’s tools.

### 🙏 **Ask: How You Can Help**

* **Try BitPatrol:** Install our [GitHub App](https://github.com/apps/bitpatrol) and experience immediate, real-time secret detection.
* **Connect with Us:** If you know a technical leader concerned about protecting their company from secret leaks in code, please connect them to [founders@bitpatrol.io](mailto:founders@bitpatrol.io)

### 🔥 **The Deal**

To celebrate our launch, we’re offering:

* **Free 2024 Company Secret Leak Audits (a $20K value)**
  * External-only scan — requires no internal data access
  * Deep, high-coverage audit of your public code surface (commits, mobile apps, etc.)
  * Request an [audit here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfBwBwk9-tizbOo1y3Aj9aK6jXeX8QNKJIhwEFTp0OuvhcNAg/viewform?usp=header)
* **Exclusive early-adopter pricing**
  * Just $20/dev/month for real-time secret scanning with our [GitHub App](https://github.com/apps/bitpatrol)

Don’t let vibe coding turn into your next major breach—secure your code with BitPatrol today.

👉 [Get started at BitPatrol.io](https://bitpatrol.io/) or reach out directly: [founders@bitpatrol.io](mailto:founders@bitpatrol.io)

name: Godela
one_liner: AI Physics Engine
long_description:
What if every experiment you wanted to run could be modeled using AI? 
Godela is an AI-powered physics engine that gives engineers faster, cheaper replacement to simulations and physical prototypes.
No set up, no wait. Just ask—and get simulation quality result.

free_response_question_answers.answer: Engineers and scientists rely on simulations and physical testing to understand how the world works—but today, those tools are slow, expensive, and fragmented. Running a single simulation can take hours to days. Building physical prototypes takes weeks to months. Every domain—from fluid dynamics to thermal modeling—requires different solvers, different experts, and perfect setups. This creates massive bottlenecks in innovation.We’ve felt the drag—at Apple, Google, and Stanford. So we’re building AI that turns engineering questions into instant, physics-based models. No solvers. No bottlenecks.
free_response_question_answers.question: What is the core problem you are solving? Why is this a big problem? What made you decide to work on it?

free_response_question_answers.answer: **From rockets to bioplastics, the next wave of breakthroughs will come from AI that deeply understands physics—not just text.**We’re building Godela to give humanity the power to instantly model, explore, and invent across the physical world. Imagine being able to instantly test any idea, uncover hidden relationships, and accelerate discovery at the speed of thought. This is how we unlock invention at scale—by giving scientist and engineers the tools to simulate reality
free_response_question_answers.question: What is your long-term vision? If you truly succeed, what will be different about the world?

name: SAVA Robotics
one_liner: Sheet Metal Super Factory
long_description:
SAVA is rebuilding sheet metal manufacturing from the ground up. From Ford Trucks to NASA Space Shuttles, sheet metal is the cornerstone of American Manufacturing - but the industry runs on 30-year-old technology and a shrinking workforce.

Alessio and Vedic competed in high school robotics when they met Jakob at Georgia Tech's Robotics labs. After witnessing Vedic's father's 12-hour shifts and visiting manufacturers across the US, they saw an industry trapped by legacy constraints: manual processes, skilled labor shortages, and unused automation.

SAVA is building a fully integrated manufacturing system that eliminates skilled operators while delivering superior speed, quality, and economics. They're already reducing customer iteration cycles from 5-6 days to 1-2 days for companies like Pave Robotics and Zipline - proving the technology works in real production environments.

They're not just replacing human operators with robots - they're building the foundation to replace an entire industry built on outdated technology with modern manufacturing intelligence.

launches.title: SAVA Robotics: Robot Operators for Sheet Metal Machines 🦾⚙️
launches.body:
**_TL;DR_** SAVA Robotics builds robot operators for sheet metal machines.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90343&key=user_uploads/2573773/64be898f-9e5f-4c84-9a47-50113a7f18e6)

# Why Sheet Metal?

[Alessio](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alessiotoniolo) and [Vedic](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vedic-patel-539546238) competed in high school robotics when they met [Jakob](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jakob-knudsen5) at Georgia Tech’s Robotics labs. The team saw Vedic’s father work 12-hour shifts, operating the sheet metal machines in his shop because he struggled to find workers. After visiting manufacturers across the US, they have witnessed hundreds of automation cells collect dust while **shop owners scramble to find skilled labor**.

https://youtu.be/pnrhTYbOqNc

# Our Solution

_SAVA 01_ mimics the human operator for CNC Press Brakes.

* Upload part CAD file
* Synthetic data fine-tunes robot model
* Robot reads machine data and manipulates unseen parts
* _SAVA 01_ bends metal part on the press brake!

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90343&key=user_uploads/2573773/d59ca39f-edca-481a-9a30-f93a84b60dc1)

# Our American Dream

From Ford Trucks to NASA Space Shuttles, sheet metal is the cornerstone of American Manufacturing. We are addressing the critical labor shortage in US sheet metal.

_Our ask is two-fold:_

1. [Order custom metal parts](https://savarobotics.com/yc.html) produced autonomously by SAVA.
2. Introduce us to family and friends in domestic manufacturing.

---

launches.title: Docket – AI agents for QA testing
launches.body:
**TL;DR**

**Docket lets you write tests in plain English. Then we keep those tests in sync with how users actually interact with your product — no more flaky selectors or stale test scripts.**

---

### **The Problem**

E2E tests are a _pain_ to write — and an even bigger pain to maintain.

* Writing Cypress or Playwright tests is time-consuming and brittle
* Even no-code tools require manually defining flows or relying on flaky CSS selectors
* Every UI change risks breaking your suite, forcing teams to either spend hours fixing tests or just give up and test manually

Most teams hit the same tradeoff: **move fast and break things** — or slow down to ensure quality.

### **Our Solution**

Docket lets you:

* Write tests in plain English ("Log in, Search for Y Combinator t shirt, Add 2 shirts to cart")
* Skip the brittle selectors — we use multimodal agents that interact with the page like humans
* Automatically keep tests up to date with real user session data

---

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90473&key=user_uploads/296302/5977d1c3-f564-4d67-b623-319bb6252efd)

### **Meet the Team**

We’re **Nishant** and **Boris** — two engineers who dreaded writing tests so much, we started a company to fix it.

We met while working at **AWS**, and between us, we’ve built and shipped products at **Stripe, Citadel, Brex, and Patreon**. But testing was always the drag. Writing tests took forever. Keeping them working was even worse. We constantly felt the pain of choosing between moving fast and having confidence in our code.

So we’re building the tool we wish we had: **Docket** — tests in plain English that stay up to date, without the maintenance burden.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90473&key=user_uploads/296302/f2b9cf37-f50c-4c40-8ca9-6a43d5069a0b)

---

### **Launch Offer**

As part of our launch, we’re offering **free complete test suite implementations** for our next 10 customers. Book a demo [here](https://calendly.com/nishant-docket/docket-intro-meeting)!

\
— Nishant & Boris

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=90473&key=user_uploads/296302/c4bc7ae4-7794-4316-9dce-883ce72a97fc)
launches.tagline: Docket lets you test your website in plain English, and automatically keeps tests up to date

launches.title: Cohesive - AI CRM for blue collar businesses 🧹🧤
launches.body:
Hey everyone, we’re[ Kevin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kevindzhang/) and[ Nam](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nam-nguyen96/) - cofounders of[ Cohesive](https://getcohesiveai.com/) 👋

**TL;DR**

Cohesive helps service business owners take control of their own destiny - our agentic CRM fully manages growth today for over 350 commercial cleaning, landscaping, and pest control owners.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DE3ZNisKZoQ

**❌ The Problem**

If you run a commercial service company (e.g., janitorial, HVAC, landscaping, pest control), you’re probably out in the field quite often visiting clients.

Since you’ll be constantly on the move, most of your growth is dependent on others - outsourced sales talent (like offshore VAs), paid ads (like LSA), or from marketing agencies (like for SEO or lead generation). 

This is the reality for the 1+ million blue-collar businesses in the United States today.

**👷 Our Solution**

Our agentic CRM helps service businesses grow by in-housing growth:

* **Market Research:** building out a list of potential business owners and property owners and their contact information in their service area
* **Outreach:** automatically reaching out to potential targets to assess interest, and self-updating the CRM accordingly
* **Monitoring:** constantly monitoring and triggering follow-ups based on active signals (e.g., new location opening or existing contract ending)

It’s helped our customers so much that one of early clients is buying us NBA floor tickets (albeit for the worst team in the league):

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXc1EFN9K8a4exd5YmdWDeo6af4PDp4M_GTp8eqIRZB0pf5nxrh7OWotK1VZQg3QYBjQ7QbclIsSJm5TkIyz6W50FTO_OD01zEGaFOOgM82Jy2nA2iA5Tg13zVXg6gP_FtTUJ2GSGg?key=HJjAgxbnHaeSWRuTHARDMw)

🙏 **Our Ask**

* Follow us on [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/company/cohesive-ai)
* Share this post - do you know anyone running a commercial service business (e.g., did you recently hire a janitor or landscaper? Let them know - they can book a demo [here](https://calendly.com/cohesiveapp/demo)!)
* Learn more at [getcohesiveai.com](http://getcohesiveai.com)

**👬 The Team**

Kevin and Nam have known each other for years (founded a 50K MRR+ service business together before) and co-founded Cohesive in late 2024. 

Kevin (CEO): Previously led a product at Charthop (a16z-backed HR tech), and was a consultant at McKinsey, where he worked with national service franchises on GTM strategy. BS Econ at Duke

Nam (CTO): built LLM-powered recommendation systems at Microsoft, founding engineer at Starlight (South Park Common and General Catalyst backed fintech startup). CS and Math grad from Williams
